title: Umunyembabazi Yesu Ntabara/R.Kelly
content: Indirimbo yitwa â€œUMUNYEMBABAZI YESUâ€Iyi ni indirimbo yâ€™ukwihana nâ€™ugusenga. Icozana umuntu wese yagiriye abandi ibibi akigaya gushika aho yicuza ukuraha kugira ngo asenge asaba imbabazi kandi arahire yuko atagisubira mu kwiyegurira Imana. Iyi ndirimbo tuyituye umuntu wese ashaka gusubirana nâ€™Imana. Itubere icigwa twese. Igira iti:Jewe ubganje ndi uwa Yesu, nki kumavi nsaba imbabazi mukiza wanje umva ugutakamba kwanje. Nagendeye mu mwiza nkinisha umuriro none ubu ntaco maze, mwami ndakwirukiye.Munyembabazi Yesu, mpamagaye izina ryawe, unyuhagize ubuntu bgawe, unkureko isoni. Nagerereye kure ariko ndaje kuko ndakeneye ukuboko kwawe kwâ€™imbabazi, nkura hasi mukiza mfasha umpagurutse, ndapfukamitse amavi yanje, ntabara.Munyembabazi Yesu, umutima wanje uri mu mubabaro ntangere kubera ivyaha nakoze, babarira ivyaha vyanje inkureko izi ngoyi, ndakuririye Mukiza, ndagupfukamiye.Munyembabazi Yesu, ngirirâ€™ikigongwe. Nirutse inyuma yâ€™ubutunzi, inzhabu, niruka inyuma yâ€™ibinezera, nirengagiza ukuri, nibera mu kinyoma ntakaza ubgenge, ubgibone bumpuma amaso bituma mbabaza benshi, nteza amarira none ubu ibihome vyâ€™ibohero biranshinyagurira binyibutsa umubabaro nateje abantu.Mukiza ndoroshe, narataye inzira ariko uyu munsi ndizeye ubuntu bgawe butangaje. Mwami akira umutima wanje, kiza ibisebe vyanje, ndongorera muhira ukoresheje inyenyeri.Munyembabazi Yesu, ngirira imbabazi. Kurâ€™abo nakomerekeje, ndihanye kandi ndarahiye sinzosubira. Uburemere bgâ€™ukwicuza burarenze ukwihangana. Mu nzozi, nguma mbona amashusho yâ€™abo nagiriye nabi, numva amajwi yabo Akoma induru mu gacerere.Nkurako uko kwicuza, ntabara uyu mubabaro, mpa ayandi mahirwe yo gukora neza. Si ncishima, si nkiri impumyi, ndiko ndakurondera Mukiza wanje kuko wewe ni wewe mahoro yanje. Imbabazi zawe zitemba nkâ€™uruzi rwâ€™agakiza, kiza umutima wanje, ushitse indoto zanje, imbabazi zawe ni ndende kandi ziragutse. Uri Umwungere wanje nanje ndi intama yawe, mfata ukuboko unyobore, Munyembabazi Yesu negamiye wewe.

title: Yesu Kristo dukize twebgeÂ Abarundi
content:
Hariho abantu bakira, ababohoka kubera ukwumviriza indirimbo zâ€™Imana. Abantu benshi barazikunda, bagakunda umudiho nâ€™amajambo aba yaririmbge. Mugabo naho baba batumva amajambo indirimbo zâ€™Imana ziguma ziryoshe. Twahisemwo rero kuza turabashikiriza indirimbo zaririmbge mu zindi ndimi kandi tukabahindurira amajambo azirimwo mu Kirundi kugira ngo mumenye ubutumwa zitanga. Ni ukugirango nâ€™abaririmvyi bâ€™Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana bigireho ubumenyi bgo kuririmba nâ€™ukwandika indirimbo.

Uyu munsi tubashikiriza indirimbo zâ€™Imana zâ€™uwahora ari icamamare mu kuririmba indirimbo zo mwâ€™isi hanyuma agakora ivyaha vyatumye apfungwa. Bamuciriye kumara mwâ€™ibohero imyaka 30. Ubu rero yarakiriye Yesu Kristo amubera Umwami nâ€™Umukiza wâ€™ubugingo bgiwe akaba yaririmvye indirimbo zâ€™Imana zirimwo amajambo ahambaye tubashikiriza.

Uwo muririmvyi yitwa Robert Sylvester Kelly yavutse muri Nzero itariki 8 mu 1967. Azwi kwâ€™izina rya R. Kelly. Ni Umunyamerika, yiyandikira indirimbo kandi akaziririmba. Yavukiye muri Chicago mu ntara ya Illinois akaba azwi cane kwâ€™isi cokimwe na ba Michael Jackson, Whitney Houston, Mariah Carey, Celine Dion, Janet Jackson, Chris Brown, Usher, Luther Vandross nâ€™abandi benshi.

Indirimbo ya mbere tugira tubashikirize yitwa:Â â€œYESU KIZA UBUGINGO BGANJEâ€. Tuyituye Abarundi bose bari mu mabohero ari mu gihugu cacu câ€™Uburundi, bige kuri aya majambo ari murâ€™iyi ndirimbo kandi abafashe. Iyi ndirimbo tuyituye kandi Umurundi wese ari mu bibazo, murazi yuko bitabuze, na cane cane abari mu ruvugo, mu ndyane no mu ruhamo. Amajambo ari murâ€™iyo nâ€™aya:

Aha ndi ni mu mwonga wâ€™igitutu câ€™isoni, nico gituma umutima wanje uhamagara izina rya Yesu Kristo ngo aze antabare.

Impade zose hari bihome binkikije bikaguma bivuga amakosa nakoze bibarira mutima wanje. Bimbonamwo umunyavyaha, ariko Yesu we ambonamwo umuhizi, ufise umutima uguma uhamagara umuco wâ€™Umukiza.

Mu mwiheburo ntangere ndapfukama nkashikana amavi hasi, nkasenga ngo Umwami Yesu abohore umutima wanje, abohore mpwemu yanje.

Mu mwijima, imbabazi zawe ziramurikira, zikankurako ikimenyetso câ€™ivyaha nambitswe. Narapfapfanye ariko imbabazi zawe zingira umuntu.

â€œYesu Kristo umukiza wanje subira ungire umuntu, ukize umutima wanje ndagusavye.

Mu bihuhusi no mu muriro, ni wewe vyizigiro vyanje, ni wewe bgihisho bganje, ni wewe mukiza wanje ukiza umutima wanje.

Erega ngaha mwâ€™ibohero amajoro ni maremare, amosozi ni menshi, intuntu nâ€™umubabaro ntibituma nsinzira, ariko ndumva ijwi ryawe ryiyoroheje kandi ryumvikana neza rinyongorera yuko unkunda, rirampumuriza rikampanagura amosozi.

Abantu bacira urubanza kahise kanje ariko weho usuzuma umutiwa wanje, ingene ntera imbere kandi nahindutse nkaba mfise intango nshasha.

Murâ€™iri bohero nahasanze ubuntu bgawe bganteye ivyizigiro. Ndakwihaye wese Mwami nyakira, ntiwemere yuko nsubira kurwa mu vyaha.

Ubuntu bgawe busumvya uburemere ivyaha nakoze muri kahise kanje. Yesu uri Umukiza wanje nâ€™ivyizigiro vyanje.â€

Hanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana muremeshe umuntu wese ari mu bigeragezo, muremeshe abapfunzwe, muremeshe abahunze, muremeshe nâ€™umutu wese ari mu ntambara zitandukanye, mubabarire yuko ugutabarwa gushitse. Murâ€™ibi bihe, twese tugume mu masengesho kuko ugutabarwa kuraje mwâ€™izina rya Yesu Kristo, Amen!

title: 4/5 vyâ€™Abarundi bafashwe nâ€™ingwara zo muÂ mutwe.
content:
Mu gihugu câ€™Uburundi zitegerezwa guhindura imirisho canke igihugu gicike akaburi kâ€™abarwaye mu mutwe.

Mu 2022 ibiharuro vyakozwe nâ€™ikigo kijejwe ivyigwa nâ€™ibiharuro mu Burundi (ISTEBU) cashikirije yuko ibice birenga 53% vyâ€™abarundi bagendana ubumuga bgo mu mutwe (maladies mentales). Kubera yuko ubumuga bgo mu mutwe butandukanye nâ€™ubgo mu mubiri aho umuntu acumbagira, atarya canke ngo avuge, benshi ntibazi yuko ingwara zo mu mutwe zigisibije. Ariko murazi ivyaciye mu gihugu nâ€™ibiriko biraba ubu. Abantu batari abahinga canke abavuzi bâ€™ingwara zo mu mutwe na cane cane abatanezwe ineza yâ€™abantu bivugira ngo ivyo bitigiri sivyo kuko biteye isoni.

Izina YESU riva mu rurimi rwâ€™igiheburayo YESHUA rivuye mwâ€™itsitso [ y-Å¡-Ê•] (Igiheburayo: ×™×©×¢), ijambo risigura Â«Â gutabara; kubohoraÂ Â». Izina KRISTO ryamuka mwâ€™izina ryâ€™Igiheburayo MESIYA, risigura Â«Â Uwasizwe amavutaÂ Â». Ubu rero ndibaza yuko batahuye igituma KRISTO na MESIYA ari irivuga rimwe rivuzwe mu ndimi zibiri zidasa mugabo ryabaye izina ryâ€™icubahiro kubera ico nico risigura â€œUwasizwe amavutaâ€.

AMAMO Nâ€™AMAMUKO Yâ€™IZINA â€œEMANUWELIâ€

Izina EMANUWELI riva mwâ€™ijambo ryâ€™ikigiriki [immanu], risigura Â«Â kumwe natweÂ Â», hanyuma [â€˜el], risigura Â«Â IMANAÂ Â». Iryo zina uko ryandikwa nâ€™uko risomwa ryavuye mwâ€™ijambo ryâ€™Igiheburayo [IMMANUEL] ritangurwa nâ€™urudome Â«Â IÂ Â» ariko mu Kigiriki ryandikwa kandi rigasomwa â€œEmmanouelâ€ ni urudome Â«Â EÂ Â». Muri Bibiliya, mwâ€™isezerano rya kera, iryo zina riboneka muri [Yesaya 7:14, 8:8, na 8:10]. Mwâ€™isezerano rishasha, riboneka muri [Matayo 1:23].

Nkâ€™uko tubibonye mu mamo nâ€™amamuko yâ€™amazina YESU, KRISTO, IMMANUWELI, insiguro yâ€™ayo mazina aratandukanye ariko KRISTO na MESSIYA ni ijambo rimwe rivuzwe mu ndimi zitandukanye mugabo risigura â€œUWATORANIJWE, UWAROBANUWEâ€ canke â€œUWASIZWE AMAVUTAâ€. title: Ibiciro mu gihugu câ€™Uburundi vyabayeÂ umurengera.

title: Igitabu: Â«Â INTAMBARA YO MU MAYIRABIRIÂ Â»

Uwutabizi nti yotahura yuko ubutindi butera ingwara zidakira, bukica abantu iminsi yabo itaragera.Mu mayirabiri wohabarirwa nâ€™uwaharaye, aho uwuvuga ukuri bamunywesha ibirohe babanje kumugereka inteba. Ni naho usanga abasenga nâ€™abadasenga bose bahurira mu barozi, abapfumu nâ€™imizimu, bakava mu bitabo baja mu masengero; ibirwanishwa vyacuriwe kubarwanira bikabarwanya. Abahagamye mu mayirabiri biha amenyo yâ€™abatwenzi kuko niba ntibabarirwa, ukuri bakwita ikinyoma, umwijima ukawitiranya nâ€™umuco, ntibamenye iyo baja nâ€™iyo bavuye; bakemeranya nâ€™ivyarivyo vyose. Ivyo bituma abana bâ€™iryo hanga basanzarira mu mabohero no mu mahanga kandi aribo bari guteza imbere igihugu cabo.â€œIntambara yo mu mayirabiriâ€ ni igitabu cunganira ibindi, kirimwo ubutumwa butuvyurira gutonda urugamba no kurutsinda. title: Igihugu gihanzwe na vyinshi mugabo nâ€™abana barageramiweÂ cane.
content:
Mu gihugu câ€™Uburundi bisigaye bigoye kumenya urutonde rwâ€™ukuri kuko ibintu vyose ni ugusigiririza. Mugihe hariko haraba inama yâ€™indongozi zâ€™abakenyezi bavuye kwâ€™isi yose bavuga ivyerekeye kubungabunga abana, mu gihugu cacu uwo munsi nyenye hariho abana berekanwe bishwe batwawe nâ€™umuvo wâ€™amazi nâ€™uwundi yatewe umusumari mu bgonko na mukase. Hariho abafata ibintu nkâ€™ivyo nkâ€™impanuka zisanzwe mugabo siko biri nâ€™ibimenyetso vyâ€™ingene ihanga ryacu ritunganijwe nabi. Ikintu cose categerezwa gutunganywa ku neza yâ€™ababa mu gihugu uhereye ku gukingira Abana kuko nibgo Burundi. Niwo mutahe igihugu gifise ariko bisa nâ€™uko atariko inzego zâ€™igihugu zibibona.

Tutanze akarorero kâ€™ingene Abarundi atakindi babona atari ukuvuguruza ukuri ku buryo ikintu cose bama barondera gukingira uwavuze canke uwakoze ikintu kibi muri ya ngwara yo gushigikirana, umwe yagize at:â€

Umukuru wigihugu hagufata ingingo yoguhasha abambuzi nabafise umugambi mubi kugihugu we aja kuganya cokimwe numwenegihugu nawe amuganyira yiteze inyishu kuriwe? Uyo ni umukuru wigihugu nyabaki? Nimba Atari abahanuzi biwe babi bamusuka kumbure nabo bafatanije nabonyene agomba kwisuzuma kwisi ntagihugu kidahana kibaho. Uwundi aca amwishura ati: â€œ None kubwira abanyagihugu ibiriko biraba birabuza munyuma guhana? Ahubwo ni vyza caane kumenyesha abanyagihugu imvo nimbano yingorane zigihugu. Guhana navyo bigakurikira munyuma.â€

Igihe cose umwe agize ati iki ni kibi hama haboneka uwundi agira ati nta kibi kirimwo naho ibara riba ryaguye. Biribonekeza yuko umukuru wâ€™igihugu yama yidocera ubutungane, ubutunzi, indero, uburimyi, â€¦ aho gufata ingingo zo guhindura ibitagenda neza, bikaboneka yuko ibintu vyose ari ugusigiririza.

Kuvyerekeye abo bana batwarwa nâ€™imivo harakwiriye kwubakwa ibiraro bacako mbere hagashingwa nâ€™abajejwe kubajabutsa iyo imvura yaguye. Aba bama bicwa bagonzwe nâ€™amakinga, amapikipiki nâ€™imiduga, harakwiriye ingingo ruhasha zo gukingira abana mu mabarabara. Kuri abo bakubitwa, baricwa, bakomeretwa gushika aho baterwa imisumari mu mutwe co kimwe nâ€™abo bagurishwa, ni ikibazo co kwicarira kugira ngo imico nâ€™imigenzo binagurwe nâ€™inzego zijejwe gukingira abana zihabge agaciro. Udakongiye uduswi tukiri mu cari ntaco uzokworora. Uburundi bukwiriye kugira indongozi zifise imbono yâ€™igihugu mu buzima bgaco bgose muri kubu na kazoza.

title: Uhoraho agira ashitse isezerano ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi ubu naho hari indimi mbiÂ zibihakana.

Izo nkuru zituma hari imitima ihungabana kubera ishari nâ€™inzigo, kamere nâ€™amarangamutima ya bamwe. Nico gituma hari umugabo umugabo yajanywe ari impunzi mu gihugu Ã§a Amerika yigira umuhinga ku masezerano Imana yahaye igihugu câ€™Uburundi, hamwe akavuga ngo â€œAmasezerano agashika buzoba ari ubgoya bumeze mu kiganzaâ€, ahandi agahindura ngo â€œAmasezerano ntazoshika kurâ€™uru runganwe, azoshika kubana babo.â€ Ariko aranigana nâ€™Imana arwanya ijambo ryayo. Uyo bamwita gihoganya kuko ntazi ivyo avuga canke afise uwamutumye kubuza abantu kwitegurira urubanza rwâ€™icubahiro Imana yabateguriye. Hariho nâ€™abandi biyimika bakigira Abami nâ€™abaherezi bâ€™Uburundi bgâ€™Isezerano. Nâ€™abo ntibagire uwo basamaza kuko usanga bakubagurwa nâ€™impwemu zihumanye. content:
Tumaze imyaka ishika 10 tuvuga ivyerekeye amasezerano yâ€™igihugu câ€™Uburundi yuko Abarundi arâ€™igihugu catoranijwe nâ€™Uhoraho Imana. Abantu benshi ntibagomba kuvyumva bakabirwanya abandi bakibaza yuko vyoba arivyo bakaba ba ntirumveko.

Abu ntituvuga yuko Imana izoshitsa amasezerano, tuvuga yuko iyashikije. Ishitwa ryâ€™ico Uhoraho Imana yashinze ntiriza ryoroshe kuko irahungabanya inzego nâ€™urutonde vyashinzwe nâ€™abantu ikazana urutonde rwayo. Ikindi abantu basanga kibagora bigatoma urutonde rwâ€™Imana ruza rugoye nâ€™uko mu gushitsa ivyo yasezeranye ikoresha ivyo yaremye (la nature) abantu bagashikirwa nâ€™ivyago gushika aho bibura aho bari. Ikigeretseko, nâ€™uko muguhana abantu ibateza gusubiranamwo canke ikabareza abansi babo. Ibi abantu bakwiriye kubizirikana cane.

Ikintu cerekana yuko Uhoraho Imana agira akore ibintu bihambaye, usanga abana batibabgaho. Dufatiye akarorero muri Bibiliya, Igihe ca Nowa, umwuzure igira ube, ivyerekeye abana ntibivugwa. Abisirayeliyi bambutse bavuye muri Egiputa, abana uko babaho ntibivugwa, mbere no mu ntambara ihanga ryarwana ntibavugwa. Igihe ca Sodoma na Gomora, ivyerekeye abana ntibivugwa. Igihe ca Ananiya na Safira ivyerekeye abana babo ntibivugwa. Ariko Imana iritaho abana bato kuko Yesu Kristo yavuze ati ni mureke abana bato bandange kuko abameze gutyo aribo bazoragwa ubgami bgâ€™ijuru. [Luka 18:16]

Igituma leta yâ€™Uburundi iburiwe nâ€™Ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi muri rusangi, nâ€™uko ikibazo câ€™abana cibagiranye kandi giteye ikigongwe. Hari umwigisha ariko araganyira abavyeyi yuko yigisha ishure ririmwo abana 190, bicara hasi, batagira utuzu twa sugumwe, batagira amazi, batagira nâ€™amakaye. Murabajijwe: Iryo nâ€™ishure nyabaki? Nâ€™iryo mu gihugu citwa ngwâ€™iki?

Hariho abana benshi bâ€™Uburundi batwawe mu mahanga, abagurishijwe nâ€™abijanye gukoreshwa uburetwa, iryo ni ihanga ryitwa ngwâ€™iki? Riyobowe na bande?

Ayo mafoto ngaho nâ€™ayo abana bataja kwiga bakaguma mwâ€™ibarabara, ayo abana batwawe i Kongo batabgayo, ayo abana bafatiwe i Kobero batwawe Uganda, iyo umwana yatowe muri Rohero hari nâ€™abandi benshi birirwa baraburirwa irengero. Ikibazo câ€™abana caribagiranywe nko muri vya bihe muriyubare.

content:
Â« Ni mwigishe abana banyu bikuru bikuru vyabaye muri kahise kâ€™ihanga ryacuÂ». (Les grands Ã©vÃ©nements de lâ€™histoire du Burundi- Great events in Burundiâ€™s history).Mu mwaka wa1981, Imana yatanze imburi kabiri mu myanya itandukanye ivuga ko abana bacu bavukiye hanze mu bihugu twahungiyemwo ishaka ko biga bakamenya kahise kâ€™ihanga ryacu. Ivyakurikiye nâ€™uko Imana yampagurukije, ikanshoboza kwandika igitabu kwâ€™ihanga ryâ€™Uburundi guhera ku ntango gushika mu mwaka 2003. Imana yavugiye mu muntu akiri muto yagiye kwiga mu bgongereza, agaca akora akazi andungikira 500,000 vyâ€™amashilingi hamwe nâ€™isimu ntoya. Abandi bantu bo mwâ€™ihanga ryacu bari i Tanzania, baciye batanga imisoro, haraboneka 1.500. 000 yâ€™amashilingi yari akenewe gucapisha ico gitabo muri Â«Â Inter Press of Tanzania, the best printing press in the whole of TanzaniaÂ Â».Ikibabaje nâ€™uko urwaruka rwacu rwavukiye hanze, rukiga amashule ya kaminuza, rukaronka akazi keza, ata kahise kâ€™Uburundi rushaka kumenya, rubona ko rwashitse rutagikeneye kumenya kahise kâ€™Uburundi kuko ngo rwashitse. Ariko uko biri kose, Imana iza yaravuze ko igihe co guhunguka gishitse, abo yashizeko ikimenyetso co guhunguka kugira ngo bagende kuba mu gihugu cacu no kucubaka, ata nâ€™umwe azoshobora kwinyegeza kuko tuzohungurwa nâ€™umumalayika. Abandi nabo badakwiriye guhunguka kubera ingeso zabo mbi cane, bakaba barabaye intagondwa ko bazorimburwa nâ€™uyo mumalayika mu bihugu vyose twahungiyemwo kugeza aho isi yose izohinda agashitsi cane kuko bazomenya ko turi abantu badasanzwe. Abarundi turi ubwoko, turi ihanga ryatoranijwe nâ€™Imana Nzima iganza amahanga yose yo kwâ€™isi. Uwo wese azorwanya reta nshasha uwarobanuwe nâ€™Imana agomba gushinga, uwo ntazohunguka azorandurwa ave kwâ€™isi kuko Imana ishaka ko reta nsha izotwara mu mahoro, urukundo, ubumwe nâ€™umutekano bitigeze biba mu Burundi kuva bubayeho kandi Imana izosuka imigisha myinshi cane mu Burundi bgose. Imana izotuma abanyagihugu bose batunga cane vuba na vuba, ihanga ryose ritera imbere, ribe ihanga rifise ubutunzi bukomeye cane nâ€™amahera afise igiciro mwâ€™isi yose. Hamwe nâ€™ivyo abanyagihugu bose tuzohindurwa basha kuko Imana izodukuramwo imitima igumye nkâ€™ibuye, iduteremwo imitima yoroshe cane nkâ€™inyama. Imana izotwuzuza Mpwemu wayo aturongore mu nzira zâ€™ubugororotsi. Yatugize ihanga rizotwara umuco mwâ€™isi yose gushika ku kugaruka kwa Yesu Kristo aje kujana Ishengero ryiwe mwâ€™ijuru. Uko niko Imana yavuze mu myaka yarenganye na niko bigiye kuba.

title: Akagohe ku bahanuziÂ bâ€™Abarundi
content:
IVYO UHORAHO IMANA YASEZERANYE BISHITSWA Nâ€™ABO YATORANIJE BAGENDERA MU RUTONDE Nâ€™UBURONGOZI BGA MPWEMU YERA.â€œImburi nâ€™ubuhanuzi, ubuvugishwa nâ€™inyereko si amajambo yâ€™indoto zâ€™abantu ziherera mu kurotora gusa mugabo ni ijambo Uhoraho Imana ahishura kandi agafasha abo yatoranije kurishitsa. Abantu birinde kuvuga amajambo atagira ubgenge nâ€™ibikorwaâ€Imana aho yatoranya ihanga rya isirayeli, yarihaye abarongozi maze ariha nâ€™urutonde rirahaguruka riragenda ryambuka ikiyaga gitukura, rica mu bugaragwa, ryambuka Yorodani, inzitiro zâ€™i Yeriko zirasenyuka ririnjira rirarwana. Abapfa barapfuye, abakomereka barakomeretse habaho nâ€™impfuvyi nâ€™abapfakazi. No mu zindi ntambara zakurikiye, ibisagara vyaratse umuriro nâ€™umwotsi nâ€™inkungugu biratumuka. Izo ntambara zarwanwa nâ€™ihanga ryose rya isirayeli ata nâ€™umwe avuyemwo kuko ingabo zaja imbere abandi bagakurikira. Nâ€™uyu munsi, iyo igihugu ca Isirayeli cinjiye mu ntambara, abahungu nâ€™abakobga bose baratororokana bakava iyo baroye, bagaheba nâ€™ivyo barimwo vyose kugira ngo baje kurwanira igihugu cabo.Uyu munsi mu Burundi, mu bavugishwa dufise harimwo bamwe indoto nâ€™ivyipfuzo vyabo gusa bakibagira yuko Uhoraho Imana adahinduka canke ngo ahindure ijambo ryiwe. Abandi nabo barahanahana ubgo buhanuzi bakaburyoherererwa maze bigaherera ngaho. Ubgo buhanuzi bganyu ku mbuga muba mubuhaye bande ngo bakore iki? Mu bisanzwe, Imana itanga uguhishurirwa nâ€™intumbero ikayiha abavugishwa kugira ngo (1) Bahamagarire abantu ukwihana nâ€™ukwezwa; (2) Bagire ihishurirwa kwâ€™ijambo ryâ€™Imana kandi baryigishe; (3) Baburire abantu ibigiye gushika no kuvyitegurira; (4) Bashingire intahe Umwami nâ€™Umukiza Yesu Kristo; (5) Babere akarorero keza mu mvugo no mu bikorwa ababa mu gihugu. Umuntu muzokwumva yiyita umuhanuzi adakwije izo ngingo zitanu muze mumugireko amakenga. [Amosi 3:7, 2 Ingoma 24:19, Abanyefeso 4:11-12]Imana ivuze iba igomba yuko muhaguruka mugakora. Iyo yaguhaye isezerano urarikorera ukariteramira atari mu kuvuga ivyipfuzo vyawe gusa kuko ntawutegeka Imana, mugabo mu gukora ico yagutumye gukora. Ntushobora kwigumira muri Egiputa hanyuma ngo yibaze yuko kubera isengesho ryiwe gusa ashika i Kanani. Abo ni nka babandi babona ibitagenda mu gihugu bakaguma bidoga gusa. Iyo ubona ibitagenda neza aho uherereye urapfukama ugasiguza Imana, ugaheza ugahabga ikibereye ukwiriye gukora kugira ngo ibintu bigende neza. Imana ivuze, utegerezwa kubaduka ukerekeza ku kiyaga, Farawo akagukurikira, ukiroha mu kiyaga nkâ€™uko yabikubariye ukajabuka hakurya kugira ngo Farawo nâ€™ingabo ziwe bahonere aho wakiriye. Utegerezwa guca mu bugaragwa ukahasonzera kandi ukahanyoterererwa kugira ngo uboneugutabarwa nâ€™Imana. Kandi wambutse Yorodani, nta bakunzi uhasanga

ngo bakwakire, bakugaburire canke bagukande umuruho wo mu bugaragwa. Haba namba, ahubgo ushikira kurwana nâ€™ibigatanya kugira ngo wegukire igihugu gitemba amata nâ€™ubuki. Ico nico abavugishwa ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi batazi. Bameze nka za nyigisho zâ€™ububeshi bgâ€™imigisha abanyamadini bakwiragiza ngo Â« Cakira viza, cakira inzu, cakira imodoka, cakira inzahabu, cakira abagore nâ€™abagabo bâ€™abandi, cakira ibihugu vyâ€™abandi, â€¦ uwuraho nawe yisinziririye mwâ€™itiro ryâ€™urupfu, ngo: Ndakiriye!Â» Abahendesha abantu ibintu nkâ€™ivyo ni nkâ€™ibicu bikubebga nâ€™umuyaga [Abanyefeso 4:14, Zaburi 35:5, 2 Petero 2:17]Uhoraho Imana arakora ibitangaza agahagurutsa abasore nâ€™inkumi, abagabo nâ€™abagore buzuye urukundo nâ€™ubutwari kugira barwanira igihugu cabo kandi ikabaha inkomezi, ikanabafasha kurwanya umwansi bagatabara igihugu bakagikiza amakuba.Murâ€™iyo ntambara, Uhoraho Imana arashobora kurungika izindi ingabo mutazi zâ€™abamalayika zirongowe na Malayika mukuru Mikaheli zikaza gufasha ingabo zâ€™ubgoko bgâ€™Imana bagakora ku buryo bga ba Ruburakigongwe. Ivyo turabisanga mu bihe vya kera no murâ€™ibi bihe. Intambara irangiye, Imana ishikiriza igihugu abo yagitoranirije maze abo bamalayika bakisubirira mwâ€™ijuru. Abatoranijwe bashikirizwa igihugu kugira ngo bagitunganirize abariho nâ€™abazovuka ku buryo atanzara, atabukene, atakarenganyo no gusenga ibigirwamana, ubupfumu, uguhamagara imizimu nâ€™uburozi biharangwa. Abo, iyo baciye kubiri nâ€™ivyagezwe vyâ€™Imana, irabarungikira abansi babo bakabatera bagasambura iterambere ryose bagezeko, bakabica bakabangaza gushika bicujije bakihana Imana igasubira kubagirira imbabazi. Mubavuga ivyerekeye isezerano ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi, ku ruhande rumwe bamwe bigize abagwanya amaleta nâ€™imigambge, abandi bigira ababiburanira. Ku rundi ruhande, hariho abiyemeje kugwanya amadini nâ€™amashengero nâ€™abandi batazi urugamba barimwo bakivugira ibibajemwo vyose. Murâ€™abo, benshi barihenda bakabeshera Uhoraho Imana kubera kutabanza kwiga ngo batahure ivyo baba bumvise, babariwe canke beretswe, hari nâ€™aho bayibeshera kuko baba bashaka kuvuga ibintu bituma abantu babemera. Abo bose barabesha bagasuka abantu. Batwara ibintu ukutariko bakigisha abandi kuba ibinebge ntibitegurire gukorera igihugu Imana yabahaye:

title: Ubutegetsi bgâ€™igihugu câ€™Uburundi ni bgiteho umutekano wâ€™Abarundi bariÂ hanze.
content:
Abarundi 8 baramaze kugandagurwa mu kwezi kumwe muri Afrika yâ€™epfo !

Abarundi bari muri Afrika yâ€™epfo, canecane mu gice ca Capetown, ntiborohewe. Basigaye babayeho bariko barashira hamwe intererano zo guhamba bagenzi babo. Muri ino ndwi bashinguye batatu, mu ndwi yahera bari bashinguye babiri. Nâ€™imiburiburi Abarundi 8 barishwe mu kiringo câ€™ukwezi kumwe, hagati ya ntwarante na ndamukiza 2024. Hari abatubwiye ko abishwe bashobora kuba ari icenda muri ico ikiringo gusa. Abarundi barababajwe nâ€™agacerere kâ€™abategetsi bâ€™Uburundi be nâ€™abaserukira Uburundi muri Afrika yâ€™epfo.

Hano ku mafoto murabona abo tumaze kumenya :

Umurindi wâ€™igandagurwa ryâ€™Abarundi baba muri Afrika yâ€™epfo urateye ubwoba. Aba bose bari bagiye kurondera ubuzima, bari batunze imiryango mu Burundi. Leta yâ€™Uburundi ntikwiriye kwihoza aya magorwa yâ€™Abarundi. Ntikwiriye kuguma yinumiye.

title: Nicolas BIGIRIMANA na Lambert MUHIMPUNDU BAKWURUYEÂ KWIHANA
content:
Murâ€™iyi minsi hariko haribonekeza mu gihugu cacu ibimenyetso Uhoraho Imana yabuye kuva kera ikoresheje abahanuzi batandukanye, abantu biyadukiza bakigira ibi na biriya ntibatinye no guhindukiza ijambo ryâ€™Imana ryanditswe muri Bibiliya Yera. Â Ishengero rya Yesu Kristo Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana ryahamagariwe kuzigama ukuri kwâ€™ijambo ryâ€™Imana ntirishobora kwihanganira abahona kubera ubuzimire basukwamwo nâ€™abo bariko barakubagurwa nâ€™impwemu zihumanye biyitirira amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yahaye Ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi.

Mwarumvise umugabo yitwa Muhimpundu Lambert yiyimikiye kuba umwami nâ€™umuherezi, amategeko yâ€™igihugu akamuta mu mvuto. Uyo yabanje kuza kwabura ubuhanuzi Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana rihabga hanyuma atamaze kabiri anyererera mu bgibone. Yasutse abantu batari bake hanyuma mu kurogota kwiwe atangura kugenda arigisha abantu ngo: â€œKristo ni ikivume!â€ mu guca kubiri nâ€™ivyanditswe muri[1Abikorinto 12:3]. Abakurikiye inyigisho zâ€™umugararizo ziwe bamerewe nabi mu mabohero yo mu Rutana, Gitega, Ngozi na Bujumbura. Hadashize kabiri, uwundi nawe yanduye nya mpwemu yâ€™ubgibone ikubagura abantu banse gukizwa neza kugira ngo bashike ku musaraba wâ€™uwabambge agacungura abaremwe bose.

Uwo nawe ni Nicolas Bigirimana avuka mu ntara ya Gitega mugabo bakaba barimukiye mwâ€™Ishatanya ryo muri Komine KINYINYA mu ntara ya RUYIGI. Yaragize ivyago araraswa mu magume aca aja kuvurirwa mu gihugu ca Tanzaniya aho yahavuye aronkera amahirwe yo kujanwa gutura mu gihugu ca AUSTRALIYA. Ubu aba murâ€™ico gihugu muri Qweensland ahitwa Brisbane. Nti twotaye umwanya tuvuga ivyiwe kuko ntari ico yivugako ari ahubgo abamuzi bavuga yuko afise akagorane. Umuco wâ€™Imana ahâ€™uri ntunyegezwa. Dushimye kugira ico tumuvuzeko kugira ngo dukemure abantu bahendwa bagasahurwa utwabo canke bagasukwa mu rupfu kubera ubugunge bgâ€™ibikoresho vya satani. Hariho murâ€™abo biyita abakozi bâ€™Imana, abahanuzi nâ€™abasemerezi baribisha uruyeri, bagakora icaha co gufata abakenyezi ku nguvu hakaba nâ€™abafise akagwara ko mu mutwe bita (Narcistic Personalty disorder) twokwita â€œNshakagutazirwaâ€ gatuma bata abantu mu kaga bakoresheje ibinyoma.

Kwâ€™igenekerezo rya mbere Nzero uyu mwaka wâ€™i 2024, uwoNicolas Bigirimanayarubahutse kwifata amajwi arayanyanyagiza ku mihora ngurukanamajambo avuga yuko yiyimikiye kuba â€œUmwami wâ€™abamiâ€ nâ€™â€Umuherezi Mukuruâ€ akongerako nâ€™ayandi majambo yo kwigira utarabaho kwâ€™isi. Yagumye asubiramwo amarogotano yiwe mu majwi yifata kenshi na bugingo nâ€™uyu munsi.

Mu yandi majambo menshi uyoNikola Bigirimanaavuga yiyita Umwami nâ€™umuhanuzi, yerekana yuko atoragura ubuhanuzi buvugwa hirya no hino ku mbuga akabgiyitirira kandi bikamunanira kubujanisha nâ€™ijambo ryâ€™Imana kuko ata nâ€™iryo asoma ngo atahure.

Nikola Bigirimana, avuga yuko Imana yamuhaye amasezerano ya Adamu na Eva, Mose na Eliya, Dawidi na Salomo. Vuba azokwongerako nâ€™aya Mariya na Yozefu! Ivyâ€™avyuga nâ€™ikimenyetso cerekanako abamukunda bomwirukira kwa muganga kuko aguma anicurako bomugirira nabi bakoresheje amangetengete. Iyo atanguye kuvuga niho umuntu amenyera ico ari kuko aca anyererera mu vyiyumviro vyâ€™ibuzamyi no guhahamuka kubera ivyo yakorewe. Ntawoha agaciro ivyo avuga. Muzohore musuzumisha ijambo ryâ€™Imana impwemu zose ziserura nâ€™ibikorwa vyazo bizobabagaragariza.

Abo bagabo uko ari babiri ico bahuriyeko nâ€™uko bose basuka abantu bakabata mu kaga kandi bagacurika Ivyanditswe Vyera mu kwiyitirira amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yahaye ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi. Uwobahanura yobasaba kwakira Yesu Kristo kubabera Umwami nâ€™umukizwa wâ€™ubugingingo bgabo bagaca bihana ivyaha bagendana bakezwa.

Umwami Yesu Kristo Yamamare!

title: Inzira indwi zo gutabara no gukiza igihuguÂ câ€™Uburundi.
content: Ni igitabo kidonda ivyerekeye urutonde rwâ€™Uboraho Imana abantu benshi birengagiza. Abarongora igihugu canke ishengero baciye kubiri nâ€™urwo rutonde baba bakwegere akarambaraye abo barongoye. Iyo umurongozi arimwo impwemu mbi ababa mu gihugu nâ€™igihugu ubgaco kirakubagugwa nâ€™inzara, ubukene, akarenganyo nâ€™ibiza. Uwo muntu atabogojwe nâ€™intwari Imana iravyimorera igakoresha ibintu biteye ubgo nkâ€™ivyago cumi kandi abifatanije nawe mu caha bakahagwa. Ibikiza igihugu si imigambge, amoko, amasezerano yâ€™abantu, imigwi canke imfashanyo zitangwa nâ€™ibihugu vyo hanze. Igihugu gikizwa no kwubakira ku rutonde rwashinzwe nâ€™Imana. Ibikogwa biboneka atari amajambo nâ€™amanama niryo soko ryâ€™iterambere.Ababishoboye bogisoma kirimwo ingene twova mu ngorane zose twikwegera. Uyu mwanditsi avugamwo ivyerekeye urutonde Imana yashinze kuva ikirema isi muri rusangi mugabo ageze kuvyerekeye Uburundi agatomora neza ivyokorwa mu maguru masha kugira ngo Abarundi dutere imbere mu mibano, mu ndero, mu ntwaro, mu butunzi, mwâ€™iterambere, muvyo twemera, mu gutumatumanako, no mukwidagaduraâ€¦Indongozi zikoreye ku buhinga butangwa murâ€™iki gitabu twotera imbere tukarengana nâ€™ibindi bihugu. Igihugu gitezwa imbere nâ€™abahinga, incabgenge abanyengabire nâ€™abakunda igihugu bakorera mu kugororoka. Amasezerano ko ashitse umwe wese yitegurire gukorera muvyo Imana yamugeze [Zaburi 127:1-5]

title: Imburi ya nyuma: Ngaho ni mwihane mwezwe vya biheÂ birabashikiye.
content:
IHANE MWEZWE MWITEGURIRE INGAJI Yâ€™UHORAHO MU BURUNDI

Tumaze imyaka 35 twumvise ivyerekeye amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yahaye ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi. Dutangure kuyasengera haheze imyaka 25, Mpwemu Yera yaratubariye ivyiza biyarimwo, aca atubarira yuko arâ€™ayacu azoyadushitsako.Haheze imyaka 10 Umuremyi wâ€™isi nâ€™ijuru adutegetse kuyatangariza abantu bose adutuma yuko bokwihana bakezwa kugira ngo ntibazohitanwe nâ€™inkota ya malayika muranduzi.Twakwiragiye intara zose zâ€™igihugu câ€™Uburundi dushika no mu mpande zine zâ€™isi tumenyesha abantu bose ivyerekeye ayo masezerano tunabasaba kwihana no kwiyeza kugira ngo bazibonere ubgiza bgâ€™Imana. Uretse no kwishikira hose twaruguruye imihora yo gushikira bose turanabicisha no mu bitabo, ibinyamakuru nâ€™amaradiyo ku buryo ata murundi nâ€™umwe atayumvise. Imana yaranahagurukije abasemerezi bâ€™abarundi nâ€™abavugishwa mva makungu kugira ngo baburire Abarundi bose.Murâ€™iyo myaka 10 yo gusemerera twahuye na vyinshi. Baratwise abasazi, abagwanya amaleta, abazimiye nâ€™ayandi mazina yâ€™urwanko mugabo Uhoraho Imana yaraturemesheje ngo dushikame dushirâ€™amanga ari kumwe natwe. Abatwiganye bose bakagomba kwiyitirira umugabi wâ€™Imana, bamwe barapfunzwe abandi baricwa nâ€™ipfuhe ryâ€™ Imana. Hariho abumvise ivyiza vyâ€™ayo masezerano baca bariyimika, biyimikira ihanga Imana itabahaye kubera amarangamutima yabo. Abazwi muribo ni Dr KATIKATI Armand, MUHIMPUNDU Lambert na BIGIRIMANA Nicolas. Hariho abandi benshi tuzi bagenda barabundabunda bayovya abantu ngo nibo â€œDAWIDIâ€. Ivyo vyose vyerekana abantu bakubagugwa nâ€™impwemu zihumanye. Abantu bazomenya uwo Imana yatoranije umunsi yimye ingoma canke Uhoraho we nyene niwe amubahishuriye. Uwo muzokwumva yivuze ntimuhe agaciro. Abaciye mwâ€™Ihanga Ryera bagasezererwa kubera vyabananiye kwezwa bagenda bararivuga nabi kubera ishari nâ€™ubube gito ngo Imana yarivuyemwo. Umuntu wese nâ€™asenge yisigurize Imana mwime amatwi ibikoresho vya wa mubi. Dukomeze gusengera abantu bose bazimiye.Uyu mwaka, Uhoraho Imana yatubariye yuko igikorwa yadutumye kiri ku musozo yuko igira ishitse ivyo yasezeranye. None turiko turasemerera akanyuma ngo uwutarezwa yezwe kuko igihe kirakuze. Ntihagire ushira umutima ku muntu nâ€™umwe mugabo muwushire kuri Yesu Kristo wenyene, Amen!

title: Itangazo ryâ€™Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™ImanaÂ 777/2024
content:
Nkuko musanzwe mubizi Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana ni Ishengero rya Yesu Kristo  rikorera ku mugaragaro mu bihigu vyinshi vyo kwâ€™isi. Mu gihugu câ€™Uburundi rishinze imizi mu ntara zose zâ€™igihugu. Ahatari urusengero hari ibicaniro kandi niko bimeze no mu bindi bihugu vyo mu mahanga.

Hari ibicaniro mu bihugu vya Afrika , Amerika, Aziya, Canada, Ubulaya nâ€™igihugu ca Australiya. Mu masengero no ku bicaniro ni mukomeze kwigishna kwihana neza, ukwezwa no gusenga.

Ahariho hose kwâ€™isi, hariyo abo twabatije kandi tugomba yuko baramiriza mu gakiza. Uwo muzobona avuga canke ingendo yiwe idahuye nâ€™iyâ€™Abera muze mwihute mubitumenyeshe kugira ngo tubasengere kandi tubakanure. Twandikire kurâ€™izo nomero zâ€™abarongozi. Murakoze!

title: Uturanga 18 twâ€™abamalayika bâ€™Imana
content:
UTURANGA Â 18 TWâ€™ABAMARAYIKA

Duherutse kubabarira amazina yâ€™abamarayika bakuru nâ€™ivyo bajejwe gukorera abantu batumwe nâ€™Uhoraho Imana. Ubu naho reka tubabarire ibintu 18 Bibiliya ivuga ku mu marayika ukwiriye kumenya kugira ngo wirinde gukora ikosa ni mwahura kuko bagiye kuza baraboneka cane murâ€™ibi bihe. Abamarayika bafise ikibanza abantu badakunda gutahura muri Bibiliya kandi banditswe incuro 300 uhereye mwâ€™itanguriro gushika mu Vyahishuriwe Yohana. Baboneka nkâ€™abatumwa, abadukingira, abaturwanira nâ€™abama batazira Uhoraho Imana.

Abamarayika bavugwa nkâ€™abera, ibiremwa biteye igomwe vyâ€™umuco, bakorera umugambi wâ€™ukugororoka kwâ€™Imana. Ivyanditswe vyerekana yuko kubona umumarayika bidasanzwe kuko bishobora gutera ubgoba nâ€™ukujugumira[Matayo 28:2-4, Abacamanza 6:22].Bivugwa yuko basa nâ€™akabengebenge kitwa tarushishi, mu maso hasa nâ€™umuravyo nâ€™imuri zâ€™umuriro, amaboko nâ€™ibirenge vyiwe bisa nâ€™umuringa wâ€™umwakaka, kandi ijwi ryâ€™amajambo rimeze nkâ€™iryâ€™ishengero ryâ€™abantu[Daniyeli 10:6].

Bibiliya itubarira yuko Uhoraho Imana yaremye igitigiri câ€™abamarayika kidaharurika kuko kirengeye ivyiyumviro vyâ€™abana bâ€™abantu. Ubusumbasumbane bgabo buvugwa yuko ari amasinzi yâ€™ingabo zizengurutse intebe yâ€™inganji yâ€™Imana. Ibiharuro vyabo bikaba imiliyaridi nâ€™izindi nâ€™ibihumbi nâ€™ibihumbagiza[Abaheburayo 12:22, ivyahishuriwe Yohana 5:11].

Abamarayika baboneka muri Bibiliya nkâ€™intumwa zâ€™Imana, zitanga ubutumwa budasanzwe bgo kuyobora abantu[Luka 1:26-38, Itanguriro 16:7-11].Mu rurimi rwâ€™ikigiriki, ijambo Marayika risigura umutumwa. Batwara intumbero yâ€™Imana kandi bagashikiriza amabgirizwa yayo.

Mwâ€™ijuru, abamarayika baguma bahimbaza kandi batazira Uhoraho Imana. Bazengurutse intebe yâ€™inganji yâ€™Uhoraho Imana baririmba indirimbo zâ€™amashimwe.[Ivyahishuriwe Yohana 5:11-12, Yesaya 6:3].Baguma baha icubahiro Uhoraho Imana berekana ubutware nâ€™ukugororoka kwiwe.

Hari igihe abamarayika bahabga amabanga nâ€™Uhoraho Imana yo gukingira no gutabara Abera bâ€™Imana kugira ngo ntibahure nâ€™akabi[Zaburi 91:11-12, Daniyeli 6:22].Bashobora guseruka ku buryo buboneka mu gutabara, bagakingira kandi bagatanga intumbero ku bizera mu buryo butangaje.

Hari ibihe abamarayika bashira mu ngiro imanza zâ€™Uhoraho Imana ku banyakibi no kubanyavyaha banse kwâ€™ihana[Itanguriro 19:1-29, 2 Abami 19:35].Murâ€™ico gihe baba ibikoresho vyo guhana canke gusambura mu kwubahiriza amategeko yâ€™Imana ku banyavyaha nâ€™abagumutsi.

Naho abamarayika bafise ububasha kandi bejejwe, sâ€™abo gusengwa. Ugusengwa nâ€™ukwo Uhoraho Imana wenyene.[Ivyahishuriwe Yohana 22:8-9, Abikolosayi 2:18].Nâ€™iyo hagize uwugerageza kubasenga, bo nyene baramwiburiza bati usenge Uhoraho Imana wenyene, nayo jewe ndâ€™umusavyi wâ€™Imana nkawe. Iyo umuntu apfuye ntacika umumarayika, ni ikinyoma.

Bibiliya iratwereka yuko hariho ubutandukane hagati yâ€™ubgoko bgâ€™abamarayika bujana nâ€™amabanga bajejwe nkâ€™abamarayika bakuru nâ€™abakerubi[Yuda 1:9, Ezekiyeli 10:1-22]. Bamwe baboneka bafise ubusumbasumbane nâ€™ibikorwa bajejwe mu mabanga atandukanye yâ€™ijuru.

Abamarayika ntibafise ubumenyi bgâ€™ibintu vyose nkâ€™Uhoraho Imana. Hariho nâ€™ibintu usanga batazi[Matayo 24:36, 1 Petero 1:12].Ubumenyi nâ€™ugutahura kwabo naho bazi vyinshi cane, kurafise aho Uhoraho Imana yakugarukirije.

Ivyanditswe vyinshi birerekana yuko abamarayika bakora nkâ€™abarinzi canke abategeka amahanga. Baguma bayobora abantu muvyo bakora nkâ€™uko babitumwe nâ€™Uhoraho Imana[Daniyeli 10:13-21, 12:1].

Mwâ€™ijuru, abamarayika baranezererwa abanyavyaha bihanye bagahindukirira Uhoraho Imana[Luke 15:10].Ugukizwa kwâ€™umuntu wese kuzana umunezero no kunezererwa mu ngabo zo mwâ€™ijuru nkâ€™uko Imana ivyipfuza.

Umwami Yesu Kristo yaravuze yuko abamarayika batarongorana canke ngo barondoke.[Matthew 22:30].Ni ibinyabugingo vyo mu mpwemu atabushobozi bgâ€™umubiri bgo kurongorana no kurondoka nkâ€™uko abantu bameze. Tuzogaruka kurâ€™iki dusigura [Itanguriro 6:1-4, na Yobu 1:6,2:1,38:7]kubiyumvirako bari abamarayika barongoye abantu.

Incuro nyinshi muri Bibiliya, abamarayika babonekeye abantu bafise ishusho yâ€™abantu nyene. Rimwe na rimwe, abantu ntibashobora kubamenya yuko basanzwe ari abamarayika.[Abaheburayo 13:2, Itanguriro 18:1-3].Bashobora gufata ishusho yâ€™umuntu kugira ngo bashobore kuyaga nâ€™umuntu bamuha ubutumwa bgâ€™ijuru.

Abamarayika bashobora kuba abagwanyi, abasirikare bagwanya inkomezi zâ€™ababi. Bagwana mu buryo bgâ€™umubiri no mu buryo bgâ€™impwemu.[Ivyahishuriwe Yohana 12:7-9, 2 Abami 19:35]. Iyo bari mu ntambara yâ€™impwemu barashobora no gushira mu ngiro urubanza rwâ€™Imana no gukingira Abera.

Abamarayika baboneka bariko baratanga ubuhanuzi bgâ€™Imana ku bantu. Nibo bavuga ibigiye gushika nâ€™umugambi wâ€™Imana.[Daniyeli 9:20-23, Zekariya 1:9]. Barashobora no gusigura inyereko bakanerekana uko umugambi wâ€™Imana uriko urashitswa.

Mu gihe gikenewe, abamarayika haraho barungikwa gufasha abantu canke kubahumuriza.[Abaheburayo 1:14, Ivyakozwe nâ€™Intumwa 12:5-11].Bashobora kwerekereza aba-Kristo no kubaremesha mu kibanza câ€™Imana.

Umumarayika ntashobora kuba mu bibanza vyinshi icarimwe nkâ€™uko Uhoraho Imana ameze.[Daniyeli 9:21-23].Naho bashobora kwiyunguruza ku buryo bgâ€™igitangaza kandi bagashika aho umuntu atiyumvira, aho bari haramenyekana.

Abamarayika ni ibiremwa vyâ€™Imana, si nkâ€™Uhoraho kuko bafise intango.[Abikolosayi 1:16, Nehemiya 9:6].Naho babayeho imbere yâ€™abantu, ni ibiremwa.

Wiyumvira yuko woba warabonye umumarayika? Twandikire tubiyage.

title: Abarundi mumenye ivyerekeye abamarayika bâ€™Imana kuko mugiye kubabona kenshi muÂ gihugu
content:
ABAMALAYIKA BAKOMEYE BAKORANA Nâ€™ABANTUHariho abamalayika bavugwa cane muri Bibiliya no mu bindi bitabo mugabo amadini nâ€™amashengero menshi abaziko ibintu bike cane. Abamalayika ni ivyaremwe biba mwâ€™ijuru. Bamwe baboneka bafise amababa abandi basa nkâ€™abantu nkatwe, baza kudufasha no kutwerekeza batumwe nâ€™Uhoraho Imana. Umwe wese muribo afise ico ajejwe nâ€™ibikorwa adukorera nkâ€™uko bafise nâ€™ivyo bakora mwâ€™ijuru. Abo batumwa bâ€™Imana ntitubategeka kandi ntitubasenga mugabo dushobora kuyaga nabo iyo batuganirije. Umuntu wese arakwiriye kumenya ivyerekeye abamalayika kuko hari nâ€™igihe Uhoraho Imana aza mwâ€™ishusho yâ€™umumalayika nkâ€™igihihe ca Aburahamu [Itanguriro 18:1-33], Hagayi [Itanguriro 16:7-11], Mose [Kuvayo 3:2], ikoraniro ryâ€™Abisirayeli [Abacamaza 1:2], Gidiyoni [Abacamanza 6:12] nâ€™abandi.UMUMALAYIKA MURINZI WAWEUmuntu wese akijijwe arafise Malayika murinzi wiwe ajejwe ku mukuza muvyo impwemu. Agendana nawe kugira ngo akurinde, agutumbereze mu nzira nziza kandi agufashe mu gakiza. Uwo mu malayika uhabga akorana nawe gusa akaba yuzuye urukundo nâ€™ukwihangana kandi akama hafi yawe. Ntaguhata canke ngo yisuke muvyo ubuzima bgawe kiretse umukundiye. Ariko iyo ugira wicwe igihe cawe co gutaha kitaragera, hari igihe yihutira kugukingira. Kenshi uri mu nzira wenyene uriko aratambuka hariho nâ€™igihe umwikanga ukaraba inyuma nkâ€™uko hari umuntu agukurikiye. [Ivyakozwe nâ€™Intumwa 12:15]MALAYIKA MUKURU AZRAELNi malayika wâ€™urupfu. Mu bisanzwe akora akazi ko gutandukanya umubiri nâ€™ubugingo. Niwe yakira abapfuye ako kanya mwâ€™iparadizo. Aravugwa cane mu vyanditswe vyera yuko ari malayika murimbuzi. Muri [2 Samweli 24:15-16] avugwa yuko ari Malayika ageseza abantu. Muri [2 Ingoma 21:15], uwo mu malayika wâ€™Uhoraho yabonywe na Dawidi ari hagati yâ€™ijuru nâ€™isi, abanguriye inkota abansi bâ€™Ihanga ryâ€™Imana. Muri [Yesaya 37:36] uwo mu malayika wâ€™Uhoraho yururutse mwâ€™ijoro yica abasirikare 185.000, abantu bavyutse mugitondo basanze ari imirambikango. Uwo niwe yakubise urushi Herodi aturika inyo [Ivyakozwe nâ€™intumwa 12:23], yishe Ananiya na Safira [Ivyakozwe nâ€™Intumwa 5:1-25] nâ€™abandi benshi kuko nâ€™uyu munsi arakora.UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU CHAMUELIzina ryiwe risobanura â€œUwubona Uhoraho Imana wenyeneâ€ Uwo niwe agushoboza gutsinda ibihe bigoye vyâ€™imibabaro, ibibabaza umutima kandi ni nawe agufasha kumenya umufasha wawe wo mu mubiri. Ni umumalayikawâ€™amahoro nâ€™urukundo, imbabazi nâ€™ituze. [Zaburi 23:1-6]Page2

UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU GABRIELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œImana niyo nkomezi zanjeâ€ Uwo azwi yuko ariwe yazaniye Mariya na Yozefu ubutumwa bgâ€™ivuka rya Yesu Kristo. Azwi nâ€™umumalayika mukuru azanira abantu ubutumwa bgâ€™ijuru kandi niwe atunganiriza ingo nâ€™imiryango. [Luka 1:26-38]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU HANIELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œUbuntu bgâ€™Imanaâ€. Uwo niwe akurikirana abantu mu buzima bgabo kugira ngo baroranirwe bagire amahoro mu buzima. Niwe atuma ukura mu ngabire yawe yo kubona kure. Bivugwa yuko ariwe afise impfunguzo zâ€™ibirimba vyâ€™ijuru. Ni nawe yatwaye Enoki na Eliya mwâ€™ijuru badaciye mu rupfu. [Itanguriro 5:24]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU JEREMIEL, JERAHAMEELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œImbabazi zâ€™Imanaâ€ Igihe wumva ufise ivyo wiyagiriza canke ugomba kugira intumbero nshasha niwe aza kugukorera. Ni umumalayika wâ€™umunezero nâ€™ubushobozi bgo kubabarira kandi niwe atanga inzozi nâ€™inyereko. [Yoweli 2:28-32]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU JOPHIELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œUbgiza bgâ€™Imanaâ€ Niwe aramira abantu mu bihe bigoye akanigiza kure ivyiyumviro bibi. Yitwa malayika wâ€™ubgenge nâ€™ukubonekerwa, akanitwa malayika wo mwâ€™ijuru ryâ€™indwi. Ni nawe yaje kwirukana Adamu na Eva mu murima wa Edeni kandi niwe yagarutse gufata umutima wa Yesu Kristo i Gitsemane agira ababazwe. [ Iyahishuriwe Yohana 2:3-4]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU MICHAELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œWa wundi asa nâ€™Imanaâ€ Azwi nkâ€™umurinzi nâ€™umurwana ntambara. Niwe yirukana ubgoba nâ€™ivyiyumviro bidutera kwiganyira mu buzima bgacu.Niumukuruwâ€™ingabozirwanamuMpwemunomumubiri. [Daniyeli10:21, Yuda 1:9]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU RAGUELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œUmugenzi wâ€™Imanaâ€ niwe asuzuma yuko umumalayika wese arangura amabanga yiwe neza. Araza akaguhanura ico wokora mu bihe bigoye uba uriko uracamwo. Ni umumalayika wâ€™ubutungane nâ€™ubusabane bgâ€™Imana nâ€™abantu. Umuravye uko avugwa ni Yesu Kristo. [Ivyahishuriwe yohana 1:4-8]MALAYIKA MUKURU RAPHAELPage3

Izina ryiwe risigura â€œImana irakizaâ€ Niwe atumwa kuzana ugukira kwâ€™abagwaye mu buryo bgâ€™ibitangaza. Niwe yahora aza ku kidengeri ci Betesida akazikurura amazi maze abayitayemwo bagakira. [Yohana 5:1-4]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU SANDALPHONIzina ryiwe risigura â€œumuvukanyiâ€ bakavuga yuko ameze nkâ€™ihasa rya Malayika Metatron (mu Malayika atahura cane ubuzima bgâ€™ababa mwâ€™isi nâ€™ingorane bagira kuko yarayibayemwo imbere yuko aja kuba mwâ€™ijuru. Ni umumalayika wâ€™inkomezi) kuko nawe akora igikorwa co gutwara amasengesho yâ€™abantu mwâ€™ijuru kugira ngo abadayimoni ntibayatangire. Niwe atwara nâ€™amasezerano abantu bagirira Uhoraho Imana akayashikana. Azwi kandi nkâ€™umumalayika wâ€™umuziki nâ€™indirimbo mwâ€™ijuru akaba ari nawe afasha abaririmbira Imana kwâ€™isi. Niwe avugwa mu nyereko zo muri [Zaburi 34:7]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU URIEL (ARIEL)Izina ryiwe risigura â€œUmuco wâ€™Imanaâ€ rikongera rigasigura â€œIntare yâ€™Imanaâ€. Niwe mu bihe bigoye, igihe umuntu atazi ico akwiriye gukora araza akakwigisha, akakwereka inzira, akanakwereka ingene ubisohokamwo. Bavuga yuko atunganiriza nâ€™ibikoko nâ€™ibindi vyaremwe nâ€™Imana vyose. Ni umumalayika wâ€™ubgenge, umuco nâ€™ukuri kwâ€™Imana. Niwe mu malayika bavuga yuko arinze nâ€™amarembo yâ€™ijuru. Hari nâ€™abibaza yuko yoba ari umwigeme. Nâ€™uyo yamuritse Intumwa Pawulo hanyuma akumva ijwi rya Yesu Kristo. [Ivyakozwe nâ€™intumwa 9:9, 22:6-11]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU ZADKIELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œUkugororoka kwâ€™Imanaâ€ Ni umumalayika afise ubushobozi budasanzwe. Niwe azwi nkâ€™umunyempuhwe nâ€™imbabazi kandi azana ihumure mu bihe bitoroshe. Niwe yasemereye abuza Aburahamu ngo ntatange umuhungu wiwe Isaka. [Itanguriro 22:1-19]Ni ivyingenzi gutahura ubushobozi, ububashanâ€™umugambi idufitiye mu kuturungikira abamalayika kubgo ubushobozi bga Mpwemu Yera. Abantu benshi baritiranya ibikorwa vyâ€™abamalayika nâ€™ivya Mpwemu wâ€™Imana. Abamalayika ni intumwa zâ€™Imana ziza gukora ibitangaje hano mu bantu ariko Mpwemu wâ€™Imana ni Uhoraho Imana, ni Yesu Kristo we nyene abana natwe mu buryo bga Mpwemu Yera.Woba wibaza yuko umaze kubona umumalayika canke umaze kwumva ijwi ryiwe? title: Imyaka 25 Imana itwemeje yuko isezerano ari iryacu nâ€™imyaka 10 tumazeÂ turyigisha.
content: MYAKA 25 IRARUMANYE UHORAHO ADUTUMYE GUTERAMIRA ISEZERANOBarundi Barundikazi, imyaka 25 iruzuye Uhoraho Imana aduhishuriye yuko isezerano yasezeraniye ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi ari iryacu nâ€™inzunganwe zizokurikira. Imyaka 10 nayo irarangiye Uhoraho adutumye kuryemanga, kuryigisha no kuritangariza abantu bose. Nkuko ihanga rya Isirayeli ryagendana nâ€™Uhoraho ari mu gicu, mu nkingi yâ€™umuriro nâ€™ahari isandugu yâ€™isezerano, uyu munsi twebge Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana tugendana nâ€™Uhoraho Imana mu kugera ikirenge muca Yesu Kristo nâ€™intumwa ziwe. Mpwemu Yera akaturongora mu kuvugana natwe.Kuva Uhoraho aduhishuriye yuko isezerano ari iryacu, akanadutuma kuritangariza bose, tuguma dutera akamo Abarundi nâ€™abanyamahanga bose ngo bihane, bezwe kugira ngo bashitsweko ivyo Uhoraho Imana yasezeranye. Mugukora ivyo twifashisha ukwandika ibitabo, ivugabutumwa, gutangaza imburi nâ€™ubuhanuzi ku maradiyo, ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, amashengero nâ€™ibicaniro, nâ€™umunwa ku wundi kugira ngo umugambi wâ€™Imana uranguke. [Matayo 10:32]Muri rusangi, Abarundi twatanguye kwumva yuko twatoranijwe nâ€™Uhoraho Imana ngo tube Ihanga Ryera mu mwaka wi 1935, aho umuvugabutumwa wâ€™umusuwedi yitwa URI yaje mu Burundi mu bikorwa vyâ€™aba misiyonari. Uwo muvugabutumwa yaseruye muri uwo mwaka yuko yeretswe umuco ukoroka uvuye mwâ€™ijuru ugakorokera mu gihugu câ€™Uburundi maze ugakwira isi yose. Muri Myandagaro mu mwaka 1968, mu gikorane ca Pentekoti cabereye i Mugara, habayemwo ubuvugishwa bwinshi buvuga yuko Abarundi ari ihanga ryatoranijwe nâ€™Imana nkâ€™uko na Isirayeli yari yaratoranijwe. Ubwo buvugishwa bgahamagarira abantu bose kwihana, kwiyeza no kwintunganya bakoresheje kwisonzesha no gusenga cane.Mu myaka yakurikiye ubwicanyi bgo mu 1972, impunzi iyo zahungiye zaciye zitangura gusenga cane kubera ibihe bigoye zarimwo gushika naho hatangura kwururuka ubuvugishwa. Isezerano ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi ritangura kuvugishwako hirya no hino muri Tanzaniya, Congo, nâ€™Urwanda. Nâ€™Abarundi basigaye mu gihugu bararose inzozi, barerekwa kandi baravugishwa ku vyerekeye umuvyuro nâ€™ikanguro bizotangurira mu Burundi hanyuma bigakwira isi yose.Kugira ngo Uhoraho Imana yerekane kandi yemeze umugambi wayo ku Barundi, yarakoresheje nâ€™abanyamahanga baturuka mu bihugu bibanyi mbere no mu bihugu vya kure nka bulaya na Amerika. Rehinard Bonnke yagize iyerekwa ku Burundi ati: Â«Â Mbonye umuriro ukoroka uvuye mwâ€™ijuru urandagata Uburundi bwose hanyuma uca ukwira isi yose.Â Â» Aho yavuga ubushobozi bwâ€™umuvyuro nâ€™ikanguro bwâ€™ururutse buva mwâ€™ijuru. Hari nâ€™abandi benshi beretswe ivyâ€™amasezerano ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi. Ayo masezerano rero agira ashike ku gihugu vuba ni muyitegurire, niko Mpwemu wâ€™Imana avuga hirya no hino, Amen!

title: Imana ntirobanura ku butoni: Iruzuza Mpwemu Yera abakora ivyo kugororokaÂ vyose.
content:
Â«Â Petero yanzika kuvuga, ati Nâ€™ukuri ni ho nkimenya yukw Imana itarobanura abantu ku butoni, ariko mu mahanga yose uyubaha, agakora ivyâ€™ ukugororoka, iramwemera.Â Â»[Ivyakozwe nâ€™intumwa 10:34-35]

Ico twomenya nâ€™uko Imana abantu bose irabemera nkâ€™abo yaremye, kuko irabazi. Ariko hari abo yemera ifatiye kubirenze ivyo, bitewe nâ€™ubucuti bafitanye nayo, kurya no mubuzima harâ€™abo twemera ko ari abagenzi bâ€™inkoramutima.

Kimwe mubintu vyerekana ko Imana yakwemeye, nâ€™uko iguha kuri Mpwemu wayo(Mpwemu Yera).Â«Â Ivyako.nâ€™intumwa 5:32,Yohana 14:15-16â€³.

Kubatizwa muri Mpwemu Yera rero ni ikimenyetso cerekana ko yakwemeye. Ico gihe uhabwa ubushobozi butuma witahura, bukagufasha guhinduka, gukora ivyâ€™ Imana ishaka.

Aha niho benshi vyankira,kuko bashaka gukora ivyâ€™ Imana ishaka atabushobozi bararonka.Ntivyokunda, bisa no kugomba gutwara imodoka inywa igitoro kandi atakirimwo.

Kugira umuntu aronke Mpwemu Yera rero, bitegwa nâ€™ikibanza yabihaye mumutima, Imana iri mwâ€™ ijuru ikabona koko ko uyo muntu abikeneye,yamaramaje kuyikurikira. Ico gihe ahabwa ubushobozi bwa Mpwemu Yera.

Kubona abigishwa bamaze imisi cumi basenga, barindiriye isezerano rya Mpwemu Yesu amaze gusibira mwâ€™ijuru ,nâ€™ikimenyetso câ€™uko umuntu akwiye kurondera Imana nâ€™umwete,kugira ngo ahabwe ubushobozi bwa Mpwemu Yera.

Sinobabesha, umuntu adafise ubwo bushobozi, ahinduka umunyedini,umuntu akora ivyâ€™ imagenzo,ivyo mubwenge, kandi nâ€™ivyâ€™ agakiza ntabinezerererwa.Kubera iki?:

Nâ€™uko no mugakiza naho hari intambara. Umuntu aba akeneye kuremeshwa nâ€™uwo Mpwemu.No kugira umuntu yemere kuzira ivyo yizera, bisaba gushobozwa.

Intumwa zimaze guhabwa Mpwemu,zarashize amanga, ziva aho zari zinyegeje zivugira Yesu zidatinya no gupfa. Aha nimugihe iyo atabushobozi dutinya ivyo batuvuga kubwa Yesu.

Umuntu yahawe Mpwemu atangura kubabazwa nâ€™abari muvyaha,kuko yumva muri we ko bazorimbuka,nibatahinduka,bikamusunikira kubabwira ubutumwa. Aha ni mugihe iyo atabushobozi umuntu yisanga akunda isi,ivyaha biyirimwo akumva ntaco bimubwiye.Ata Mpwemu yera, nâ€™ubukristo ntagisobanuro bwoba bufise.

Dukwiye kuronderana umwete guhabwa Mpwemu Yera,niwe azodushoboza gukora ivyâ€™Imana ishaka, tukarangiza ubuzima bwacu twakoze ico twaremewe.

title: Ukuri: Edeni yari hehe? Ubgato bga Nowa babutoyeÂ hehe?
content: IREMWA RYâ€™ISI Nâ€™ABANTU, UMURIMA WA EDENI Nâ€™UBGATO BGA NOWAAbahinga nâ€™abashakashatsi bo kwâ€™isi barashoboye guhuza urukurikirine rwivyabaye kwâ€™isi nkukobidondwa muri Bibiliya nâ€™urukurikirane rwâ€™ingene ubuhinga bgâ€™isi bgagiye buratera imbere nkâ€™uko kahise kavyerekana gushika uyu munsi. Nta kintu na kimwe cerekana yuko ivyanditswe muri Bibiliya vyoba atari ukuri canke bitabaye uko vyanditswe.Barashoboye kumenya imyaka ibintu vyose vyabereyeko kuva mu mwaka wi 2500 YKA (Yesu Kristo Ataravuka) aho abanyegiputa bavumbura ubuhinga bgo gukora impapuro (Papyrus) zokwandikako nâ€™irangi ryo kwandikisha bagaca bashiraho amasomero. Ni murâ€™ico gihe nyene bataguye gukoresha ibintu bikozwe mu vyuma. Mu buzima bgâ€™abantu bavugwa muri Bibiliya, abahinga bamenye igihe Aburahamu yavukiye mu mwaka wi 2166 (YKA), igihe yinjiriye muri Kanani mu 1091, ukuvuka kwa Isaka 2066 (YKA), ukuvuka kwa Yakobo na Isawo mu 2006 (YKA)kuduga gushika mu mwaka wa 95 (YKY= Yesu Kristo Yaravutse).Mu bahinga nâ€™abashakashatsi bâ€™ubumenyi bgo mwâ€™isi no mu vyanditse, nta nâ€™umwe yashoboye kumenya umwaka isi yaremewe, igihe umuntu yaremewe nâ€™igihe Nowa yabaziyeko ubgato. Ico abantu bose bazi nuko Mose yoba yavutse hagati yâ€™Umwaka wa 1304 na 1237 YKA, akandika igitabo câ€™ITANGURIRO hagati yâ€™imyaka ya 1450 na 1410 YKA. Ico gitabo nico cerekana (1) Iremwa ryâ€™isi [Itanguriro 1:1-2:3], (2) Ivyerekeye umurima wa Edeni, Adamu na Eva, Kayini na Abeli, nâ€™uruvyaro rwa Adamu [Itanguriro 2:4-5:32], (3) Ivyerekeye ubgato bga Nowa, Umwuzure, ingene abantu basubiye kwuzura isi nâ€™ivyerekeye umunara wi Babeli [Itanguriro 6:1-11:32].Nkâ€™uko vyanditse muri Bibiliya, biboneka yuko Edeni yahera haruguru mu kigobe ca Perse igashika hepfo muri Mezopotamiya aho inzuzi za Tigris (Pishoni, Gihoni na Hiddekeli) hamwe na Epfrate (Phirati) zisukira mu nyaja. [Itanguriro 2:8-14] Biraboneka kandi yuko Nowa yabaye ahahora Edeni. Abahinga nâ€™abashakashatsi basanze ubgato bga Nowa buri mu gihugu ca Turikiya ku musozi Ararate bakemeza yuko ivya Nowa vyabaye mu imyaka 5500 ni 3000 YKA mu gihe abashakashatsi bavuga yuko Igitabo câ€™Itanguriro kidonda ivyabaye hagati yâ€™imyaka 8000 na 6000 gushika mu 2000 YKA.Muri Bibiliya niho abaremwe bose bamenyera ingene isi yaremwe, aho Edeni yariri nâ€™uko ivyâ€™umwuzure wa Nowa vyagenze. Ubuhinga nâ€™ubushakashatsi buhambaye nabgo nyene buza bushingira intahe yuko ivyanditswe muri Bibiliya ari ukuri kwuzuye. Ivyo ntibibuza yuko habaho abantu bivugira ivyo bibaza canke kubera urukundo bakunda igihugu cabo bavuga yuko Edeni yari iwabo. Edeni yabaye muri Afrika canke ikaba i Bulaya nico kimwe, ico twomenya nâ€™uko twogororoka kugira ngo tuzoragwe ubuzima budashira muri Yesu Kristo.

title: Korera mu ngabire wahawe nta muruho uzogira mu kubahoÂ kwawe.
content:
KORESHA INGABIRE YAWE.

Â«Â Petero aramubarira atâ€™ Ifeza nâ€™izahabu nta vyo mfise, arikw ico mfise ndakiguha: mw izina rya Yesu Kristo Umunyanazareti, va hasi utambuke.Â Â»[Ivyakozwe nâ€™intumwa 3:6]

Aha yarâ€™umuntu amugaye yamenyereye asegerereza, abonye Petero na Yohana aca abashurakâ€™umutima yibaza ngo harâ€™ico bari bumuhe. Petero niko kumubwira ko atafeza nâ€™izahabu afise. Ariko aca akoresha ingabire yarâ€™asanganywe,aramukiza mwâ€™izina rya Yesu.

Mwâ€™ishengero rya Kristo, ingabire za Mpwemu zifise igikorwa gikomeye amafaranga atoshobora gukora. Nivyo,amafaranga acemura vyinshi, harimwo kugura ibikoresho biba bikenewe,â€¦, ariko burya ingabire nizo zituma ibintu biba vyiza kurusha.

Benshi biyumva ko bariko bakorera mungabire zabo arâ€™uko baririmba,bavugâ€™ubutumwa,baprotokola, ariko burya ingabire ziruzuye, zitagira abazikoreramwo.

Umuntu ashobora kuja gusengera ahantu batamuzi, agataha atanâ€™uwumuramukije ngo amubaze iyo yaje ava. Akahasengera nkâ€™ukwezi kurenga atawumumenye, kandi abakristo bâ€™abasangwa buzuye urusengero. Wibaze!

Harâ€™abobitangira insiguro ngo nâ€™uko haba hasengera benshi, ariko sivyo. Kuko abo benshi nibo bokwakirana igishika abo bake, bakabaza amakuru yabo. Ariko abatari bake umwe wese aba ababaye ivyiwe. Bituma umuntu mushasha aje kwakira kristo aba inyakamwe,akamenyana na pasitori nâ€™abandi bake, nabo batamufitiye umwanya uhagije kubwâ€™amabanga menshi baba bajejwe. Ntagitangaje rero ko atokomera mugakiza, kiretse aronse abamuboneye izuba yigirako,bamuganiriza bakanamukomeza.

Benedata, kwakira abashitsi nâ€™ingabire ikomeye. Sâ€™ukubakira ngâ€™ubazimane, ahubwo nâ€™ugutuma bumva ko bisanze. Kandi ivyo si ibango risaba ko uba warasengewe,nâ€™igikorwa câ€™uwariwe wese iyo ari kurusengero iwabo. Petero ati Â«Â ifeza nâ€™izahabu ntavyo mfise,ariko ico mfise ndakiguha,â€¦Â Â»

Natwe dukwiye gukoresha ivyo dufise Imana yaduhaye. Nimba yaraduhaye amafeza, nayo tuyakoreshe no mumurimo wayo. Nimba atamafeza dufise,dukoreshe ubundi buryo yaduhaye,ingabire zacu, inguvu zacu,ubwenge bwacuâ€¦

Ishengero rya Kristo ryorushiriza gukomera, mugihe abaribarizwamwo bose bakoresha ingabire Imana yabahaye, ntihabemwo ba sindabizwa.

Mukazi ka misi yose abantu bakorera muri leta canke mu mashirahamwe bama mu ndyane bamwe bagahanwa abandi bakirukanwa Kubera yuko badakorera mu ngabire zabo. Bamwe bize ivyo badakunda abandi baronkejwe akazi kugira ngo baronke uko babaho gusa mugabo ata ngabire babifisemwe. Ivyo vyama bibatera ibibazo iminsi yose. Iyo umuntu akora akazi akoresha ingabire yiwe, ntavunika, nta mategeko amuremera kandi nta muntu nâ€™umwe amuca imbere ngo amurushe kubikora neza iyo atari ingabire zisumbana. Umuntu wese nâ€™arabe igisata kirimwo ingabire ziwe abe arico akoreramwo, umuyangayanga akorera ku macuniro areke kwigira umuganga avura abantu mu bitaro. Amen!

title: Uwakoranye na satani yaribiye amabanga ahambaye abera:Â Soma
Mube ivyitegererezo vyiza aho mubaye mu gukorera Imana musengeraÂ amasezerano.
content:
Hana yabaye icitegererezo kandi yatanze akarorero keza.

Â«Â Maze Hana asenga Uhoraho afise intuntu, arira cane, asezerana isezerano, atâ€™ Ewe Uhoraho Nyenâ€™ ingabo, ni waraba umubabaro wanje incoreke yawe, ukanyibuka, ntunyibagire jewe incoreke yawe, ukantabaza umwana wâ€™umuhungu, nanje nzomuguha, Uhoraho, abe uwawe kuzorinda apfa, kandi nta rupfuhe ruzomugera ku mutwe.Â Â»[1 Samweli 1:10-11]

Uyu mupfasoni Hana ni umwe muturorero twiza turi muri bibiliya. Yaraciye mukigeragezo co kubura uruvyaro, kandi agisokamwo amahoro Imana imutabaye. Reka turabe bimwe muvyo twomwigirako mukigeragezo ciwe, twoshira mu bikorwa natwe mu bikomeye twocamwo ivyâ€™arivyo vyose:

1.Hana yarasenga:

Buri mwaka, yama yaduze aja mungoro yâ€™Uhoraho kumushikanira ikimazi. Ninaho yaje gutura isengesho asaba akana, Imana yumva ugusenga kwiwe, iramwishura.Abizera dukwiye kuba turi abantu basenga, uko vyoba bimeze kwose. Ntidukwiye kurambirwa canke kubireka, kuko Imana irishura amasengesho ititaye kugihe kihaciye.

2.Hana yarakorera Imana.

Yama yaduze buri mwaka kuyitangira ikimazi. Ninako mukigeragezo dukwiye guhora dukorera Imana, uko dushobojwe. Gukorera Imana kwacu ntikukagenwe nâ€™ibihe, ahubwo bikwiye guhinduka umuco wacu, twaba turi mubihe vyiza canke bibi,kuko Imana iguma arâ€™Imana.

3.Hana yarihangana:

Yarâ€™afise mukeba wiwe Penina, yahora amurya umutima kuko atavyara, ariko Penina we akaba yaravyara.

Benedata,ukwihangana kwâ€™umuntu kurageragezwa,uko yoba ari kwose. Imana iyâ€™iretse abantu bakatugerageza,dukwiye kwihangana gushika twishuwe. Abantu bafise igihe co kukugerageza,iyo wihanganye Imana irakora ibikwiye ikagukura mugasuzuguro.

3.Hana yagize inyifato nziza imbere yâ€™umukozi wâ€™Imana.

Umuherezi Eli yamubonye arira ijwi ridasohoka,aca yibaza ngo yaborewe,aranabimubwira, ariko Hana yamwishuye neza ati ndâ€™umuntu yabonye amahano;nariko ndasuka amajojwa yanje imbere yâ€™Uhoraho, ntavino nanyoye.1sam1:15.

Sivyiza rero kubona umukozi wâ€™Imana nabi nâ€™ubwo yoba atagutahuye mukibazo urimwo. Ukwiye kubimusobanurira nâ€™uburwaneza,ntazoreka kugugesha umugisha,niyo atowuguhesha,Imana yo izowuguha. Rero Hana niko yabigenje,ku wâ€™inyifato nziza imbere yâ€™umukozi wâ€™Imana Eli, yaciyâ€™ amuhesha umugisha,ati Ni wigire amahoro; Imana ya isirayeli iguhe ico wayisavye. Kandi niko vyagenze,bidatevye Hana yaciye yibungenga.

Hana yari gushobora kwidodombera Eli umukozi wâ€™Imana, ariko yahisemwo kugira inyifato nziza imbere yiwe.

Hari abantu bihanganira ikigeragezo,ariko bakihangana bagira inyifato itari nziza(bakidodomba,bakavuga nabi,â€¦), mbere no gukorera Imana abatabivuyemwo bakagabanukirwa cane. Ariko siko bikwiye kumera.

Dukwiye kwigira kuri Hana.Yarasenga,agakorera Imana,akihangana,kandi akagira inyifato nziza.Iyâ€™umukristo avyifashemwo nkâ€™uko, asohoka mukigeragezo ciwe afise intahe nziza mumutima wiwe, kandi aba afise nâ€™ivyo yosangiza abandi vyo kubafasha; ikirenzeko,kubwo gusenga kwiwe,abona Imana imwiyereka mukumuha inkomezi,nomukumukura muvyo yabona bisa nâ€™ibidashoboka.

title: Tube abantu bâ€™ubgenge aho turi hose tudatinya gukoraÂ ivyiza.
content:
TWAME DUKORA IVYIZA.

Â«Â Twame dukora ivyiza, ntiducobogore, kukw igihe ni cashika tuzokwimbura, ni tutarambirwa.Â Â»[Abâ€™i Galatiya 6:9]

Gukora ivyiza biri muvyo umuntu wese yahuye na Yesu ahamagariwe. Kandi ntibiba ngombwa ko yirirwa arabisunikirwamwo kuko Yesu ari mumutima niwe abimuha kuvyiyumvamwo.Nico gituma uwamenye Imana arushiriza kunezerwa vyuzuye iyo ariko ivyiza.

Nâ€™ubwo kwikunda biri muri kamere ya buri muntu wese, ariko sivyo bitanga umunezero,mugihe umuntu atitaho ivyâ€™abandi. Ahubwokugaragariza urukundo abandi nivyo bituma umuntu yiyumva neza kurusha .

Kandi buriya iyo umuntu akoze iciza aba abivye mwâ€™isi yâ€™impwemu, kandi akazokwimbura. Nico gituma bibiliya ivuga ko gutanga bizana umugisha, kuruta guhabwa.

Ariko rero, hari ababiba neza kurusha abandi. Nkâ€™akarorero,umwe ashobora gukoresha udufaranga twiwe ashigikira impfuvyi, uwundi akadukoresha asororera abandi ngo babe barishimisha. Bose baba basohoye uburyo bwabo,ariko hari uwuba yabivye neza kurusha uwundi. Kwishimisha si icaha bitewe nâ€™uburyo umuntu abikozemwo, ariko ivyo ntivyokora kumutima wâ€™Imana ngo bitume iguhesha umugisha,nkâ€™uwagiye kuraba impfuvyi, abarwaye,â€¦

Dukwiye kumenya aho tubiba nâ€™ingene tubiba. Cane cane tukama twibuka ko ari ivyo twahamagariwe.

Ikindi twomenya, nâ€™uko iyo ubivye udaca wimbura ako kanya nyene. Ahubwo bifata igihe,ukanabagarira ivyo wabivye,hanyuma ukazokwimbura.

Benedata, hagati yo kubiba no kwimbura,hakwiye kubaho kutarambirwa. Imana izohesha umugisha ibikorwa vyiza vyâ€™amaboko yawe, ariko izobikora igihe co kwimbura kigeze.

Igihe kizogera Imana ikoreshe amaboko yâ€™abandi mukuguha ivyiza, nkâ€™uko nawe yakoresheje ayawe muguhesha abandi ivyiza. Kandi iyo umuntu yimbura, asarura vyinshi ugereranije nâ€™ivyo yabivye.

Â«Â Twame dukora ivyiza rero, ntiducobogore, kuko igihe nicashika tuzokwimbura,nitutarambirwaÂ Â».

Muhezagirwe.
