title: Mugiranire imbabazi kugira ngo uronke ivyiza vyoÂ kubabariranira.
content:
IVYIZA VYO KUBABARIRA.

â€œUmunyakigongwe agirira neza umutima wiwe ubgiwe,Ariko ruburakigongwe agirira nabi umubiri wiwe ubgiwe.â€[Imigani 11:17]

Kenshi usanga umuntu agenda abihiwe mu mutima, kubera ivyo yakorewe, ugasanga ntiyatanze imbabazi (ikigongwe), kandi akumva birumvikana kuko yumva yahemukiwe cane.

Ariko dusomye ngo umunyakigongwe agirira neza umutima wiwe ubwiwe. Kubera iki?

Kubera ko kubabarira birabohora uwakosherejwe, akumva ubuzima bwâ€™umunezero buragarutse,akidegemvya.

Rero umubabariye ni wewe ubwawe uba wigiriye neza, kuko bituma ubohoka kumubabaro yaguteje.

Ikindi cerekana ko uba wigiriye neza wewe ubwawe, nâ€™ uko Bibiliya ivuga ngo ni mwabarira abandi, na Data wo mwâ€™ ijuru azobababarira namwe. Muyindi mvugo, iyo ubabariye uba wishize mu kibanza aho ubwira Imana integenke zawe, nayo ikakubabarira.Utababariye naho, ntubabarirwa .Kubabarira rero ni ku nyungu zawe.

Kandi twasomye ngo Â«Â ruburakigongwe agirira nabi umubiri wiwe ubwiweÂ Â».

Umuntu atagira ikigongwe (adatanga imbabazi), bimuvyarira inzika, umubabaro udahera(bishobora gutuma kandi agira ingwara zivuye ku mubabaro),bikongera bigatuma aguma yiyumvira ku kibi yakorewe aho kwiyumvira ivyomuteza imbere mu Mpwemu no mu mubiri, kandi biba nâ€™ inzitizi mu migenderanire yogirana nâ€™ Imana, ndetse nâ€™abantu. Kutababarira nâ€™ ukwigirira nabi rero.

Kandi ikindi tutokwibagira, Bibiliya ivuga ngo ico umuntu abiba nico azokwimbura.Niwababarira, Imana izotuma nâ€™ abandi ugirako intege nke bakubabarira vyoroshe kuko uzoba wabivye kugira imbabazi.

Nâ€™ubwo woba ubona ivyo wakorewe biremereye utovyishoboza kubabarira, uzosabe Imana igushoboze kubabarira, iyashoboje Yosefu kubabarira bene se bamugurishije, nawe yogushoboza.

Dukwiyekwigakubabarira,bizotumatubahotwishimyekandininacoImanaidushakako.Umuntu wese ni yitegure kwama agira imbabaze ku neza yiwe.

title: Abarundi baremeza yuko hari ba Bulamatari bafise imigambi yo gusamazaÂ abenegihugu.
content:
DÃ©sirÃ© Minani Buramatari wâ€™intara ya Ngozi ati: Â«Â Mu mwaka 2030, intara ya Butanyerera izoba yaguze indege 5 kandi nâ€™umugambi tuzoshikakoÂ Â»

Mu kumufata mu mugongo RÃ©my Cishayo ayoboye intara ya Kayanza avuga ko uwo mugambi wo kugura indege mu Kayanza bawuhagaritse kugira ngo bifadikanye nâ€™abo mu ntara ya Butanyerera kubandanya umugambi wo guteza imbere iyo ntara nshasha

Aho hari kuri uyu wa 3/2/2024,aho intara ya Ngozi yari iramutse ishikiriza ivyaranguwe mu ntara ya Ngozi mu mwaka wâ€™2023Buramatari wâ€™intara ya Kayanza akaba yashikirije ko ahimiriza abavuka mu ntara arongoye kuja kwubaka amazu akomakomeye kandi agerekeranye nkâ€™igorofa 20, barime imyonga yose, bubake amabarabara meza kandi akomeye eka nâ€™ibindi

Abo bayobozi bavuga ko ata yindi ntara nâ€™imwe muri nshasha buca zijaho izobaca imbere mwâ€™iterambere kuko Kayanza, kubwâ€™ivyo bahamagarira ababa muri izo ntara gufatana mu nda bakorere hamwe

Si ubgambere Abarundi bumva imvugo ya Leta yâ€™Uburundi imeze nkâ€™iyo kubashimanga.Umukuru wâ€™igihugu yavuze yuko Abarundi badashonje kuko batararya ibitaribga, yongeyeko ngo ntashobora kumenya yuko banashonje kuko we nâ€™umuryango wiwe bimbura umurengera nâ€™ibigega bakaba baruhuke. Akaba yirurwa arigisha ivyâ€™imbona kazoza ya 2040 na 2060 mu gihe igihugu kiguma kija mu bukene ntangere. Abo ba bulamatari nabo ngo bagira bagure indege zitanu mu gihe igihugu câ€™Uburundi ata ndege nâ€™imwe ikora gifise. Ivyo vyâ€™intara zâ€™igihugu zibiri kugura indege zitanu babivuga mu gihe izo ntara arizo zifise abana benshi baheba ishure kubera inzara no mu gihe abayobozi bâ€™amashure bamaze iminsi batabaza yuko abana bari mu kwicwa nâ€™umwanda kubera yuko amashure adafise utuzu twa surwumwe. Duhanura abategetsi bâ€™igihugu kutaborerwa ubutegetsi ngo bakinishe amabanga bahawe mukwama bavuga ivya kazoza gusa mugabo nyabona bakamenya yuko bashiriweko gutorera umuti ingerane zâ€™abenegihugu uyu munsi no kwitaho iterambere ryâ€™uyu munsi.

title: Hari igihe udashobora kwiryamira kiretse Imana yoÂ nyene.
content:
Â«Â Uwo mugore asumira impuzu yiwe, aramubgira, ati Ngo turyamane. Amutana impuzu yiwe, arahunga, arasohoka. Mazâ€™ abonye kw amutanye impuzu yiwe agahunga agasohoka, atabaza abagabo bâ€™abanyarugo, arababarira, atâ€™ Ehe raba yatuzaniye Umuheburayo wo kudukengera! Yaje iyo ndi ngw aryamane nanje, ndaheza ntabaza nâ€™ijwi rirenga: mazâ€™ abonye nshize ijwi hejuru ntabaje, antana impuzu yiwe, arahunga, arasohoka.Itanguriro 39:12-15â€³

Iyi ni inkuru ya Yosefu nibaza ko benshi muyizi.Yagurishijwe na bene se, ageze kwa Potifari agira ikiganza ciza, muka potifari yipfuza ko baryamana,Yosefu aranka. Amaze kwanka muka potifari aca ahengera atanumwe ari munzu,aca afata Yosefu ngo baryamane, nawe ariruka amutana impuzu yiwe,arasoka.

Muka Potifari niko kugumya iyo mpuzu ya Yosefu, aca atabaza abo murugo amwagiriza ko ashatse kumufata kunguvu. Abibwira nâ€™umugabo wiwe Potifari ashitse, uburake buraziriringa, aca ata Yosefu mumunyororo.

Aha ntaco Yosefu yari gukora ngo yivugire. Uretse Imana yonyene ntawundi yarâ€™azi ko Yosefu atashatse gukora ivyo yagirijwe, kuko hari nâ€™ikimenyamenya(impuzu yiwe mumaboko ya muka potifari).

Benedata, hari igihe umuntu ashikamwo ntashobore kwivugira,abantu bakamumenya ukutari ko, akitwa izina ribi kandi muvyukuri atari mubi. Bihora bishika kandi abantu bagacafuza umuntu, kurugero aho nâ€™abavyumva hagera igihe bavyizera ko ari ukuri ijana kwâ€™ijana. Ivyo nivyo Yosefu yariko aracamwo.

Gusa, nâ€™ubwo bigoye kwakira, burya navyo biba biri mumugambi wâ€™Imana. Imana iratangaje, kuko irakoresha na Satani mugushitsa umugambi wayo. Aho niho tugera tukavangigwa,iyo tubonye Satani yitijije abantu, akabakoresha mukwonona ivyacu.

Iyo uri mugihe udashobora kwivugira, ukwiye gusenga Imana ikaguha inkomezi zâ€™umutima, kuko nizo uba ukeneye ako kanya. Izo nkomezi nizo zizotuma ugira inyifato nziza mugihe nkico.

Vyarangiye Imana ivugiye Yosefu, ariko biciye kure. Yosefu aba uwâ€™icubahiro kurusha nâ€™abamutaye mumvuto bamubeshera.

Iyo duciye mugihe nkâ€™ico ca Yosefu co kubesherwa, co kutaronka uwutuvugira(mubibazo vyacu), rimwe na rimwe biratugora kwiyumvisha ko Imana izotugirira neza mbere kurenza ivyokorwa nâ€™abo nyene banse kutuvugira, ariko ukuri nâ€™uko Imana ibona ibiri imbere iba izi ingene izobikora bikarangira dutabawe.

Murâ€™ico gihe, dukwiye kubera maso inyifato yacu, kugira ngo ibihe nkâ€™ivyo bigoye ntibidukure mumugambi wâ€™Imana.Kwiherezo,Imana izotuvugira ikoresheje abo yahisemwo, canke izoca muzindi nzira zayo, itumare umubabaro twatewe nâ€™ivyo bihe.

Iyo Imana igufiseko umugambi, iyo udashobora kwiryamira ica iseruka ikakurwanira kuko iguhozako ijisho mu gihe ugororotse. Yosefu amaze kuronka isezerano mu nzozi maze akazibarira umuryango wiwe, abo bavukana bose baciye bamwanka mbere na nyina na se nâ€™abo barabigaya. Yaciye mu nzira itoroshe benewabo bamuta mu gisumanyenzi, bamukurayo baramugurisha, iyo agurishijwe, umugore aramubeshera atabga mwâ€™ibohero maze Uhoraho Imana ikoresha uburyo butangaje kugira ngo imushitseko ivyo yamusezeraniye.

title: Wirinde ingaruka zoÂ kwiyoberanya.
content:
Â«Â Mazâ€™ umwami wâ€™Abisirayeli abarira Yehoshafati, ati Ngiye kwiyoberanya, nje mu rugamba; ariko weho ni wambare imyambaro yawe yâ€™ubgami. Nukâ€™ umwami wâ€™Abisirayeli ariyoberanya, aja mu rugamba.1Abami22:30â€³

Iki gihe umwami wâ€™Abisirayeli yitwa Ahabu be nâ€™umwami wâ€™Abayuda yitwa Yehoshafati bafatanije muntambara kurwanya umwami wâ€™i Siriya. Ahabu aca agira amayeri yo kwiyoberanya ngo ntiyambare nkâ€™umwami, ahubwo yambare nkâ€™umusoda asanzwe, kugira bitume abo barwana batamumenya.Niko yabigenje ariko ntivyaje kumuhira, kuko iyo ntambara yayiguyemwo.

Kwiyoberanya munzira ija mwâ€™ijuru ni bibi. Bituma umuntu adashingira intahe Imana kuko kubwo kwiyoberanya hari abatamenya ko atinya Imana. Kandi kuba batabimenya bimukwegera ibishuko atogize iyo aba ari umuntu adatinya kwerekana uwâ€™ari we. Kandi akenshi benâ€™uyo muntu ntaragama mugakiza.

Nâ€™ubwo Ahabu yari yiyoberanije, bibiliya ivuga ngo Â«Â Mazâ€™umuntu umwe wo mu rugamba apfa kurasa, agema umwami wâ€™Abisirayeli(Ahabu) ahâ€™ivyuma bimukingira bihurira;.[1abam22:34]

Benedata, iyâ€™umuntu yiyoberanya yiyumvira ko aba yabitoye, ariko uwumugema umwampi ntamenya nâ€™aho avuye(uwumukura mugakiza akamusubiza mwâ€™isi). Abantu bazokwubahira agakiza wabagaragarije ko wakiriye mukubashingira intahe, ariko niwiyoberanya,ukibwira ngo gikuru nâ€™umutima, kuko abantu umutima batawumenya,bazokwama bakuzanira ibishuko,kandi babikore ataco bikanga kuko nâ€™ubundi ntiwaberetse ko utameze nkabo.Muri benshi bazokugerageza ntihazoburamwo nâ€™umwe azokugema umwampi. Nico gituma atari vyiza kwiyoberanya.

Ikindi,iyo umuntu yiyoberanya abuza uburinzi bwâ€™ingabo zo mwâ€™ijuru kuza kuri we. Kuko Abamarayika bo mwâ€™ijuru babera maso intambuko zâ€™umuntu yagaragaje koko ko atari uwâ€™isi, bakagenda bamukingira kandi bamugwanirira intambara yohura nazo kubwo gukurikira Imana. Nico gituma abantu biyoberanya badashikama muvyizegwa, inyuma yâ€™igihe runaka baca babivamwo.

Abizera twese,dukwiye gushingira intahe abo turi bo, kuko ni kimwe muvyo twashiriweho, kandibizotuma no kuri wa musi Yesu atagira isoni zo kutwemangira imbere ya Data.

No mu buzima bga minsi yose umuntu wese akwiriye guhagararira ico ari, ico yemera nâ€™ico akora maze hari impanuro, impinduka cane ubufasha bukenewe akabuhabga. Ba nyamwiyoberanya usanga bagoye kandi bagowe kuko usanga buzuye uburyarya nâ€™ubugunge, usanga ari ba ntahomfatwa kandi ata kintu na kimwe bakora mu kugororoka. Iyo bafise amabanga bata abantu mu kaga kuko iherezo ryabo riba ribi. Nâ€™uko mwana wâ€™umuntu, wame uvuga ukuri kandi ugendera mu kuri kuko bizomurikira abandi.

title: â€œIco ubiba nico wimburaâ€ Uzirikana iriÂ jambo.
content:
IHAME RYO KUBIBA NO KWIMBURA.

Â«Â Umubarire, utâ€™ Uku ni kâ€™Uhoraho agize, ngo Nonâ€™ urishe, utakâ€™ ushikira imyandu? Uheze umubarire, utâ€™ Uku ni kâ€™Uhoraho agize, ngw Ahâ€™ imbga zarigatiye amaraso ya Naboti, ni ho zizorigatira nâ€™ayawe.1 Abami 21:19â€³

Ibi vyabwiwe umwami Ahabu,kuko umugore wiwe Yezebeli yari yishe Naboti,kugira ashikire uruzabibu rwa Naboti kuko yari yarwimanye.Imana rero ica imutumako Eliya,ati umubwire ati â€¦ahâ€™imbwa zarigatiye amaraso ya Naboti,niho zizorigatira ayawe.

Ibi bisa nivyo bibiliya ivuga ko icâ€™ umuntu abiba arico azokwimbura.Yesu we yavuze ko uwicisha inkota azokwicishwa inkota.Musi yâ€™izuba rero,ihame ryo kubiba nâ€™ukwimbura ni uryâ€™ukuri,ivyo umuntu abiba,ari vyiza ari bibi,biba bizomugarukira.

Ariko rero,hari uburyo umuntu yokoresha akabiburizamwo kurugero runana.Nivyo ahabu yaciye akora amaze kwumva ivyago bizomushikira nâ€™ibizoshikira umuryango wiwe kubwâ€™ico yakoze.

Â«Â Maze ahabu yumvise ayo majambo,aca yitantamurirakwâ€™ impuzu ziwe,aryama mu magunira nyene,agenda yifumbereje.1abami 22:29â€³

Iyi ni inyifato ahabu yagize yo guca bugufi,yo kwihana.Vyakoze kumutima wâ€™Uhoraho,aca abwira Eliya ati Â«Â mbega wabonye ingene Ahabu yicishije bugufi imbere yanje?ko yicishije bugufi atyoâ€¦,sinzozana ivyago kungoma yiwe,â€¦1abami21:19Â Â».

Iyi niyo nyifato ikwiriye imbere yâ€™umuntu yisanze muvyo yakoze bibi,ni Â«Â ugucabugufi,akihanaÂ Â».Atabikoze uko,aba abivye imbuto mwâ€™isi yâ€™impwemu,iba izomugarukira vuba canke kera.

Uwurenganya,igihe kiba kizogera bakamurenganya.Uwiba,aba abivye imbuto mwâ€™isi yâ€™impwemu,nawe baba bazomwiba,kandi bikaba ingaruka zâ€™ivyo yakoze.Uwusambana,aba abivye imbuto mwâ€™isi yâ€™impwemu,azokwisanga nâ€™abana biwe iyo mpwemu yarabakurikiranye(nkâ€™uko vyabaye kuri Dawidi amaze gusambana na betisheba,iyo mpwemu yaciye yinjira no mubana biwe).Kwihana nirwo rupfunguruzo rwo kubiburizamwo kurugero runaka.Kwihana nikwo kwatumye mugishingo câ€™ivyago vyagira bishikire ninewe,Imana ibagwizako ubuntu bwayo,ntiyabarandura.

Benedata,twese dushobora kugira integenke muburyo bumwe canke ubundi.Ariko dukwiye kumenya ko ico dukoze,ari ciza ari kibi tuba tubivye imbuto mwâ€™isi yâ€™impwemu.Iyo bishitse Mpwemu yera akatwemeza ico twakoze kitari ciza,dukwiye gucabugufi,tukihana,bizotuma mwâ€™isi yâ€™impwemu tuburizamwo ingaruka zavyo kuruhero runaka.

Igihe cose ugomba kugira ico ukora canke uvuga, igihe cose uriko ushaka gukora umugambi canke ugomba kugira ico ukorana nâ€™abandi, urame uzirimaka yuko ivyo mukora vyose bifise nâ€™ivyo muvuga vyose bifise ingaruka ari nziza canke ari mbi. Nta gikorwa na kimwe kitagira ingaruka nziza canke mbi. Ni wame urondera ibikorwa bivyara umusaruro mwiza kuri wewe, ku muryango wawe no kubandi, amen!

title: Imvugo yâ€™Imana ku bantu bayo nâ€™iyo kubaremesha, kubatera intege noÂ kubirura.
content:
IMVUGO Yâ€™IMANA KUBANTU BAYO.

Â«Â Hinge numve ivyo Imana, Uhoraho, igira ivuge:Kukw izobgira abantu bayo nâ€™abakunzi bayo ivyâ€™ amahoro;Ariko ntibaze basubire mu bupfu.Zaburi 85:8â€³

Imana irafise uko ivuga kubantu bayo(abayubaha) canke kubatayubaha.Imvugo yayo iratandukanye,biterwa nâ€™umurwi umuntu arimwo.

Twasomye,ngo kukwâ€™izobwira abantu bayo nâ€™abakunzi bayo ivyâ€™amahoroÂ Â».

Muyindi mvugo,Imana ntamajambo yâ€™agacavutu canke yâ€™ibicantege ivuga kubayubaha.

Ariko rero,turi murugendo rwâ€™amajwi,aho umuntu yumva vyinshi inyuma canke imbere muri we.Amwe mumajwi avugira mumuntu ashobora kuba ari Â«Â naragowe,ntibizokunda,abantu ntibankunda,sinzokira,ntakazi nzoronka,ba naka bo barahiriwe,â€¦Â Â»Murâ€™ayo majwi yose, ntanarimwe riva ku Mana ririmwo,ayo ava kuri satani,kuko Imana yo Â«Â izobwira abakunzi bayo ivyâ€™amahoroÂ Â».

Kubantu bayo Imana irabaremesha,ibatera intege,ibabwira amajambo yâ€™ivyizigiro.

Bitewe nâ€™amajwi rero umuntu yumva,bishobora kumuhushisha inzira,canke bikamugumiza munzira.Amajwi iyo atari meza ashobora kukubuza kubaho wishimye,iyo ari meza atuma unezererwa ubuzima uko bwoba buje kwose.

Mukugira umuntu aneshe intambara yâ€™amajwi biramusaba kuba azi ijamboryâ€™Imana,iyo haje ibicantege akaryifashisha akongerwa intege.Imana idufitiye imigambi myiza,ivyo abayubaha nivyo dukwiye guhora dushirako umutima no mugihe twoba twumva amajwi atari meza aduteye.

Turangirize kurâ€™uyu murongo:

Â«Â Kuko nzi ivyiyumviro mbiyumvirako,ni jewe Uhoraho mbivuze,kwâ€™ari ivyiyumviro vyâ€™amahoro atari ivyâ€™ivyago,kugira ngo mbahe ivyizigiro vyo mwâ€™iherezo ryanyu.Yeremiya 29:11â€³.

Kukowâ€™ihanyeivyahavyaweukezwaubuukabaubandanirakwamaugororokeraUhorahoImanaatarimumajambogusacankemunyigishozibeshaabantungouragororotsekukowizeye, Imanaigufitiyeimigambimyizaremakandiutekane.

title: Amasezerano Imana yahaye ihanga ryâ€™AbarundiÂ aregereje.
content:
Iyo tuvuze yuko Uhoraho Imana agira ashitse Isezerano ryâ€™igihugu câ€™Uburundi, ntituba tuvuze ca civugo ca leta yâ€™uBurundi ngo â€œImbonakazoza yâ€™Uburundi yo mu 2040-2060â€ bahavuye bavuga ngo ni umugambi wâ€™Imana. Birya bavuga ni ibihendwabana kuko igihugu cifashe mu 2040, ubu mu 2024, abantu baba babona amabarabara nâ€™amahinguriro biriko birubakwa. Kubera iki abategetsi bahitamwo imvugo yâ€™urusinziriza ku Barundi mu kubereka ibicapo vyo muri kazoza kubereka ivyo bariko barakora ubu kugira ngo igihugu kive mu bukene kirimwo!

Tuvuze yuko Imana igira ishitse Isezerano ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi, tuba tuvuze ivyo Imana iriko iratubarira aho umugambi wayo ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi igira uve mu buhanuzi wambare umubiri. Imana igira ikoreshe abo yatoranije kugira ngo ishitse ico yasezeranye. Ivyo yasezeranye kugira ngo ubumenye wandika ngaha nyene uti â€œAmasezerano Uhoraho Imana yahaye Uburundiâ€, uca uvyisomera vyose nkuko twagiye turabibashikiriza kuva mu 2016.

Ku bantu batizera yuko Imana ivuga kandi igakora, nâ€™uko kumbure batizera inkuru zanditse muri Bibiliya Yera canke batarumviriza ibishingantahe tubashikiriza vyâ€™uturorero twâ€™ivyo Imana yadukoreye. Yarabanje iravuga hanyuma irashitsa. Tubahe akarorero kamwe kabaye kandi abari ku butegetsi uyu munsi barashobora ku kamenya. Petero Nkurunziza akiri mwâ€™ishamba yinjiye mu masengesho yâ€™indwi zibiri mu gihugu ca Tanzania i Bihalamuro. Murâ€™ayo masengesho niho yabaririwe yuko intambara igiye guhera kandi yuko azoba umukuru wâ€™igihugu câ€™Uburundi. Ico gihe nyene niho yabarirwa yuko niyagamburukira Imana akayihesha icubahiro mu gihugu yuko izomuha kuramba kandi yuko nâ€™igihugu kizogira impore kandi gitere imbere. Yaranagabishijwe yuko nâ€™atakora ivyo Imana igomba yuko itazobura kubimuhora. Murâ€™ico gihe nyene Petero Nkurunziza yahabga ayo masezerano, Denise Bucumi Nkurunziza, aho yasengera ku rusengero mu Bwiza, umukozi wâ€™Imana yahaje ava mu gihugu ca Camerouni yaramuvugishijweko ati: â€œwitwa nde?â€ Uwundi ati: â€œNitwa Denise Bucumi Nkurunziza.â€ Wa muvugishwa nawe ati:â€Mbonye umuntu yitwa NKURUNZIZA abaye umukuru wâ€™igihugu câ€™Uburundi.â€ Ivya nta muntu yari kuvyiyumvira yuko vyobaye ukuri. Nti vyatevye muri 2005 ivyari ubuvugishwa vyarambaye umubiri abantu bose barabibona. Ico gihe bikivugwa niho twari kandi vyari bigoye gutahura yuko ipfuvyi yi 1972 izoshika ku butegetsi biciye mu matora mu gihe yari mu migwi irwana itigeze ifata nâ€™agasozi na kamwe mu gihugu ngo ikamareko indwi ikagwanira. Ico Imana yivugiye iragishitsa, ntawukizibira naho yoba yitwaje ibingana gute.

Tukiri ku vyerekeye Petero Nkurunziza nyene, mwibuke yuko kubera ingene yatanguye neza hanyuma bikamugora kubandanya inzira basezeranye nâ€™Imana, twarabashikirije ingene umuvugishwa yeretswe yaguye i Karuzi mugabo akajanwa guhambwa i Gitega. Inyuma yâ€™imyaka 7 ivyo vyashitse uko yavyeretswe. Dufise ibishingatahe vyinshi vyâ€™uturorero twâ€™ingene Imana ivuga hanyuma igashitsa ivyo yasezeranye, ni naco gituma nâ€™uyu munsi tubamenyesheje yuko Uhoraho Imana yo mwâ€™ijuru igira ishitse amasezerano yose yahaye Ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi.

Ni mwitegurire kwakira ivyo Imana yavuganye namwe. Mu kuvyitegurira si ukundi, ni umwe wese yihana ivyaha vyiwe, akezwa hanyuma uwariwe wese agakora ico yahamagariwe gukora. Amen!

title: Ugire ukwicisha bugifi bizotuma ushirwaÂ hejuru
content:
Â«Â Nuko mwicishe bugufi muri musi yâ€™ukuboko kwâ€™Imana kwâ€™ubushobozi, kugira ngwâ€™izâ€™ ibashire hejuru mu gihe gikwiye.1 Petero 5:6â€³.

Mubushake bwâ€™Imana yipfuza gushira abantu hejuru.Nâ€™uko twavutse biratwigisha,umuntu avuga ari muto,agakura gahorogahoro,kugeza igihe aba umuntu wo gutumwa ijambo.Nâ€™ubwo nabwo ni bumwe muburyo bwo gushirwa hejuru.

Ariko rero,nâ€™ubwo Imana yipfuza kudushira hejuru(kuduteza intambwe),guca bugufi vyo nâ€™amahitamwo yâ€™umuntu.Ikitari amahitamwo,nâ€™ugushirwa hejuru,kuko ni Imana ibikora,niyo womenga nâ€™abantu baba babikoze,burya aba ari Imana.

Bibiliya ivuga ko Yesu yicishije bugufi,araganduka mbere gushitsa no kurupfu rwo kumusaraba,ngo nico catumye Imana imushira hejuru.Imana rero niyo ishira hejuru,uruhara rwâ€™umuntu nâ€™uguca bugufi.

Gusa,benshi batahura ugucabugufi ukutariko.Gucabugufi kwiza kugizwe no kwumvira Imana,canke abantu(iyo batagusavye gukora icaha).Gucabugufi kwiza sâ€™ukureka abantu bakaguhonyorako,sâ€™ukugenda wunamye,si nokwigira umunyantegenke canke guhakana ubuntu Imana yagushizemwo.

Gucabugufi kwiza harimwo kwemera ivyo ushoboye,ariko ukagaragaza ko vyose ari ubuntu bwâ€™Imana,atari wewe wabikoze.Gucabugufi kwiza harimwo kurwanirira uburenganzira bwawe,ariko utarengeye akarimbi abandi canke ngo uve mumurongo wâ€™ijambo ryâ€™Imana.

Umuntu aciye bugufi ntiyerekana ko ari igitangaza,ko arenze abandi mukintu ico arico cose.Ntarondera gukora ibintu ngo abantu bamushireko amaso,bamubone,bamushime.Umuntu aciye bugufi arondera icubahiro câ€™Imana muvyo akora vyose.

Benâ€™uyo muntu rero aciyebugufi,aba ari munzira imuganisha mucubahiro.Igihe gikwiye kigeze,Imana iba izomushira hejuru.Nibaza ko umuntu wese akeneye icubahiro akwiye gusenga ngo Imana imuhe umutima uciye bugufi,kuko Imana ishira hejuru abaciye bugufi.

Igitangaje,hari abantu umenga ntibaciye bugufi,ariko waraba ugasanga Imana yarabahaye icubahiro.Ariko burya iyishira hejuru ninayo ishobora no gucisha bugufi.Imana ishobora gucisha bugufi nâ€™abakomeye.Yarabikoreye umwami Nebukadineza,kubwâ€™ubwibone amara imyaka indwi yarirukanywe mubantu,arisha ivyatsi.Yarabikoreye kandi Herode,kubwâ€™amajambo yavuze arimwo ubwibone,vyatumye umumarayika amukubita aca apfa ako kanya.Umuntu wese wâ€™ubwibone,aba ariko agana mugucishwabugufi atabizi.

Ntakintu ciza nko gucabugufi.Abantu baciyebugufi uzosanga babana neza nâ€™abandi,bafise igikundiro,uzosanga bipfuriza ivyiza abandi,â€¦kandi gucabugufi ni kimwe mubimenyetso bidahara vyerekana ko umuntu aba yarahuye na Yesu.Dukwiye gusenga,kugira ngo Imana iduhe kubaho dufise umutima uciyebugufi,hanyuma nayo ize idushire hejuru mugihe gikwiye.

Iyo uca bugufi ntaco uhomba uretse inyungu zâ€™umutengera.

title: Uburundi, uravye uko abenegihugu babayeho, burakeneyeÂ umukiza.
content:
UBURUNDI BURAGWAYE INGWARA KANDI BURAREMVYE BUKENEYE UMUKIZA.

Maze iminsi nitegereza ibibera mu butegetsi, ibibera mu migambge, ibendera mu madini nâ€™amashengero nâ€™ibibera mu bantu hagati yabo ubgabo, nasanze uburundi bukeneye umukiza.Umutegetsi ariba igihugu ajejwe gukingira, akanyaga akarenganya nâ€™abene gihugu ajejwe kurenganura atacamira. Niwe agaruka akikomesha induru yagiriza abandi yuko ari ibisuma kandi yuko arenganya abantu kandi ntihabura nâ€™abahagwa bagakurwa mu kazi bagapfungwa.Abanyamigambge bararenganya, bakarenganya gushika naho birengagiza ukuri kwose bakavuga yuko amashure ataco amaze kugira ngo bakoreshe urwaruka ku nyungu zabo gusa. Aho gutegura kazoza keza kâ€™igihugu bategura kwirundanirizako ibintu vyise kugira ngo bategeke bose atawuryogora. Ivyo bigiye gukwega akarambaraye mutaravye neza.Abanyamadini nâ€™abanyamashengero binyegeza mu nyigisho zâ€™Imana kugira ngo bakore ivyo bigisha abandi kudakora. Ivyaha vyiraye mu bigisha abandi guheba ivyaha. Umuntu atanga ico afise.Ingeso zâ€™arononekaye, ubu ntukigira uwo wokwizera kuko nâ€™iwo muvukana arakuryaruka ni naco gituma huzuye imanza nyinshi zâ€™amatati mu gihugu.Abagabo, abashingantahe nâ€™imvuga kuri urazibura aho wazibonye kuko bose batinyira ubuzima bgabo. Ababi nâ€™ikibi kiriganje mu Barundi. Uwugize ngo aravuze atera amashurwe abaganza naho boba aribo nyanduruko yâ€™ibibi vyose, uwitwa nawe ngo akoresheje urwenge arihorera, akayinga maze agacika ntirumveko. None igihugu kizokizwa na bande!Igihugu câ€™Uburundi nâ€™abarundi, bavyemera batovyemera, bararwaye kandi bararemvye kandi bakeneye umukiza budatinze!

Ni musenge, mubiroge kandi mwicishe bugufi Imana itabare.

title: President Evariste Ndayishimiye avugwako ibintuÂ vyinshi.
content:
Umukuru wâ€™igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye avugwako vyinshi bitari vyiza nâ€™abamwegereye uretse abasanzwe bagwanya ubutegetsi bgiwe. Muvyo yagirizwa harimwo yuko asanzwe aganzwa nâ€™umukenyezi wiwe, uwo nawe akaba ariwe afata ingingo mbi zâ€™igihugu, akaba anyuruza nâ€™itunga ryâ€™igihugu mu gihe PrÃ©sident Evariste Ndayishimiye kenshi yoba avuga amajambo menshi nâ€™ivyo akora kenshi abitumwa nâ€™ivyo aba yanyoye.

Umwe mubo bama bari hafi na hafi mu bikorwa vya minsi yose yoba yagize umwihwezo ati: â€œNta mutegetsi nâ€™umwe  mu Burundi ataratabwa mu rudubi nâ€™amajambo NEVA yavuze. title: Abantu benshi binyegeza muvyâ€™Imana bakihuma amaso ngo â€œImana izobaha igihuguâ€ bakiyibagiza yukoÂ kirwanirwa.
content:
Kenshi turumva abantu biyita abahanuzi abandi bagahagarara ku buhanuzi maze bakiyimikira kuba abami nâ€™abigira abaherezi. Mwarumvise ivyo abagabo biyimitse bitwa ba Muhimpundu Lambert, ba Katikati ubu bapfunzwe mwâ€™ibohero rikuru rya Bujumbura. Mwarumvise nâ€™uwundi ari mu gihugu ca Australia yitwa Nicolas Bigirimana nawe aherutse kwiyimika ngo akarahirira nâ€™ubuherezi bukuru. Burya hariho nâ€™abandi babigera amajanja bagaca batinya ingaruka vyobagirako kuko bari mu gihugu. Abo bose binjiye mu vyâ€™Imana maze bumva Imburi nâ€™ubuhanuzi birabasosera ariko ijambo ryayo no kurongorwa na Mpwemu Yera bica birabasiga.

Bumvise yuko Imana itanga igihugu maze babifata nkâ€™umukino wâ€™akamari aho utomboza ugaca utwara ivyo utomboje. Ubutware bgâ€™igihugu Imana irabutanga mugabo buva kure bukarwanirwa kandi Ingabo indiri zikaharwa. Kugira ngo ushike mu gihugu Imana yagusezeraniye si utujambo jambo kandi si amasengesho menshi. Aho woruhira ubusa.

Imana kugira ngo ikize isirayeli yabanje kuvukisha umurongozi, Mose anyegezwa murufunzo kuri Nil, ajanwa kurererwa ibgami kwa Farawo, yiga amashure menshi hanyuma ahungira mu bugaragwa kuragira intama imyaka 40 yose. Kandi aho ntiyashitse mu gihugu câ€™isezerano, yakirabiye kure mugabo cashitsemwo abandi.

Kugira ngo bashike mu gihugu câ€™isezerano, bamaze imyaka 40 mu bugaragwa, bamwe bariwe nâ€™inzoka barapfa abandi isi yarasamye irabamira. Abantu benshi iyo bigisha inkuru ya isirayeli bavuga ibitangaza gusa babonye. Kugira ngo baneshe ibisagara bararwana ijoro nâ€™umurango benshi muribo bakicwa abandi bagakomereka. Imana yaguhaye Isezerano ryâ€™igihugu nti wicara ngo uriko uravuza inanga canke ngo uriko urasenga gusa. Umwami Dawidi arabizi kuko akiragiye intama yahora arwana nâ€™ibikoko. Amaze gushika ku kirimba naho Sawuli yagerageza kumwica incuro nyinshi. Uretse na Sawuli, kugira ngo abe Umwami, yategerejwe kubanza kwica ikigatanya cari caragesheje Ingabo zose za isirayeli. Yanesheje Goliyati bose bumva bakadegedwa. Ntuba uwatoranijwe ngo uja kwabira ivyagusa, hariho intambara ubanza kurwana.

Igihugu câ€™isezerano ntibagitora mu nzira kandi si kubgo amashure, ubuhizi canke akaranga. Uretse kugitoranirizwa, urakirwanira, ukagiteramira kandi ukama ugikingira. Ntuba mugaboniryo, sa tuntu twanje, mpenuke ndamuke canke ngo wifatanye nâ€™inkozi zâ€™ikibi. Utegerezwa kugira umutima nkâ€™uwâ€™Imana igwishiriza imvura abeza nâ€™ababi. Abanya isirayeli barabizi kuko kuva bagishitsemwo, batwawe nkâ€™inyagano incuro nyinshi, baragwanye baraneshwa kenshi, barakorewe ihonyabgoko, amakungu yose arabanka kandi nâ€™uyu munsi baracari mu ntambara.

Imana iyo ivuze irashitsa mugabo ishitsa ku bafise imitima nâ€™imibiri yiteguye, ishitsa ku bantu bafise ico bazoyimarira kuko iyo bayitaye bakanjajwa, bahura nâ€™ivyago, babura vyose bakaba inyererezi. Tegure ingabo zâ€™igihugu cacu zame zigavye kandi zigabirije kurwanira Uburundi bgâ€™Isezerano.

Shimeyi ntiyatinye ingabo zari zicunze Dawidi.Mbere umwe muri bo yasavye Dawidi ko yomureka akamuca umutwe kuko yarahangaye umwami,ariko Dawidi aramubuza.

Ba Shimeyi nâ€™ishusho yâ€™abantu bavuga ibintu bidakwiriye kubabaruta batitaye kungaruka mbi vyobazanira.Nâ€™ishusho kandi yâ€™abantu bafatira kubibazo wahuye navyo (nkâ€™uko Dawidi yari yahagurukiwe nâ€™umuhungu wiwe),kugira bagutuntuze muvyo bavuga canke munyifato yabo.Ariko rero,waba woroheje,waba ukomeye,Shimeyi uramukeneye.Uti gute?

Nâ€™uko Shimeyi Imana imukoresha mukukwigisha kudakoreshwa nâ€™ibigumbagumba.

Imana irashaka ko tuba abantu badategekwa nâ€™ibigumbagumba(nâ€™amarangamutima).Irashaka ko dufata icemezo ciza,ko tuvuga amajambo mazima,no mugihe tutaba turiko twiyumva neza.Imana rero irareka umuntu nka Shimeyi,kugira ikwigishe kwigumya.

Ikindi,iyo witwaye neza,biciye kuri Shimeyi Imana irakwigisha kutarwana intambara zâ€™amajambo.Kuko iyo ugiye ngo muhangane mumajambo uba umushiriye aho ashaka,kuko we ntaba yiteguriye gutsindwa.Dawidi rero yarâ€™azi igikwiriye kuri Shimeyi,yaravuze ati nimumureke antuke,â€¦,kumbure Uhoraho azoraba ayo mbonye,ampe ivyiza mugishingo ciyo mivumo mvumwe uyu musiÂ Â»2sam16:11-12â€³.

Umuti wa Shimeyi nâ€™ukumwinumira,ukibandaniriza urugendo.kuko Shimeyi ntaco agufasha iyo umuhaye amatwi,ntanâ€™ico agutwara iyo umwimye amatwi ukikomereza urugendo.

Iyo urenganye amahoro abantu bafise inyifato nkâ€™iya Shimeyi,uhinduka umuntu azi kuvuga amajambo arobanuwe,adakoreshwa nâ€™ibigumbagumba munyifato yiwe canke mumvugo ziwe imbere yâ€™abomwibasira abaribo bose.

Gusa,Shimeyi si imisi yose yama yererwa nâ€™iyo nyifato,kuko igihe kiragera akimbura aho yabivye.Kandi niko vyagenze, vyarangiye yishwe kungoma ya Salomo,azize kutumvira,ariko umuzi wavyo vyavuye kuri iyo nyifato nyene. Niwahura nâ€™umuntu afise inyifato nkâ€™iya Shimeyi,uze ubere maso inyifato yawe,Imana irazi uko izobigenza uko igihe kizohaca ntabe akikubangamira ukundi.Ikindi,ntawubizi,kumwamira ivyamwa kumbure nivyo bizomurokora,akava munzira mbi yazimiriyemwo.Nico gituma atari vyiza kureka ngo inyifato yiwe itume witwara uko bidakwiriye,kuko harâ€™aho yokira biciye kuri wewe.Amen!

title: Abarundi barazinzwe nâ€™impwemu yo gusabiriza no kurondera ubufasha kuvyo dushoboraÂ kwikorera

Amemyesha kandi ko nâ€™aho yoterereza abavyeyi bâ€™abana barereye kuri iryo shure ubwo buryo butokwira.Abana biga kuri iryo shure basanzwe ari bake, umuvyeyi akaba yotanga amafaranga arenga ibihumbi 40 vyâ€™Amarundi, akibaza ko batobyemera.

Amasure arakwiriye gutunganywa ku buryo ari abarezi, abarerwa nâ€™abavyeyi bose bumva yuko amasure ari ayabo kandi yuko ari ikibuze canke icononekaye bashobora ku gikora batarinze gusaba ubufasha bgo hanze. Ukwimba ibinogo no kurondera ibiti bakoresha barashobora kuvyironfera hagasigara isima, imisumari nâ€™utundi twa nkenerwa dushobora gutererwa nâ€™ubutegetsi bga commune, ubgintara, abadandaza ku giti cabo kandi vyose bigakorwa arama tangazo arinze gutangwa kuko utwo ni utuntu duto dukorerwa nko mu muryango. title: Leta yâ€™Uburundi yategerezwa kuba yarafashe ingingo yo gukingira abenegihuguÂ nâ€™ivyabo
content:

Ubuho hinjiyemwo ikibazo câ€™amazi ya Tanganyika ariko araduga mu mazu abantu bakidoga mugabo ntihagire ingingo zo gukingira abantu nâ€™ibintu zifatwa. Abanyakibenga ngo:

batewe umutima uhagaze nâ€™iduga ryâ€™amazi yâ€™ikiyaga tanganyika.

Bamwe mu banyagihugu baba mu Kibenga mu bumanuko bwâ€™igisagara ca Bujumbura bavuga ko batewe umutima uhagaze nâ€™amazi yâ€™ikiyaga Tanganyika yasubiye kuduga akirara mu mpangu babamwo naho bagerageza kuzitira nâ€™imifuko yâ€™umusenyi ariko bikaba impfagusa.

Hamwe bamaze guterwa usanga bariko bagerageza gukura ayo mazi bakoresheje imashine ziduza amazi moto pompe aho bavuga ko mbere bibatwara uburyo bwinshi.

Abo banyagihugu bavuga ko ibintu vyunyurwa nâ€™amazi yâ€™imvura atagira imigende iyatwara ntatembe.basaba reta gufasha kugira ngo bakingirwe ntihagire ibibandanya kononekara.

Bernard Sindayihebura umuhinga mu bidukikije akaba nâ€™umwigisha wa kaminuza mu cirwa yakoze yerakanye ko amazi yâ€™ ikiyaga Tanganyika ashobora kuduga ku rugero rwo hejuru, akabangamira ibintu vyegereye inkombe zâ€™ico kiyaga, na cane cane mu kwezi kwa gatanu 2024 kurusha urugezo ataribwashikeko kuva mu 1964.

uyo muhinga asigura ko abenyagihugu bo muri iyo micungararo bokwitegura kuko bashobora kuzohava bahunga, mbere ko nâ€™abajejwe intwaro bobibamenyesha hakiri kare. Hategerezwa kuba hariho ivyigwa biriko birakorwa vyo kwiga ingene abenegihugu botegura ingene bazifata nâ€™ico leta izobafashamwo igihe amazu yabo azoba yarengewe nâ€™amazi.

Hariho nâ€™imetero 150 umuntu wese yategerezwa kwigirayo ikiyaga uhereye aho umusenyi ukora ku kiyaga uri. Ariko vyose ntivybahorijwe bigatuma abasinzikazwa nâ€™iduga ryâ€™amazi baba benshi.

content:

Â» Kandi Sauli amenya yukâ€™ Uhoraho ari kumwe na Dawidi, arabitahura. Kandi Mikali umukobga wa Sauli yakunda Dawidi.1 Samweli 18:28â€³.

Iki gihe Umwami sawuli yari yipfuza uburyo yokwica Dawidi,ariko agambirira kumwica kubwenge.Amuha ikibazo atari yibaza ko Dawidi yokivamwo adapfuye.Amubwira ko kugira ngo amuhe umugore,adakeneye inkwano,ahubwo ashaka ubugabo ijana azoshahura abafilisitiya.1sam18:25

Burya abandi(abansi bawe),abagutega imitego,iyo ugendana nâ€™Imana,igihe kiragera bakabitahura.Bashobora kuba bari basanzwe bazi ko uyubaha,ariko batarabitahura.Niko vyagendekeye sawuli rero.Imitego yatega dawidi akayisimbuka,yamweretse ko Uhoraho ari kumwe nawe.

Abantu bashobora kuguharurira imisi,ariko ibintu bikarushiriza kuba vyiza.Bakibaza ko ivyawe atanakimwe kizoja imbere,ariko bagatangazwa nâ€™ubuhinga bwâ€™Imana kubuzima bwawe.

Abantu ntibabona Imana mubuzima bwawe kuko uyubaha gusa,ahubwo bayibonera no muvyo igukorera,no muntambwe iguteza.Ntibishoboka ko abantu batabona Imana mubuzima bwawe,nimba koko ugendana nayo.

Nivyo ibibazo turabicamwo,ariko nomuri vyo abandi bahabonera Imana yacu.Ni igihe abantu bibaza ingene ubayeho bikabasiga.

Imana izokwiyereka muburyo bumwe canke ubundi,bitume nâ€™abatayizi bayibona,banabitahure,bikunze bamwe banakurikire inzira wafashe.Vyose bizoterwa nâ€™ingene wihaye Imana,nayo ikivanga muvyawe.Muhezagirwe.

content:
UMUHANUZI NIYUNGEKO SALVATOR YARI UMWANDITSI WA BEBA GIDIYONI ARAVUYE MU GACERERE ATI NI MWIHANE MWEZWE KUKO IVYO IMANA YAVUZE BIRASHITSE NI MUVYITEGE.

Niyungeko Salvator aturuka mu Ntara ya Makamba yari umwanditsi wâ€™Umuvugishwa BEBA Gidiyoni. Niwe yadushikirije amabanga yâ€™ivyo Umuvugishwa BEBA Gidiyoni yavugishijwe vyose ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi nâ€™ayandi mahanga. Kubera yuko BEBA Gidiyoni atarazi kwandika, Salvatori Niyungeko niye yavyandika vyose akoresheje imashini batiye ku Misiyoni ya Pentekote. Vyose yabishikirije Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana. Yagize ati:Umuhanuzi BEBA Guidiyoni twagendanye imyaka 20 yari umurundi avuka mu ntara ya Makamaba akaba yari yarahungiye mu gihugu ca Tanzaniya kubera intambara yabaye mu gihugu câ€™Uburundi mu mwaka wa 1972. Yasengera mwâ€™Ishengero rya Pantecote i GATUMBA muri Tanzaniya mugabo akagenda arashikiriza ubuhanuzi Uhoraho Imana yahora imubgira cane cane aburire Ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi.Hariho abantu benshi bagiye barishimikiza imburi ziwe abandi bakazubakirako kugira ngo batange imburi zabo ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi.Umuvugishwa BEBA Guidiyoni ivyo yahanuye vyose vyagiye biraba mu gihugu cacu câ€™Uburundi uko yagiye arabitondeka kimwe ku kindi gushika ubu. Ivyo vyatumye nâ€™uyu munsi abantu bose babona yuko yari umuvugishwa wâ€™ukuri wâ€™umurundi wenyene amaze kubaho. Uyu muvugishwa nâ€™Imana yaratashe mu Burundi kandi abandi bakozi bâ€™Imana ntibamwakiriye nkâ€™umukozi wâ€™Imana kuko bari bumvise imburi atanga. Ari mu gihu câ€™Uburundi ku gatumba iwabo mu ntara ya Makamba, yahavuye afatwa nâ€™ingwara bamutwara ku bitaro bikuru i Makamba, biranka bamufatana urugendo ngo bamutware kumuvuriza mu bitaro bikuru i Bujumbura. Bageze mu nzira, Imana imubarira iti babgire bagusubize inyuma kuko utazokira utegerezwa gutaha kuko igihe cawe kirageze.Kuko bari bazi yuko ari umuhanuzi adasanzwe, baciye bamwumvira bamusubiza ruguru iwabo iyo yarasanzwe aba kwâ€™itongo. Amaze gushikayo, Imana yamubariye ngo babgire ibigira bishike. Ico gihe mu 1992, amatora yâ€™umukuru wâ€™igihugu ntiyari bgabe. Iwe hama abantu benshi harimwo intwazangabo zâ€™igisirikare ca kera bava za Bujumbura, Bururi, Rumonge, na ruguru baza iwe gusiguza. Yababgiye yuko hagiye kuba amatora kandi yuko umukuru wâ€™igihugu azotorwa bo nyene bazoca bamwica. Ati:â€ni mwamwica namwe nyene muzohonaâ€. Imana iyo ivuze ikintu kirasohora. Niko vyagenze yaratowe baca baramwica. Intambara yabaye inyuma yâ€™urupfu rwâ€™umukuru wâ€™igihugu Ndadaye Melchior yamaze imyaka irenga icumi mubo yahitanye nâ€™abasirikare ba leta yico gihe barimwo.

Umuhanuzi Niyungeko Salvator akaba yari nâ€™Umwanditsi wa nyakwigendera BEBA Gidiyoni agira ati ikimenyetso ca nyuma nkâ€™uko Uhoraho Imana yavuze tuzobona yuko ishikije ivyo yasezeranye ngico kibonetse. Ivyo vyose biboneka yuko ariko ariruka murâ€™ibi na biriya ariko yuko ari imigambi idashikana igihugu kwâ€™iterambere.

Umushikiranganji wâ€™uburimyi nâ€™ubgorozi nawe mu nama yariko aragirisha ari kumwe nâ€™abashikiranganji, uwo ikigega ca Leta nâ€™Uwo umutekano nâ€™iterambere ryâ€™ama Komune, yavuze yuko urugo rwose rutegerezwa kugira nyabarega 2 kandi rugatera nâ€™amabungo 3. Hari umwenegihugu yiyumviriye uwo mushikiranganji agira ati: â€œamavoka arazimvye cane muri kino gihe.

title: Umutumiro wâ€™amasengesho yo gusengera igihugu câ€™UburundiÂ 22-26/01/2024
content: UMUTUMIRO Wâ€™AMASENGESHO YO GUSENGERA UBURUNDI Nâ€™ABARUNDIUmwami nâ€™Umukiza wacu Yesu Kristo nâ€™ashimwe cane! Ihanga ryose twahamagariwe amasengesho yâ€™iminsi 5 yo kuva kuwâ€™IJURU bita kuwa mbere igenekerezo rya 22 gushika kuwâ€™ABANTU bita kuwa gatanu igenekerezo rya 26 zâ€™uku kwezi nâ€™uyu mwaka nyene.Aya masengesho muyatumirire abantu bose, ababanyi, aboroshe nâ€™abahambaye nâ€™abari mu mashengero nâ€™amadini atandukanye twese, twihane twezwe maze tuje imbere yâ€™Imana dusengera amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yahaye Ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi [ 2INGOMA 7:14]. Iyindi mitwaro ni:(1) Ugusambuze ibikorwa vyâ€™abarozi nâ€™ubushobozi bgâ€™amangetengete mu gihugu cacu câ€™Uburundi kugira ngo ubugombe bgâ€™Imana bgururuke ku gihugu;(2) Tuzosanganguza ibibi bitera inzara, ubukene, ukubura kazi nâ€™akarenganyo kugira ngo Imana ishitse isezerano ryayo ryâ€™Imigisha kubayo no ku gihugu;(3) Tusambuza urwanko, ishari, inzigo nâ€™ibice biri mu bitwa abakozi nâ€™abana bâ€™Imana, ibiri mu miryango, mu babanyi no mu gihugu;(4) Tuzosengera urukundo, ubumwe nâ€™ukwezwa mu bizera Yesu Kristo nkâ€™Umwami nâ€™Umukiza wâ€™ubugingo bgabo bavavanure nâ€™uburyarya;(5) Tuzosengera uburinzi kuri twebge no ku miryango yacu mu bihe bitoroshe igihugu cacu nâ€™isi bigiye kwinjiramwo kandi tuzoshime twigina Uhoraho Imana yacu.Ku giti cawe, nawe urafatanye nâ€™abera bose iyo minsi 5 wiyiriza usenga mukwifatanya nâ€™amasinzi yâ€™Abarundi bari mu gihugu no mu mahanga kugira ngo ugutakamba kwacu kuzohagurutse Uhoraho ku ntebe maze yiyizire kudutabara, nkuko yabikoreye ubgoko bgayo na mbere [KUVAYO 3:7-8], Amen!

Muri Parcem Burundi turibaza tuti ni gute amafaranga #Reta itoza aguma yiyongera ukwo umwaka utashe , nâ€™amadeni agafatwa ariko igisata câ€™amagara yâ€™abantu ntigitezwe imbere ngo gihabwe uburyo bukwiye.

Turavye mu mahera #Reta iriko irakoresha muri uyu mwaka hariho amahera arenga imiliyaridi ijana yarakwiye gushirwa mubisata bibikwiye.Ikindi twabonye ni amahera aja mu mishara yâ€™abakozi bo hejuru mubushikirangaji butandukanye bagahembwa amahera menshi kandi bakaba ari benshi aho guhemba neza abakozi baja ku rubuga nkabo baganga baja kuvura umwenegihugu kuko nibo bazana umusaruro uboneka.

Nkâ€™amafaranga yagenewe ubushikirangaji bwâ€™amagara yâ€™abantu angana nâ€™imiliyaridi 172 , nâ€™izindi 164 zizova hanze ucubona neza ko ico gisata kidafise uburyo bukwiye.Reta yari ikwiye gufata nka nkama ico kibazo , amafaranga agashirwa ahâ€™akanewe , hanyuma hagaca habaho igenzura rikomeye ku bushikiranganji bwose ryâ€™ingene bukoresha amafaranga buba bwahawe.

title: Imbuto zâ€™ibikoti vyimbuka cane mu ntara zimwezimwe vyashitse muÂ gihugu
content:
Ni urwaruka rwo muri komine Kayanza umutumba #Kinyamukizi rugizwe nâ€™abahungu 5 hamwe nâ€™abakobwa 25 bahurikiye muri koperative Â«Â Mbegera buniniÂ Â» batoye ubuhinga bwo kubangurira imyumbati ikimbuka cane ku buryo igiti kimwe gusa gishobora kuvako imyumbati iri hagati ya 70 â€“ 100 igapima nkâ€™ibiro 100 canke birenga bivanye nâ€™uko wayikurikiranye mu kiringo kiri hagati yâ€™amezi 8 nâ€™umwaka umwe

Emmanuel Barukinamwo arongoye iyo koperative agira ati: Â«Â Twatanguye mu mwaka wa 2009, ico gihe twarima imyumbati yo gufungura gusa duca tubona yuko dukoze umugambi wagutse ko vyotugirira akamaro mbere nâ€™abandi bakaharonkera akarushoÂ Â»

Nayo ku bijanye nâ€™ubuhinga bakoresha mu kubangurira iyo myumbati Emmanuel agira ati: Â«Â Dufata igikotikoti câ€™umwumbati usanzwe wâ€™ikirundi tukagifatanya nâ€™ikindi câ€™igiti citwa ikiraganyina (igiparipari, igitaraza) dukoresheje ubuhinga twize, mukuyitera naho twimba ikinogo gipima imetero kwadarato tugasukamwo ikivumvu câ€™umwavu hama tugashingamwo ca giti kibanguriye kimwe câ€™umwumbati usanzwe nico kija musi akaba arico gishorako imyumbati, hejuru naho hakaduga kimwe câ€™igiparipari, kandi usoromye imyumbati igiti uca usubira kugitera kwakundi nyeneÂ Â»

Kuva babitanguye gushika ubu, ngo baramaze kurima, amahegitari 9 mu ntara zitandukanye kandi nâ€™ababanyi barahagirira akunguko kuko baharonkera akazi kuko hageze kurima bashobora gukoresha abakozi 200 bahembwa ku musi

Nkâ€™uko Emmanuel abandanya abitwiganira ngo baramaze kuronka amashirahamwe yo mu #Burundi bakorana, abagurira imyumbati bagaca bayihinguramwo ifu ishobora no kuvamwo iyo gukoramwo imikate nâ€™ibindi. Ngo bararonse nâ€™isoko muri #Mozambique bashoramwo imyumbati, ndetse bakaba bimirije gukorana nâ€™irindi shirahamwe ryo mu gihugu ca #Tanzaniya

Arongera agasaba Reta ko yobashigikira bagashikana iyo myumbati mu ntara zose no mu benegihugu bose, cane cane agahamagarira abari mu mashirahamwe, ko bokura amaboko mu mpuzu bakarima iyo myumbati kubwinshi kuko yunguka cane kandi mu mwanya muto ndetse ntinafatwa nâ€™ingwara cane

Uwipfuza ko bamuha imivyaro yâ€™ico giterwa câ€™imyumbati ngo yobegera bakavugana canke akakura Emmanuel asanzwe arongoye iyo koperative kuri +257 79 783 399

title: Ubuhanuzi buhambaye ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi ngubwoÂ burashitse
content:
IMBURI Nâ€™UBUHANUZI: Evelyne NTUNZENIMANA BATAZIRA MUSUMARI ASUBIRIYE KWEREKWA IBINTU BIHAMBAYE KU BURUNDI: ISEZERANO RIRASHITSE.

Evelyne NTUNZWENIMANA yeretswe ingene amasezerano ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi agire ashike, ibigiye kuba vyose nâ€™ingene vyose bizokurikirana. Biteye ubgoba.Uyo Evelyne Ntunzwenima ni umukenyezi wâ€™umurundikazi yavukiye mu gihugu câ€™Uburundi, mu ntara ya Gitega muri Komone Mutaho. Yavutse kwâ€™igenekerezo 5 zâ€™ukwezi kawa kane (Ndamukiza) mu mwaka wa 1974. Kubera indyane igihugu cacu caciyemwo yahavuye ahungira mu gihugu ca Tanzaniya mu nkambi yâ€™impunzi ya KARAGO muri Kibondo. Aho niho yaronkeye izina ryâ€™iritazirano rya MUSUMARI kubera yari akerebutse, ari umuhizi akaba nâ€™umukuru wâ€™umugwi wakina umupira wâ€™amaguru nâ€™uwamaboko. Arazwi cane kuko yarabaye umukuru wâ€™indero (Coordinatrice) aho i Karago mu gihugu ca Tanzaniya mugabo ubu atuye mu gihugu ca Amerika. Iryo zina ryiritazirano ryaramukurikiranye gushika naho umuvugishwakazi wâ€™umunyamerika yitwa Desiree BROWN yamubgiye yuko yitwa musumali (Nail) nka wawundi bateye mu kiganza ca Yesu Kristo.Uhoraho yaramwihishuriye incuro nyunsi yongera amuha ubuhanuzi bginshi kwâ€™ishengero no ku gihugu. Tuzoza turabashikiriza bukebuke. Mugiye kumwiyumvira kwâ€™ihishurirwa yahawe mu mwaka wa 2012 ryerekeye amungane ane (4) yahawe nâ€™Uhoraho Imana kwâ€™ishengero ryose ryitirirwa Imana yo mwâ€™ijuru. [1. Batereye amagara hejuru, umwe wese ni asame ayiwe; 2. Izere, uhinduke, wihane maze wandike ibaruwa ryâ€™igisabo; 3. Ntuze wigere wigira kabizi kuko ntaco uzi; 4. Ntuze wigere uba umucamanza wâ€™abandi.] Afise nâ€™ihishurirwa ritangaje ryitwa E.D.C (Evaluation, Decision Conclusion). Atubikiye amabanga menshi yâ€™ijuru muzoza murahishurirwa.Dufise imburi nyinshi yataze ku gihugu cacu câ€™Uburundi no kubindi bihugu tuzoza turabashikiriza co kimwe nâ€™ubundi buvugishwa bginshi yahawe kwâ€™ishengero.

title: Umukozi wâ€™Imana Alphonse Niyonzima arasubiriye gutera akamo Abarundi ngo bihane kuko igihe câ€™ishitswa ryâ€™amasezeranoÂ gishitse
content:
IMBURI Nâ€™UBUHANUZI BUHAMAGARIRA ABARUNDI BOSE KWIHANA Nâ€™UKWEZWA KUKO IBIHE BISHITSE.

Alphonse NIYONZIMA nâ€™umwe mu bantu bagendanye na BEBA Guidiyoni kandi nawe yahavuye yerekwa ibintu bitari bike ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi.Imburi iburira umuntu wese yacokoye akanegura intumwa zâ€™Imana zihamagarira Abarundi ukwihana no kwezwa mu kwitegurira kwinjira mu masezerano Uhoraho Imana yasezeraniye Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana ryi Burundi.Mu mwaka wa 2020 yaravugishijwe ati hasigaye igihe gito co gusemerera: Â« kwugarwa kwo gisemerera. Â»Ni umuhirwe uwamaze kwihana no gusaba kwinjira mu masezerano yâ€™Imana.Uwaronse ubu butumwa bgâ€™imburi akabgizera kandi akabusangiza abandi ari nâ€™impera ikomeye nâ€™atarambirwa akava ku rutonde.Haragowe uwahawe ubu butumwa akabucokora nkuko vyari bimeze mu gihe ca Nowa, nkuko yacokoye Mpwemu wâ€™ubuntu.Uwahawe ibi Vyera vyâ€™Imana akabiterera imbga nâ€™ingurube zarabikandagiye kandi zizomutabagura.Musenge cane kuko imbga nâ€™ingurube zigira zihindukirire abizera ukuri kwâ€™ubuvugishwa bgâ€™Uhoraho Imana mugabo ntaco zizobagira kuko Uhoraho Imana yaraziziritse.Uhoraho Imana yateje ibisazi izo mbga nâ€™ingurube ni navyo bizotuma zihonera mu manga.Komeza ibicaniro vyâ€™amasengesho mu ngo zanyu no ku mitumba iwanyu. Aho muri hose naho mu gendera hose mukomeze kwama musenga.Mugendane ubgenge muri vyose: Mu mvugo, mu ngiro no mu migenderanire nâ€™abandi.Ongereza amasengesho menshi mu kubaho kwawe, wahora usenga rimwe ku munsi usenge gatatu, mu gitondo, ku muhingamo no mwijoro. Wahora usenga kenshi ni wame mu masengesho imbere yâ€™Imana.Ucacure imigozi yâ€™imitego ikuboshe yose, ube uwidegemvya ata vyaha bikuboshe canke ikintu cose cogukwegera mu caha.Rekurana nâ€™ibintu vyo mu mubiri vyo kubuza umwidegemvyo bikagukura mu Mana. Hari ibintu nkâ€™amatongo, amazu, imiryango nâ€™ibindi, bireke bigende, babitware kuko Imana iraje kugushumbusha umurengera. ibintu vyiza utigeze umenya biri imbere.Radio ISEZERANO INTERNATIONALE yâ€™Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana yarabashikirije imburi nyishi zâ€™abahanuzi bâ€™Abarundi nâ€™abanyamahanga babura intambara yâ€™Uhoraho Imana ije kurandurana nâ€™imizi ikibi catse indaro mu gihugu cacu kuva citwa UBURUNDI. Ishengero rya Yesu Kristo-Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana ryarahaye akaryo ko kwihana, kwiyeza, kubatizwa no kwuzuzwa Mpwemu Yera Abarundi bose, abari mu mahanga nâ€™abari mu gihugu kugira ngo ntihazogire uwugira ico yireguza kidafashe. Ubu ni ca gihe uwanyuma abishira mu ngiro kuko bugira bgire.Ubu naho yibukijwe ngo abibutse ibintu bikuru vyo kwitondera kuko ibihe bigeze.Ibintu vyihutirwa dusaba umurundi wese aho ari hose:

Abubatse musengere ingo zanyu: abafasha banyu, abana banyu nâ€™imiryango yanyu. Ntihagire uwiyerereza kandi uwugiye kure atahe kare .Abimirije kugira ubugeni, mu musenge cane kandi musengere abo muzokwubakana mu menye yuko atari intumwa za satani kandi musengere uburinzi bgâ€™abo mugiye kwâ€™ubakana.Abantu mufata ingendo ndende, mu ndege, mu miduga, mu bgato nâ€™amatereni, musenge cane imbere yuko mufata ingendo kandi musenge muri no muri ivyo bikoresho vyâ€™ukwiyunguruza.Abavyeyi bibungenze musengere cane ibibondo biri munda kandi musengere nâ€™ubugingo bganyu kuko satani yavyuye ingunza.Muntu wese wahawe isezerano wabariwe nâ€™Uhoraho Imana atari bimwe vyâ€™abavugishwa bâ€™ibinyoma, mwirinde kwihumanya no kwiyanduza kuko Imana iraje kubishura muri iyi minsi. Hagiye kuba ibintu bibi cane ku bahumanije igihugu nâ€™ishengero ryâ€™Imana.IHANGA RYERA RYâ€™IMANA risavye Abarundi bose bizeye ijambo ryâ€™Imana ryanditse muri Bibiliya Yera nâ€™iryavugishijwe nâ€™abavugishwa nâ€™Imana [2 Ingoma 20:20] yuko ABAKRISTO bose (1) duhuza imitima nâ€™inama, (2) tubabarane, (3) tugire urukundo rwâ€™abavukana muri Kristo Yesu. (4) Umuntu wese acire bugufi muginzi we, (5) muharire ababagiriye nabi kugira ngo Uhoraho Imana ari mwâ€™ijuru akubonemwo umwana wiwe wâ€™ukuri.Harageze yuko abantu bose bamenya yuko ivyari magera vyageranuye.Tugarukane igitinyiro câ€™Uhoraho Imana mu gihugu no mwâ€™ishengero, abatandukanijwe nâ€™ibi canke biriya basabane mbabazi, biyunge. Umwami Yesu Kristo yamamare!NumÃ©ro ya Alphonse Niyonzima +1 605 400-5580.

Ngize gutrya nza mbona abagabo batatu (3) bambaye impuzu zera mubitugu, bari haruguru yanje batambuka nâ€™amaguru munzira.Ibirenge vyabo sinabibona kuko bari kure yanje gato.Babiri (2) bagenda begeranye nâ€™uwundi umwe (1)inyuma yabo gato.Uwo mugabo yagendera inyuma yabo naciye mbona akiriza ukuboko

hejuru yerekanisha ikimenyetso vubanavuba (anyarutsa) kurya kwabasirikare bakora.Nanje mbonye ivyâ€™uwomugabo akoze naciye nipfuza kubona nokumenya ivyo yerekanye mu buryo nkâ€™ubwo ivyarivyo,Kuko yaciye aguma ahagaze ahonyene abiraba.Kandi nabamwe bari imbere yiwe, ntibongeye kubandanya, baciye bahagarara baraba iyo yerekanishije ukuboko kwâ€™iwe, kwerekeje mâ€™ubuseruko.Ico gihe naciye nihuta ngo negereze ndabe ivyo yabonye kuko nibaza ngo ngirango abonye abagwanyi bateye nkahantu. Ndi hafi kubashikira naciye mpagarara ndaba iyo berekeje amaso mâ€™ubuseruko.Yoooo Mwami wanje naciye mbona ibihambaye biteye ubwoba cane !!! Ndavye hejuru nabonye amafoto yabantu benshi cane, ntamenye igitigiri cabo, batonze umurongo, uhereye kubana batobato uko bagenda basumbasumbana, gushitsa kubantu bakuze. .Kandi icantangaje ntiyari amafoto nkamwe tumenyereye kubona afise amarangi , oya ntamarangi yarangwa kurayo mafoto,ahubwo yaramafoto adasanzwe,kuko ntabona ko yoba yacapishijwe nâ€™ikaramu canke nâ€™ikaramu yigiti canke zakaramu zâ€™amarangi zimenyereye gucapishwa nkuko bisanzwe.Intimbatimbo yivyo bicapo yari yagutse nkaho umenga vyoba vyacapishijwe nurutoke.Icogihe navyitegereza ubwoba bwandengeye, kuburyo atako nobivuga.Nkiriko ndabiraba numiwe nivyo ndiko ndabona, nca numva ngoâ€ kandi abo bantu bose nabapfuye bishwe muntambara zaheze canke zarenganyeâ€.Kandi vyaboneka ko abo bantu bagira bahoregwe kuko benshi bishwe ataco bazira.Ngitekewe nâ€™ubwoba nihweza ,naciye mbona ijambo ryanditswe haruhande yayo mashusho yabantu hejuru mukirere ngo â€œNGIRYO ISEZERANO RIRASHITSEâ€.Nongera kubona nâ€™irindi jambo rigufi ryanditse mucongereza ngoâ€ SENDâ€ (rungika). Ubwo nyene nkirangiza gusoma iryo jambo rigufi nagiyembona vyabintu vyose naraba biri kure yanje mubuseruko, vyanyegereye naho mpagaze mukanya isase.Yoooo! Bimaze kunyegera ahondi ho ,ubwoba burantwikira no kurushiriza uko narindi .Icatumye ngira ubwoba kurusha, nâ€™uko naciye mbona nâ€™ivyo ntari nabonye, nkibiraba ubwambere, bikiri mâ€™ubuseruko hejuru kure yanje cane.Nâ€™ukuvuga naciye mbona ari ikintu kidasanzwe kinini cane kandi kirekire gitembera gifise amapine matomato gisizwe nâ€™irangi risa nâ€™agahama (red),hejuru canditsweko ivyandiko.Icantangaje, nâ€™uko nabona kincako kigenda, kandi sinumve nâ€™aho gihinda, canke ngo gisume.Haba namba, cagendana ubwitonzi cane kitihuta, kâ€™uburyo noshobora nogukozako ukuboko.Naciye nguma mpagaze aho nyene, ntangura kwiyumvira ngo hinge ndabe neza bino bintu vyanditseko ndabisome menye ico bivuga!! Ha ! Nkivyiyumvira umutima waciye uvyanka ubwo nyene ntangura kuvuga ndavyatura nâ€™ijwi risohoka, nâ€™ubwoba bwinshi ngoâ€EKA IBI BINTU NTIBINKWIRIYE KO JEWE NDABIRABA NGO NDABISOME KUKO ARâ€™AMABANGA Yâ€™IMANA!!!.â€. Haleluya .Naciye nkebanura umusaya ndabisha kâ€™uruhande ,nca nsigara ndabirabira hasi nakajisho kamwe ngo nsimbone ivyandiko biriko nâ€™uko gikozwe, kuko sinabonye imbere ngo mbone nâ€™umushoferi agitwaza.Erega ushima bitari ivyoroshe sinabonye numbarira ngo ntusome ayo majambo nagiye numva umutima umbwira ko bindengeye kurarika umutwe ngo nsome.

Ubwo rero niho nâ€™arorera ico kintu kireruye ,AMABANGA Yâ€™IMANA kirarengana ngihagaze hahandi nyene. Ico kintu si imodoka, si ibasi, si itereni ahubwo ni umukogote Wâ€™IMANA warureye AMABANGA Yayo .AmenIvyo biheze naciye mbona umugore aje ndamubaza ati, mbega woba unzaniye abana banje kombona hagira habe ibikomeye?

Nawe arishura ngoâ€ ekaye kuko nanje atavyo namenya. Ubwo nyene naciye nihuta ngo simbe ndabatore. Nduze imuhira kuzana abobana naciye mbona intambara ikomeye yamaze gutangura. Nta muntu nabona ariko aragwana ahubwo nabonye imipanga iteye ubwoba cane yizunguriza nkakurya kwâ€™imibanga ya kajugujugu. Iyomipanga ibiri yasa nibara ryagahama(ritukura) canke (red) iyindimipanga ibiri yarera(white).Yooo! Navyo nti vyari vyoroshe sinabonye kajugujugu, canke ngobone uwoba ariko akoresha iyo mipanga. Ariko ico bikoze iyo mipanga yari yururutse hasi gushika aho itema igatongoza no hagati mubitoke.Ndabibonye ndatewe nubwoba kandi bituma nsubira inyuma gatoya, nibaza abobana bari aho imipanga yatanguye gutema. Ubwonyene Naciye ngarura agatima nibuka muvyahanuwe ko abativanze nivyikigihe ubuhingiro buri Kâ€™UHORAHO gusa. Ndavuga ati kumbure iyo mâ€™ipanga irabasimba .Inyuma yaho naciye mbona ahantu hari akayira kikirundi gasa nakakera ubwatsi bwoharuguru nâ€™ubwo hepfo buhura bugafukereza iyonzira, nca ntibira muriyonzira ndaryama. Wamugore twavugana ncadamubona agihagaze ndamurya akara ati, â€œReka kuguma uhagaze raba aho utibira naweâ€. Yaciye araba aho aryama muri yanzira nyenye. Ndimuriyo nzira ndyamye, nubitse inda ntangura gusenga nsaba IMANA ko yondokora ngo naho ningenda nzembone rya Sezerano. Ubwo nyene naciye nikoma nariko ndasenga ninginga IMANA Amen!Igice Ca KabiriMaze kwikoma naciye ngwa mugahundwe nâ€™ivyo mbonye, ncamara umwanya nibaza ivyobintu akokanya nyene nca mfata akanya kogushima IMANA kuvyo neretswe nokubaza ati â€œNone ga MANA UHORAHA ko numvise harimwo ugushitsa Isezerano, kandi hakaba hariho nâ€™ abandi dufatanije inzira ija mwâ€™ijuru ,sinoshobora kubamenyesha ivyo nabonyeâ€? Inyuma yivyo nca mfata akanya kokwandika ivyo neretswe. Mpejeje kuvyandika nca numva ko nkwiye gufata akandi kanya kogusenga.Nuko nongera nsaba IMANA kwakundi kwambere nyene. Ndavuga ati â€œKandi nivyaba bikwiye ko benedata babimenyeshwa, vyombera vyiza umpaye ikimenyetso cerekana ko nkwiriye kubivuga bose bakabimenyaâ€. Ndagije nca nongera ndaryama kandi. Mu Burundi hagize iminsi havugwa abantu bicana hakoreshejwe uburozi, isumu, amangetengete nâ€™ibindi gushika nâ€™aho sentare yâ€™igihugu yagiriza uwahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere gushaka kwica umukuru wâ€™igihugu akoresheje amangetengete. Bikaba vyari bisanzwe binugwanugwa yuko PrÃ©sident Petero Nkurunziza yicishijwe isumu. Hari nâ€™abandi benshi mu ba gÃ©nÃ©raux nâ€™abandi bategetsi tuzi barusimvye!

Abarundi bariyambitse ibara no mu makungu. Harageze yuko duhindura abantu nâ€™ibintu!

Akamoto kâ€™ibiraya biboze nako nyenye ni isumu ku muntu. Biduhuka umunuko witwa Â« Solanine Â» wica kubi. Umuntu atangura gutakaza ubgenge hanyuma agaca apfa. Iyo bakugaburiye ibiraya biboze, umeneka umutwe, ukadawha, ugacibgamwo, ingingo zigahagarara (paralysie) hanyu ugasezera isi. Muze muririnda kurya no kunywa ivyo mubonye vyose na cane cane murâ€™iyi minsi hibonekeza inzara mu gihugu.

Nti duhakana yuko abantu bahana ishano ku buryo butangaje ngaha mu gihugu cacu, ariko hariho bamwe barya ivyo kurya bibi Â«Intoxication alimentaire Â» kubera kutabimenya, kubera isuku rike canke nâ€™amagara yabo umubiri ntiwigwanire; hanyuma bigaheza bikavugwa ngo bamuhaye uburozi. Umuntu wese akomeze gusuzuma neza ivyo afungura.

title: Umutima w Umwami Dawidi warâ€™umezeÂ gute?
content:
UMUTIMA WA DAWIDI

Â«Â Mazâ€™ umwami Dawidi arinjira, yicara imbere yâ€™Uhoraho, aravuga, ati Mwami Uhoraho, mbega jewe nâ€™inda nâ€™indesho, nâ€™inzu yanje, narâ€™ iki, kubona wagiye unzigama gushitsa nâ€™ubu?2 Samweli 7:18â€³

Aha nâ€™igihe umuvugishwa Natani yabwiye Dawidi ko Uhoraho azokomeza ingoma yiwe ibihe vyose.Ariko kandi Dawidi yari yipfuje kwubakira ingoro Uhoraho,nawe amubwira ko izokwubakwa nâ€™umwana wiwe.

Dawidi yarâ€™afise umutima utangaje.Mubuhangange bwiwe bwose nkâ€™umwami,ntiyigeze yibagira kure yavuye,nâ€™uwahamukuye(Uhoraho).

Bibiliya ivuga ko Dawidi yarâ€™ umuhizi wâ€™inkomezi(1samwel16:18),ariko ntiyigeze aha agaciro ko ubwo buhizi aribwo bwamuha kunesha.Yaravuze ati jewe nâ€™inda nâ€™indesho,â€¦,nari iki kuba wagiye uranzigama gushitsa nâ€™ubu?

Benshi Imana ibagiriye neza,ni bakeya bokwivuga ngo jewe nâ€™inda nâ€™indesho,nari ikiâ€¦,ahubwo baba bageze aho batangura kwereka abandi ko nabo basigaye bakomeye,â€¦Nibakeyi kandi bibagira ubuhizi bwabo(ubwenge bwabo,abo bazinanye batumye bikunda,abiwabo bifise,â€¦),bakavuga ati Uhoraho yagiye andokora(anteza intambwe).

Ikindi,Dawidi no mubuhangange bwiwe nkâ€™umwami,yarâ€™agifise umutima wo kurondera Uhoraho.

Benedata,umuntu akunda Imana ntamwanya wo gusenga yobura,nâ€™ubwo yoba ajejwe amabanga angana gute.Ngira ntamuntu afise amabanga menshi nkâ€™umwami,ariko Dawidi uwo mwanya yarâ€™awufise.

Umwanya wâ€™Imana ushobora kugabanuka birumvikana,ariko ntushobora kubura,nimba koko ifise ikibanza cambere .

Umuntu ashobora kuja kukazi asenga,agataha asenga,agasenga ari muri douche,â€¦iyo yose nâ€™imyanya abavuga ko atamwanya bafise bokoresha.Kuko igikora kumutima Imana sâ€™ugusenga uhumirije,ahubwo nâ€™umutima uyirondera.

Dawidi yari yibuka iyo yavuye,nâ€™uwahamushikanye(Uhoraho),kandi yagumye arâ€™umukunzi wâ€™Uhoraho,kuko yarâ€™afise umutima umurondera.Natwe dukwiye kugira umutima nkâ€™uyo wa Dawidi,nawe azoshishikara adukomeza muvyacu no mubacu.Muhezagirwe. Muhezagirwe .

title: Abategetsi bâ€™igihugu câ€™Uburundi bahisemwo kubesha kugira ngo bahumurize abenegihugu aho gutumaÂ bihorera
content:
Vyose vyatanguriye mu kigege câ€™igihugu aho ubugenduzi bgâ€™ikigega mpuzamakungu bgagirine umukuru wâ€™igihugu câ€™Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye kuba ariwe yasahuye amafaranga mvamakungu yâ€™igihugu. Ukwagiriza ico caha rikaba ryakurikiye ihindurwa ryâ€™inoti zâ€™igihugu câ€™Uburundi. Yagirijwe ubgo busuma, hakurikiye ipfungwa ryâ€™umukuru wâ€™ico kigega câ€™igihugu. Inyuma yâ€™ibura ryâ€™amafaranga yâ€™agaciro nâ€™amafaranga mu gihugu, ntihabujije yuko Abarundi baguma babona ingendo zitwara uburyo bginshi zâ€™umutambukanyi wâ€™umukuru wâ€™igihugu, mbere nâ€™izumukuru wâ€™igihugu we nyene nâ€™abamugendanira.

Ivyo vyose bikurikirwa nâ€™inzara yâ€™ibifungurwa yibonekeza mu gihugu cose kuko ibisumwa bizimba cane canke bikanabura. Si ivyo gusa, igitoro kirabura mu gihugu cose, ishirahamwe rihingura isukari SOSUMO rirugara, ishirahamwe rihingura ibizuku ONATOUR rirugaye, abantu bafise nâ€™ivyo guteka barabura nâ€™aho bagurira amakara.

Abantu bagiriza umukuru wâ€™igihugu yuko aho gufata ingingo zibereye ari wa muntu aguma yidoga nkâ€™uko womenga akora mumashirahamwe adaharanira inyugu za politike canke nkâ€™uko umengo nâ€™uwo mu migambge irwanya umugambge uri ku butegetsi nkâ€™uko atazi ico ajejwe. Ikindi giteye amakenga nâ€™uko intwazangabo itwara ihonguriro SOSUMO yemeza yuko iryo shirahamwe ritahagaritswe nâ€™ivyuma vyapfuye, ngo ryahagartswe nâ€™imvura yabaye nyinshi kandi ko abantu batogira ubgoba ngo kuko bazoguma babazanira isukari mvamakungu. Bati none ko igihugu atamafaranga yâ€™agaciro ahari iyo sukari avuga azokura hanze azoyigura iki! Bati ko dufise amafoto yerekana ibimashini vyâ€™iryo hinguriro atwara vyapfuye, abesha ngo bimwungure iki canke vyungure iki igihugu! Bati ko dufise amafoto yerekana imirima yâ€™ibikaju yatwawe, ubgo iyo iba urugo rwiwe rwari gutwarwa nâ€™umuvo ntiyari kuba yarukingiye! Ibinyoma bavuga ngo ni vyinshi murâ€™iyi nkuru. Kuberâ€™iki ibikorwa vyâ€™amahinguriro nkâ€™aya bitazezwa abantu bavyigiye, babifitiye ubuhinga kandi bazi bakanakunda ivyo bakora!

Ibikorwa vyâ€™ihinguriro ryâ€™isukari SOSUMO vyarahagaze nkâ€™uko vyemezwa nâ€™abashikiranganji babiri, uwujejwe uburimyi hamwe nâ€™uwo ubudandaji. Basigura ko vyavuye ku mvura nyinshi iriko iragwa muri ino minsi yatumye imirima yâ€™ibikaju itwarwa. Babishikirije, kuri uyu wa mbere, bariko barishura ku makenga yâ€™abashingamateka bibaza ko hoba hari icinyegeje inyuma.

Umushingamateka Pascal Gikeke yabajije umushikiranganji ajejwe uburimyi ati : Â«Â Nyakwubahwa mushikiranganji muri SOSUMO ibibazo bihari ni ibibazo nyabaki? Umuyobozi mukuru ayirongoye yaravuze yâ€™uko bahagaritse ibikorwa kubera imvura. Ubwo koko ni kubera imvura yatumye isarura muri SOSUMO rihagarara canke hari ikindi coba cinyegeje inyuma?Â Â»

Prosper Dodiko yishuye yemeza ko imvura ariyo yabujije iyimbura ryâ€™ibikaju kubera ko imashini zica zinyika, zikabura uko zibandanya. Ku ruhande rwâ€™ubudandaji, umushikiranganji ajejwe ico gisata avuga ko ababishoboye barekuriwe kuzana isukari bayikura hanze yâ€™igihugu. Marie Chantal Nijimbere asigura ariko ko haca haba ikibazo câ€™amafaranga mvamakungu.

title: Twinjiye mu masengesho ahambaye yâ€™iminsi 7 yo gusenyura inzitiro za Yeriko yâ€™Uburundi, ingo wifatanyeÂ natwe.
content:
URUGENDO RWO GUSENYURA INZITIRO Zâ€™I YERIKO MU BURUNDI

Isenyurwa ryâ€™inzitiro za Yeriko ryabaye ikimenyetso câ€™ishitswa ryâ€™isezerano kwâ€™ihanga rya Isirayeli. No mu gihe ca none kugira ngo Uhoraho Imana igushitseko ivyo yakuvuzeko, ibanza gusenyura ibimeze nkâ€™imisozi biri imbere yawe nkuko inzitiro zi Yeriko zari zihagaze imbere yâ€™ubgoko bgâ€™Imana.Mu gihugu cacu câ€™Uburundi, hariho abantu benshi bazi neza yuko igihugu gifise isezerano cahawe nâ€™Imana. Mugabo hariho nâ€™abandi kubera inyungu zabo bwite bagerageza kurihakana no kuryankisha Abarundi ngo ni ibintu bitabaho. Isezerano iyo ryahawe Ihanga, kutarimenya canke kurihakana ntaco bihindura kâ€™Uhoraho Imana kuko hari abo irihishurira bakaryemera maze ikajana nâ€™abo bemeye. Hariho ibishika mu gihugu, abantu bakirigwa baridoga ngo ibi na biriya birabuze mbere ababarongoye bakagerageza inzira zose bagasanga ntizishika kubera baba batwaye ibintu vyose mu bgenge bgabo gusa basize Imana inyuma canke bayitanze imbere.Abantu ntibatahura igituma ubutunzi butifashe neza, imico yâ€™abantu igatera itituka maze ivyo bigakurikirwa nâ€™ubukene, inzara, ibura ryâ€™iki na kiriya. Ivyo bitera abantu gufungura nabinabi, ukwivuza nabinabi, ukwiyunguruza nabinabi bakanata icizere ca kazoza kuko baba bafise amagara adafashe. Umuntu iyo atabona iyo aja aca afatwa nâ€™umwiheburo. Umwiheburo nawo utuma abantu batari bake baja kurondera amasumiro bakomokera mu mahanga. Abokoreye igihugu bagasanzara bakangara, abatari bake bagasumirwa nâ€™impwemu ya nyamwihebuza yohava inabatuma kwiyahura.Urazi ingene bibabaje kubaho utazi ingene uzogaburira umuryango, ingene abana bazoja kwiga, ingene uzovuza uwurwaye canke ukama wibaza igituma udafise aho kuba heza nkâ€™abandi! Urazi kubaho uriwe nâ€™uwogutunganirije, uwokurenganuye akaba ariwe akurenganya, uwofashe ingingo ngo ubeho neza akaba ariwe agufatira ingingo zo kugukandamiza!Turagomba kunesha ivyo bigeragezo mu guhamagara Uhoraho Imana ngo ize itabare Abarundi twese. Nti dushobora kwihanganira kuguma murâ€™ivyo bibi iyi myaka yose ataco dukoze kandi mwâ€™Ijuru dufise Imana ishobora vyose, natwe mu gihugu turi Ihanga ryubaha Uhoraho Imana. Turagomba yuko igihugu câ€™Uburundi kiba intara ikukira ubgami bgâ€™Imana mwâ€™ijuru.Inkuru yâ€™ingene Yosuwa yarongoye Ihanga rya Isirayeli kuja gusenyura ibisika vyâ€™i Yeriko iratwigisha cane ingene dushobora kuva mu bigeragezo vyâ€™igihugu kubera Uhoraho ari Imana yâ€™ukwizigirwa kandi ari Umwami ahambaye. Ivyashikiye Abisirayeli vyari ishitswa ryâ€™Isezerano rihambaye Imanayarabasezeraniye kugira ngo binjire mu gihugu câ€™Isezerano nkuko natwe yadusezeraniye Uburundi butemba amata nâ€™ubuki.Mose atarapfa, yari yarabasezeraniye yuko Yosuwa ariwe azomusubirira mu kurongora Abisirayeli kugira ngo abashikane mu gihugu câ€™isezerano. Bahejeje kujabuka uruzi Yorodani, Yeriko carico gisagara ca mbere bategerezwa kubanza gufata. [Yosuwa 6:1-27]Murâ€™iyo nkuru dukuramwo ubumenyi nyamukuru buturongora kumenya ingene twokwizera kandi tukongera tugashika ku gukira ivyago vyâ€™ubukene nâ€™akarenganyo vyugarije Ihanga ryacu murâ€™ikino gihe. Hariho nâ€™ibindi vyinshi Imana ishobora kudutabara kuko burya imyenge yâ€™inzu imenywa na nyeneyo.Inzitiro canke ibisika vyâ€™i Yeriko ni ibihe?Nkuko tubisanga mu gitabo ca Yosuwa, Yeriko carico gisagara câ€™abanya Kanani, abisirayeli bashikirako bahejeje kujabuka Yorodani rubanje gukama bakajabuka hanyuma rugaca rusubira guterana. Ico gisagara cari kizengurutswe nâ€™ibihome vyâ€™amabuye binini kandi birebire bikingira ico gisagara ku buryo ata muntu nâ€™umwe yashobora ku vyurira ngo ashike hejuru ngo ashobore kwinjira canke ngo asohoke ico gisagara. Inzugi zinjira murâ€™ico gisagara zari zugaje ibihindizo kugira ngo ntihagire umunyesirayeli canke uwundi mwansi abinjirana. Kwâ€™ihanga rya Isirayeli, iki cari igihe gihambaye co kubona yuko koko Isezerano Imana yabahaye ribaye ukuri naho bari barabonye ibindi bitangaza nko ku kiyaga gitukura, nka manu mu bugaragwa, nkâ€™inzoka yâ€™umuringa, nkâ€™igicu cabamurikira mwâ€™ijoro kikabakingira izuba ku murango na yorodani ikama imbere yabo. Ivyo bari barabibonye mugabo bari bakeneye kubona igitangaza co kwinjira mu gihugu câ€™Isezerano nyezina kugira ngo bive mu buvugishwa bibe ukuri kwo mu buzima bgabo bga minsi yose. Ubgo ntavyo ubona nkâ€™ibisika binini bikomeye nâ€™inzugi zugaje ibihindizo vyivyuma mu gihugu, mwâ€™ishengero no mu buzima bgawe? Imana iragiye kubisenyurira hasi bicike umukungugu gusa mu kanya gato. Na twebge hari ibihambaye Imana yadukoreye mugabo turagomba kubona ishitswa ryâ€™amasezerano nyezina.Ibisika vyi Yeriko vyarundukiye hasi gute?Imana yari yabariye Yosuwa ingene ari bu bigenze, ico bakwiriye gukora kugira ngo ivyo bihome bihomvoke bitume abisirayeli banesha Yeriko kugira ngo ibe iyabo. â€œKu munsi ugira indwi, bazunguruka igisagara incuro ndwi, abaherezi bariko baravuza inzamba. Wumvise barandiriye mukuvuza inzamba, barira abantu bose bihe akamo; aho rero izo nzitiro zizoca zisenyuka umwe wese ace yinjirira aho atumbereye.â€ [Yosuwa 6:4-5]. Uko nyene niko vyagenze.minsi itandatu, bazungurutse Yeriko rimwe rimwe ku munsi, abaherezi bareruyeisandugu yâ€™Isezerano kandi bafise nâ€™inzamba ariko mu gacerere ntangere. Ku munsi ugira indwi baca babigenza nkâ€™uko babariwe, za nzitiro za Yeriko zica zirasenyuka nabo baca barinjira biba birabaye.Kubga Yosuwa, abaherezi nâ€™ihanga ryose bari kumwe, biyumvira yuko ivyo bintu Imana yababariye ataho bihuriye nâ€™ubuhinga bgo kurwana intambara yo gusenyura ibihome vya Yeriko, ariko Yosuwa yatumye abisirayeli gukora ico Uhoraho Imana yamutumye ataco barengejeko. Kubera isezerano Imana yahaye ihanga yitoranirije no gukora ico yategetse, inzitiro zi Yeriko zarasenyutse ku munsi ugira indwi baca barahanesha ku buryo bgâ€™igitangaza.Ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi rirazi yuko rifise Isezerano ryâ€™Imana ku gihugu no kwâ€™ishengero. Ingorane rifise ni ukudashaka kumenya uwufise ivyo yavuganye nâ€™Imana ngo rimwumvire mu kubikurikiza maze inzitiro zisenyuke. Bamwe bose bashaka kwigirira utuntu twabo. Imana ivuze iti ni mwizere, mwihane, mubatizwe, mwezwe maze mwuzuzwe Mpwemu Yera, bamwe baca bagira bati mwâ€™idini iwacu ivyo ntibabiha agaciro. Abandi bakibaza yuko intambara itogenda uko Uhoraho Imana abivuga bakagomba kuyirwana uko bavyumva, ivyo navyo bigatuma ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi riguma muri sokwe ni ruze navyo bikatera kuguma rizunguruka mu bugaragwa bgâ€™inzara, ubukene, akarenganyo, uguhunga igihugu nâ€™ibindi. Burya biracagora umurundi gukurikiza neza ico yabariwe. Naho aba yakibariwe nâ€™Imana aca ashaka kugikora uko acumva canke gukuramwo inyungu ziwe bgite. Turacakeneye kwigishanya kwubaha itegeko, kwubahiriza ibgirizwa no gukurikiza ikintu uko gitegerezwa kumera.Hariho ibintu indwi vyotwigisha kwâ€™isenyuka rwâ€™ibisika vyi Yeriko.

title: Wabatijwe umubatizo nyabaki?
content:
WOBA WARABATIJWE UMUBATIZO Wâ€™UKURI? CANKE WARASUTSWE!

Mu bantu bari mwâ€™isi bizera Imana nâ€™ijambo ryayo ryanditse muri Bibiliya Yera, bamwe bizera ivyo bigishijwe kandi babariwe nâ€™abantu, abandi bagashika kure kugira ngo bige barabe ico ijambo ubgaryo rivuga ndetse bakanasenga basobanuza Mpwemu wâ€™Imana kugira ngo bamenye ukuri kwose. Umubatizo wâ€™ukuri ni kimwe mu bibazo bibaza kubera yuko umubatizo nâ€™ikintu gihambaye.Kuvyerekeye umubatizo, hariho amashengero adaha agaciro nagato umubatizo, ntibabatize namba, nâ€™abandi babatiza uko bo nyene bibaza yuko vyoba vyiza mukworohereza abantu no ku nyungu zabo. Uwo mugwi wa kabiri urimwo ababatiza inzoya nâ€™abakuze mu kubasuka amazi ku ruhanga mu kibanzabategekanije aho mu rusengero. Hariho nâ€™abandi babatiza mu mazi menshi mu kidengeri bikoreye nâ€™abatwara abizera ku ruzi bakababatiza mwâ€™Izina rya Data, nâ€™iryâ€™Umwana nâ€™irya Mpwemu Yera.Ukubatizwa vyatanguranye nâ€™umuvugishwa Yohana Umubatiza, akabatiza umubatizo wo kwihana ivyaha no kubiharirwa mu kin jana ca mbere witwa uguhumanurwa. [Luka 3:1-3] Uwo Yohana nyene niwe yagize ati: â€œâ€¦Jewe ndababatirisha amazi mugabo uwuhambaye we azobabatirisha Mpwemu Yera nâ€™umuriro.â€[Luka 3:16-17]Aho yavuga Yesu Kristo.Yesu Kristo nawe mukwigisha intumwa ziwe yazibariye ati:â€Jewe nahawe ububasha bgose mwâ€™ijuru no mwâ€™isi. Genda mukwire isi yose, mwigishe amahanga muyahindure abigishwa, mubabatiza mwâ€™Izina rya Data, irya Mwana nâ€™irya Mpwemu Yera, mubigisha kwitondera ivyagezwe vyose, umve ndi kumwe namwe iminsi yose, gushika ku muhero wâ€™isi.â€ [Matayo 28:18-20] Uwo mubatizo niwo amadini nâ€™amashengero menshi ahagazeko mu kubatiza abizera babo.Umwami Yesu yabariye abigishwa biwe ibintu bitanu bihambaye cane murâ€™iri tumwa gukora, umuntu wese agomba gukorera Imana yotegerezwa guhagararako agashikama. Navyo nâ€™ibi:

Mu kinjana ca gatatu, umupatiri yitwa TERUTOLIYANO yaciye avuga ngo ubutatu bugizwe na Data, Mwana na Mutima Mweranda. Uwo nyene ni nawe yazanye ivyizegwa vyâ€™igipagani vyo gusabira abapfuye nâ€™urumenyetso rwâ€™umusaraba rwo kwikora mu gahanga, ku mutima no kubitugu ngo urasenze. Yanatanguje nâ€™umubatizo wo kudimba abantu gatatu mu mazi hataraza uwo gubasuka amazi ku ruhanga. Uko niko bahinduye umubatizo mwâ€™izina rya Yesu Kristo wakoreshwa mwâ€™ishengero Umwami Yesu yashizeho bawusubiriza umubatizo wâ€™ubutatu warusanzwe ukoresha nâ€™amadini yâ€™abapagani.Inyigisho zâ€™ubutatu zishinze imizi mu migenzo yâ€™igipagani yo kuva ku gihe bubaka umunara wi BABELI, i SHANARI hafi yâ€™uruzi EUPHRATE inyuma yâ€™umwuzure wabaye kuri NOWA. Ico gihe Imana yayoberanije indimi zabo batangura kuvuga indimi nyinshi [Itanguriro 11 :1-4] KUSHI yari umwana wa HAMU, umwuzukuru wa NOWA umusavyi wâ€™Imana [Kuvayo 10 :1-6] yafashije umuhungu wiwe gutegura umugambi wo kuganza isi yose bakoresheje ubugambanyi bgo gukora idini ryâ€™umwana wiwe yitwa NIMURODI. Niwe yatanguje iryo dini ryâ€™umugararizo ryo gusenga izuba aca atanguza nâ€™igisagara ca BABULONI. [Itanguriro 10 :8-10 na 11 :4] Bise umunara wi Babubuloni ijambo risigura â€œurugi rwâ€™ijuruâ€ ariko Imana yoyo yawise BABELI risigura Â« kuzazanigwa. Â» [Itanguriro 9 :1] Imana yayoberanije indimi zabo baca barasanzara mu bice bitandukanye vyâ€™isi [Itanguriro 11 :8-9]Kubera Nimurodi yarazi yuko abantu batinya Imana ya Nowa, yari yashinze idini ryo gusenga satani mu mpisho bakavuga yuko basenga ibintu bitatu: â€œumuriro, izuba nâ€™inzoka.â€ Yaciye arongora nyina amuvyara yitwa SEMIRAMISI aca yitwa Umwami wi Babuloni, nyina nawe yitwa umwamikazi wi Babuloni nyene. Ico gihe baratanga ibimazi vyâ€™amaraso yâ€™abana nkuko abasenga satani babikora nâ€™uyu munsi kuko batanga ibimazi vyâ€™amaraso yâ€™abantu. Shemu umuhungu wa Nowa akaba na se wa Nimurodi, yaramufashe amwica amucagaguyemwo uduhimba kugira ngo abere akarorero abantu bose bakora ibizira bagasenga satani. Kubera yacitse ubunywenywe hariho abivugira ngo NIMURODI yariyahuye.Wa mwamikazi Semiramisi yari nyina wa Nimurodi akongera akaba umugore wiwe, yaciye asambana aribungenga, avyara umwana wâ€™umuhungu maze amwita TAMUZI. Aca abesha abantu ngo Nimurodi apfuye yaciye aja kuzuba maze izuba rica rirasira umuco uwo mugore vyatumye yibungenga ati mu bisanzwe ni Nimurodi agarutse avuye ku mana-zuba. Nâ€™uko rero bakoresheje ijambo ubutatu muri Babuloni abantu bagasenga Nimurodi, Tamuzi (Umwana na Semiramisi (Nyina). Nâ€™uko rero Semiramisi yavugako Nimurodi ari Imana Zuba, Tamuzi akaba ari umuhungu wa mana-zuba nawe akaba umugore na nyina wa mana-zuba kandi yuko bose bategerezwa gusengwa nkâ€™imana-zuba imwe: UBUTATU. Muca mubona ingene BIKIRAMARIYA yinjijwe mu kwemera kwâ€™abatu.

Nâ€™uyu munsi niko ibintu bimeze, satani akoresha ikinyoma, ibinyegezwa, amayeri nâ€™urujijo maze abantu bakamusenga batabizi, bibgira ngo bariko barasenga Imana yâ€™ukuri. Ahantu hose muri Babuloni hari ibishusho vyâ€™uyo mugore Semiramis batazira kandi â€œumwamikazi wâ€™ijuruâ€ [Yeremiya 7: 16-20] ateruye umwana wiwe Nimurodi, nkuko mubona ibishusho vyâ€™umugore ateruye umwana uyu munsi bavuga ngo ni Mariya ateruye kana YEZU. Ikimenyetso ciwe kwari ukwezi, ica Nimurodi naco cari izuba akongera akitwa BAYALI. Aho niho havuye ubutatu. [Abikolosayi 2 :9]Kiliziya Katolika mu manama yayo ya NISEYA mu mwaka wa 325, ya CONSTANTINOPLE mu mwaka wa 381, TOLEDO mu mwaka wa 675, LATERANE mu mwaka wa 1215 na Council yi FLORENCE mu mwaka wa 1431-1449 yashizwe isutse ico cizerwa câ€™ubutatu bgeranda yâ€™ubupaganimu vyizerwa vyâ€™aba-Kristo. Amashengero nayo yitirirwa Yesu Kristo yagiye ariyonkora kuri Katolika agumana ico cizerwa câ€™igipagani mu vyizerwa vyayo. Ubusanga muri:-Britannica Encyclopedia, 11th Edition, Volume 3, page 365 â€“ Handitse yuko umubatizo mwâ€™Izina rya Yesu Kristo wahinduwe ugirwa mwâ€™izina rya Data nâ€™irya mwa nâ€™irya mutima mweranda mu kinjana ca kabiri.-Canney Encyclopedia of Religion, page 53 â€“ Handitse yuko ishengero rya mbere ryabatiza mwâ€™Izina rya Yesu Kristo gushika mu kinjana ca kabiri.-Hastings Encyclopedia of Religion, Volume 2 page 377â€“ Handitse yuko ibatisimu yakorwa mugukoresha amajambo â€œMwâ€™Izina rya Yesu Kristoâ€ gushika mu gihe ca Justin Martyr, ku rupapuro rwa (page) 389.-Catholic Encyclopedia, Volume 2, page 263 â€“ Ngaha abanditsi bose baremeza yuko kubatiza mwâ€™izina rya Yesu Kristo vyahinduwe na Kiliziya Katolika.-Schaff â€“ Herzog Religious Encyclopedia, Volume 1, page 435 â€“ Haranditse yuko Isezerano rishasha ryose ryemeza umubatizo mwâ€™izina rya Yesu Kristo wonyene.-Hastings Dictionary of Bible, page 88 â€“ Yanditse yuko umuntu wese ategerezwa kumenya yuko rirya zina ririmwo atatu ryo muri [Matayo 28:19] ritigezwe rikoreshwa mwâ€™ishengero ryatanguye kwâ€™isi. Hariho amayeri menshi yo kizimanganya ihonyabgoko harimwo no guhenda Leta ngo yasavye imbabazi mu kibanza câ€™abarikoze canke kuryita ubgicanyi busanzwe. Abarongozi bâ€™igihugu cacu barakora akantukâ€™ubusamazicanke ko gusamaza Abarundi nko kuvuga ngo:

Ibintu vyo guca iruhande ukuri burya bizokwega akarambaraye mu gihugu. Abarundi barakeneye inzira yo kuva muvyo baciyemwo kugira ngo bahangane nâ€™ibindi bibazo bihanze urunganwe rwâ€™uyu munsi. Yari yagize ati: Â»Hariho abagenzi banje batumvikanye kubera impavu zidakenewe ko ndazivugira ngaha.Umwe ngo yabwiye uwundi ati:<< Jewe nahawe nâ€™umutwe wanje wewe reka kumpohotera wahawe nuko uzi kurasa gusa>>.Uravye akahise tuvuyemwo abazi kurasa badukuye habi kuko igisoda categerezwa gukungwa nikindi. title: Ijwi rya Goliyati rigiye kuzimabgana mu matwiÂ yâ€™Abarundi
content:
IJWI RYA GOLIYATI.

Â«Â Nukâ€™ uwo Mufilisitiya, uko bukeye uko bgije, akama aseruka ahibonekeza, abasomboroza, kumara imisi mirongwine.1 Samweli 17:16â€³

Uyo dusomye ni ikigatanya bita Goliyati.Yari umurwanyi wâ€™umuhizi wo mubwoko bwâ€™abafilisitiya.Yarâ€™ikigatanya giteye ubwoba kuburyo amajambo yiwe yo gusomborotsa abisilayeri yatuma bihebura,nâ€™umwami sawuli nawe akihebura.Â«Â 1samweli 17:11Â Â»

Twasomye ngo Â«Â uko bukeye uko bwije,uyo mufilisitiya yama aseruka ahibonekeza,abasomboroza,kumara imisi mirongwineÂ Â».

Uko niko ijwi rya Goliyatimubuzima bwacu rimera.Goliyati ni igicantege.Nkâ€™uko yaseruka kubisirayeli uko bukeye(mugitondo),nâ€™uko bwije(kumugoroba),ninako abadayimoni bâ€™urucantege bakunda kubigenza nâ€™ubu.Baza mugitondo(wikanguye ukumva wibukijwe ikibazo kikuremereye,ukavyuka wihebuye),bakongera bakaza uko bwije(kukagoroba),kugira ngo uryamane ukwiganyira,ukwihebura.

Ayo majwi yâ€™abadayimoni,aza mugatondo kugira atume wirirwa ubihiwe,akagaruka kukagoroba kugira urare ubihiwe wiganyira.

Ikindi,Goliyati ntiyaserutse rimwe canke kabiri canke gatatu,yabikoze imisi mirongwine yose.1samweli 17:16â€³.

Bivugwa ko iyo ikintu ugikoze imisi mirongwibiri nâ€™umwe gihinduka akamenyero,amadayimoni rero ivyo arabizi.Abisirayeli kumara imisi mirongwine bihebura,biganyira,vyari vyageze igihe kwiganyira aba aribwo buzima babayeho.Nkâ€™uko nâ€™ubu,bitewe nâ€™ikibazo umuntu amaranye igihe atagisubizo,kwiganyira usanga vyaramuhindukiye ubuzima,kubwâ€™ijwi rya Goliyati(ryâ€™abadayimoni bâ€™urucantege).

Ariko rero, ijwi rya goliyati ntawoshobora kuricecekesha we ubwiwe,kubwo ugutahura canke kubwo kwiremesha.Uzosanga nâ€™iyo ubigerageje bidakunda,rirongera rikagaruka.

Ibihumbi vyâ€™abisilayeri bari kumwe nâ€™umwami wabo,ntivyakunze ko ijwi ryâ€™uwo mufilisitiya ritabatera kwihebura bose.Umwe wenyene niwe yabishoboye.Dawidi niwe yatesheje agaciro ijwi rya Goliyati,kubwâ€™Imana yiwe.

Ijwi rya Goliyati ntakindi kiricecekesha,ricecekeshwa gusa nâ€™umuntu ashikamye mukwizera Imana yiwe.

Dawidi vyarangiye anesheje goliyati,ariko ntiyabishobojwe nâ€™ubuhizi asanganywe,canke nâ€™abamutera intege,yabishobojwe nâ€™ukwizera Imana,bituma nayo imanuka,iramushigikira,iramuneshereza.Nâ€™ubu niko bikimeze,Goliyati aguca intege azotsindwa nâ€™ikwizera Imana yawe.

Umwami Yesu Kristo yamamare hose.

Aho yariko arishura uwavuze ngo ni bice ibihemu biri mu bahutu canke biri mu batutsi nkâ€™uko imvugo zâ€™abantu ziri.Umuhinga wâ€™umurundi umwe yagize ati:â€œNibaza yuko muri iki gihugu cacu câ€™Uburundi tudakeneye kwica ababi, kwica abagwaye mu mutwe canke kwica ibihemu. Jewe ndaba iyo twavuye ( ubgicanyi bgabaye bikorwa hagati yâ€™abatutsi nâ€™abahutu, nâ€™ubgakozwe hagati yâ€™abahutu bicana ubgabo kuva mu mirwi irwana mwâ€™ishamba gushika bamaze no gushika mu gihugu), nogira nti kirazira gusubira kwica mwenewanyu umuhoye icarico cose harimwo nâ€™ububi bgiwe. Uti kuki? Nokwishura nti ni nde ari mwiza ko twese tuzinanye!Ico sico nagomba kuvuga ariko. Nagomba gushika kurâ€™iki:Â»Kubera ibihe igihugu caciyemwo, ingene twakuze, ivyo twakuriyemwo nâ€™ivyo turimwo ubu, Abarundi bakwiriye kwigishwa, kurerwa, gutunganywa no kubohorwa kugira ngo igihugu kigire amatanguriro mashasha mu ndero, mu butungane, mu kibano, mu butunzi, mu ntwaro,â€¦ Â»Ivyo vyo gukubura, gufyeta, gusafisha,â€¦ bizomara abo mwari mukwiriye gukingira kuko habuze urufatiro nâ€™ivyitegererezo ku masinzi yâ€™abarundi.Ngira nti muzi igisumanyenzi mu buryo bgâ€™impwemu kiri mu gihugu kubera (a) bahowe ubusa, ubgoko bgabo bakicwa nabi bagatabga mu mashamba nâ€™ibinogo rusangi, (b) abana bakuze arimpfuvyi, barerwa nâ€™abapfakazi, bakuriye mu buhunzi babona abandi babayeho neza, (c) Abantu bakuze bazi yuko ubuzima ari ukwibako, ugukora ikibi, ugusahura, ukubesha,â€¦ kugira ngo igihugu gikire hakeneye ubuhinga, impinyanyuro, ukuvura imitima nâ€™abantu bafise ishaka atari ugukubura.

title: Abarundi barahahamutse, bakeneye abarongozi babahumuriza atarababateraÂ ubgoba.
