title: Amakosa 10 yagirizwa PrÃ©sident EvaristeÂ NDAYISHIMIYE.
content:
Hariho Abarundi bakunda umukuru wâ€™igihugu cacu câ€™Uburundi Evariste NDAYISHIMIYE. Mugabo nkâ€™uko nawe nyene avyivugora, hariho nâ€™abandi bamutorako amakosa muvyo akora nâ€™ivyo avuga. Hari uwagize ati none ntafise abamuhanura bo muyagira ayavugwa, uwundi yagize ati haraho mwoca mubipfa ugahitamwo kwihorera. Amakosa 10 bamwagiriza rero ni ibi:

Umukuru wâ€™igihugu canke uwundi muyobozi wese abikwiye, ntakwiye gushira ahabona ibishobisho vyiwe. Haba mu mvugo canke mu ngiro. Iyo bimeze uko, kenshi vyerekana ubwoba afise. Kutigirira icizere, tutibagiye kwerekana inguvu nâ€™ubushobozi buke bimuranga mu kazi kiwe.

Umukuru wâ€™igihugu adafata ingingo zibereye mu kanya zikenewe, ntaco aba amariye ico gihugu ayoboye. Ahubwo nâ€™icago kidasanzwe. Bwa bwoba buranga NEVA, nibwo bwamugize igikanganyoni mu kibanza arimwo. Ni naco gituma avuga amajambo menshi kurusha ibikorwa vyo mwitirirwa. Ahandi, abakuru bâ€™ibihugu biyubashe, bakwiye ico cubahiro, bavugisha amaboko kurusha umunwa. Ngira nico gituma bamutaziriye Kirogorogo.

Umugabo wâ€™inganzwa ntanarimwe aba atekanye mu mutima canke mu mutwe. None yoyobora neza i gihugu gute? Neva iyaba yoshoboye kuhabera Umugabo abushitse, yotanze imihoho, agakinjura kâ€™ubutegetsi bwâ€™igihugu. Kuko iryo Shiga ryiwe rishobora kumukwegera akarambaraye, akabura imbwa nâ€™imbwebwe. Araja muri kahise katari akakure cane, yiyibutse aho abatambukanyi ba Ben Ali (Tuniziya), Robert Mugabe (Zimbabwe) canke Ferdinand Marcos (Philippines) bashikanye ubutegetsi bwâ€™abanega babo!

Kuyobora igihugu, sâ€™umukino nka kurya abantu bakina ikibuguzo, amakarata canke batera agapira. Bisaba kuba ufise abahanuzi bâ€™ijunja nâ€™ijambo, bakunda i gihugu nâ€™abakibamwo, bikura ijambo batariye umunwa. Umuyobozi adakikijwe nâ€™imvugakuri, asa nâ€™igitutu ciwe cibereye aho gusa. Uwo ni Neva ku gasozi. Nâ€™iwe yihera akazi abagenzi bâ€™umuryango wiwe gusa. Ataravye ubumenyi nâ€™ubushobozi bwabo. Adatandukanije ubuzi bwa poritike nâ€™ubuzi bwâ€™ubuhinga. Ingaruka yavyo, nâ€™aha u Burundi bugeze unomusi.

Munyifato yiwe, NEVA afise ubunenge bukunda kugira abakeha bwenge benshi. Ntazi kwicisha bugufi. Ntazi kumviriza umuntu ngo ategere neza ivyo amubwiye. Canke ngo yishire mu kibanza câ€™abandi, kugira arabe ingene yotorera inyishu ibibazo bibahanze. Nuko adasiba gutuka abategetsi bamwe bamwe kâ€™umugaragaro, yishavuje, imbere yabo batwara, ababwirako akazi kose bajejwe, agiye kukikorera! Mwumva aratahura neza amabanga ajanye nâ€™intebe avyagiyemwo? Ntakuntu na kumwe yoba umutegetsi mwiza yitwara uko.

Kuyobora igihugu nâ€™ibanga rikomeye, utegerezwa kubangira ingata. Bikenewe uracigura. Vyanka, ugatanga imihoho, kugira ntubandanye uba isoko ryâ€™umwaku nâ€™akaga mu gihugu. Muri bwa bujuju bumuranga, Neva yironderera amaronko yiwe gusa nâ€™umuryango wiwe. Ninavyo bimutuma agaya abarundi bimwe birenze urugero. Ukamengo abamwumviriza nâ€™abamuraba, nibo batagira ubwenge! Amatongo yâ€™ikebera mu gihugu cose, kenshi akoresheje igitugu, amazu agura mu gisagara ca Bujumbura muma miriyari atarazwe na se canke yatsinze muri LONA, akayagura atumye abandi bantu bamwegereye, amahera atoza ku nguvu mubikorera utwabo, abarundi canke abanyamahanga bakeyi basigaye bataromoka, birasigura neza ubusambo bumuranga. Ubu atunze kurusha inzego zose zâ€™igihugu ziri hamwe. Hari uguhemuka gusumba uko?

Kuva yaramutswa igihugu, Neva yariyugaranye mu Burundi, nka kumwe kuwahoze ari Sekuru, aherutse kwikokomora. Nâ€™ubwo akunda gufata ingendo hanze yâ€™igihugu, ni gake cane amaze kuja mu gihugu bamutumiye, kugira banagure canke bakomeze umubano mwiza hagati yâ€™u Burundi nico gihugu. Aja mu manama batumira ikivunga abakuru bâ€™ibihugu, nawe arimwo. Cokimwe nabitwa ko bagendeye u Burundi. Abandi baza kunyungu zabo, kenshi zidahuye neza nâ€™izacu nkâ€™abarundi. Bidasigura ko baba bashigikiye reta ya Neva.

Igihe Neva yafata i gihugu, yazanye icivugo gitangaje, Â«Â reta vyeyi, reta nkozi.Â Â» Arongerako ati Â«Â umufuko wose uronke amahera, umunwa wose uronke icurya.Â Â» Umuntu aravye agaheza u Burundi bugezemwo, Neva akaguma acira izo nkonda imbere yâ€™abarundi bigorewe ayâ€™ikivumvu, umuntu abisomamwo akagaye katagira izina. Nâ€™ugucurira abarundi bishwe nâ€™ubukene, inzara nâ€™agahinda, bitewe ahanini nâ€™ubutegetsi bubi bumaze igihe. Niyo abarundi bose bopfa bagahera, Neva nâ€™abiwe bagasigara, biraturaba twenyene. None tuzokwiyahura tubona gushika ryari? Asigaye abwira abarundi ko turi ibijuju, yaheza tugakoma amashi. Nâ€™inde yaturoze kweri?

Umuntu aravye ubukene, imyikomo nâ€™agahinda biranga inzego nkuru zâ€™igihugu, yokwibaza iyo u Burundi bugana, mugihe cose Neva azoba aburamutswa? Haba munzego zâ€™Ubutungane, Igisirikare, Igiporisi, Igendereza, Reta, Inamashingamateka, Nkenguzamateka, tutibagiye mu bimenyeshamakuru, vyaba ivya reta canke ivyigenga, vyose bimeze nkâ€™igiti catewe nâ€™umuswa. Neva abikora nkana, yabiteguye. Ivyo abikora kugira izo nzego ntizimushengeze canke ngo zisubize Ibintu mu buryo. Abari murivyo bisata bihambaye mu buzima bwâ€™igihugu, ntaho bataniye nâ€™abandi barundi isinzi babuze ayo bacira nayo bamira, kubera ubwo butegetsi bubi, budashoboye kubaka ikintu na kimwe kizima, kirama. Ubutegetsi bubesha ngo bwashize imbere Imana, kandi umengo bwihaye Sekibi.

Abarundi batari musi yâ€™umuriyoni, ubu babarizwa mu mvuto ataco bazira, mu buhungiro hanze yâ€™igihugu, canke barataye akaranga kabo nkâ€™abarundi, bitorera kwibera inyuma yicabibarutse, imisi yose basigaje kwâ€™isi. Ako nâ€™agahombo kadasanzwe ku Burundi. Nyaburya murabo bantu, hagwiriyemwo urwaruka nâ€™izindi ncabwenge zikomeye. Bamwe bashobora guterera agacumu kâ€™ubumwe, mubijanye nâ€™ukubogora u Burundi, abarundi bagasubizwa izina nâ€™iteka mu makungu.

Umuntu abiravye neza, ikosa ntirikiri irya Neva nâ€™abo bafatanije mu gucura bufuni na buhoro igihugu cacu nâ€™abakibamwo. Ibintu bibandanyije uku, tuzoba twakunze aya mahano reta ya Neva yadushizemwo. Hariko hararengerana cane ko u Burundi butabagwa. Ntihagire rero uwo dusubira gutako ishavu.

title: Amasezerano yâ€™Ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi: ivyizaÂ 15.
content:
AMASEZERANO IMANA YAHAYE IGIHUGU Câ€™UBURUNDI

Abarundi ni Ihanga Ryera ryatoranijwe nâ€™Uhoraho Imana rihabga isezerano ryâ€™intahava. Aya masezerano yâ€™Uburundi yanditse muri Bibiliya Yera nkâ€™uko umuhanuzi Yesaya yabihishuriwe muri [YESAYA 19:18-25] mu mwaka wa 700 imbere yâ€™uko Umwami nâ€™Umukiza wacu Yesu Kristo avuka. Ubundi buvugishwa nâ€™ubuhanuzi bwa mbere ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi bgavuzwe mu mwaka wa 1935, umwaka amashengero ya pentekoti yatanguzwa mu Burundi nâ€™abakozi bâ€™Imana bari baje bava mu gihugu ca Suwedi. Ico gihe niho umuvugabitumwa URI yavuze yuko Abarundi ari ihanga ryatoranijwe nâ€™Imana. Ubundi buvugishwa bgasaba Abarundi kwisonzesha, kwiyeza no gusenga cane kuko ari Ihanga ryatoranijwe, bgavuzwe muri Myandagaro mu 1968 mu gikorane câ€™Amashengero ya Pentekoti cari cabereye i Mugara. Inyuma yaho hari nâ€™abandi bavugishwa baturuka muri Tanzaniya, Congo, Isirayeli, Ubudagi, Ububiligi Amerika nâ€™ahandi bavyeretswe.Ubgacu Uhoraho yaduhishuriye vyinshi ku masezerano nâ€™ibitabo biruzura kandi nâ€™uyu munsi iyo dukoranye Mpwemu wâ€™Imana arururuka akavugana natwe akabitwemeza. Imana idusaba kwihana ivyaha vyose, ukugororoka nâ€™ukwezwa kuko igira ishitse ayo masezerano. Ibikurubikuru biri mwâ€™isezerano Uhoraho yahaye Ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi ni ibi:

title: 25/07/23: Umunsi wo kwihana nâ€™Ukwezwa. Ifatanye nâ€™amasinziÂ yâ€™Abarundi.
content: IHANGA RYERA RYEGERA IMANA YERANâ€™iteka rihambaye kubona twiswe nâ€™Uhoraho abantu bayo, abatoranijwe, Ihanga Ryera kandi tukaba twahawe amasezerano. [Kuvayo 19 :10-11]I. Kwegera Imana bisaba kuba waratoranije ugashirwa ukwa wenyene.Imana yabariye Mose ati genda ku bantu ubabarire biyeze uyu munsi nâ€™ejo, bamesure impuzu zabo, umunsi ugira gatatu ushike biteguye. Kwitegura kubonana nâ€™Uhoraho kugira ngo ugire ico umubariye utegerezwa kubanza kuba wihanye ivyaha, wejejwe mu mutima kandi no ku mubiri, ku mpuzu usa neza nkâ€™uwurengutse i butware. Mu yandi majambo ni ukuba utunganye gose mu mutima, atajwi rikwagiriza ikibi wirengagije. Utegerezwa kuba uri agahore, uri ukwa wenyene, ata gasembga nâ€™amarabaga. Ukwiyeza ni ugukura ibirohe mu mutima wawe ukabaho atacaha na kimwe cinyegeje muri wewe. Abantu benshi basengana ivyaha bakahakura imivumo nâ€™urupfu.Imana ibariye abantu bayo ngo biyeze mu mitima bateko bamesure nâ€™impuzu zabo bisigura yuko abantu biyeza mu mpwemu bagatako bakiyuhagira no mu mubiri ubuhumane bgose. Uwuriko arihumanura yigirwa kure ibintu vyose abantu bavuga, ivyo bumviriza, ivyo baraba, ivyo basoma eka nâ€™ivyo bashobora kuba bambara vyobahumanya. Ugomba kuba mu bgiza bgâ€™Imana utegerezwa kweza mu mubiri no mu Mpwemu ukaba uwera koko.Muri [Yakobo 4:8-10] hatubarira ibintu 4 dutegerezwa gukora kugira ngo twitegurire kuba hafi yâ€™Imana. (1) Gukaraba neza binasigura kudasubira gukora ivyaha, (2) Kwuhagira umutima wawe binasigura guhindura ingendo zawe nâ€™ingene wiyumvira, (3) Kubabazwa nâ€™ivyaha wakoze ukamenya yuko icaha ari naco catumye umukiza ababazwa, (4) Kwicisha bugufi kugira ngo tube nkâ€™uko Imana ishaka.II. Kwegera Imana bisaba kuyitinya, kuyubaha no kuyikunda.[Kuvayo 19:12], Imana isaba abantu bayo kutarenga akarimbi bashingiwe impande zose kuko no gukora ku musozi Imana ihagazeko arapfa. Abantu bategerezwa kumenya yuko Imana itandukanye nâ€™abantu kandi yuko kugira ngo uyegere utegerezwa kubikora nkâ€™uko ijambo ryayo ribivuga. Nta kubifata ibisanzwe. Kubera amashengero yafashe ivyâ€™Imana nkâ€™ibihunda hadutse akaga.III. title: Mwitabire umutumiro wâ€™ijuri wo gusengera igihugu no gusengera imiryangoÂ yanyu.
content: ABIZEYE UHORAHO IMANA BATEGEREZWA GUHAGARARIRA UKURI MU GIHUGUNta murundi wâ€™umutima yokwigira sindabibazwa kuvyerekeye igihugu ciwe mu kwinyegeza muvyâ€™Imana. Ijambo ryose rije ribakebura kandi rihamagarira guhinduka, kwezwa no gutungana bama bagerageza kuritoramwo ikosa no kuryankisha abandi.Nyenâ€™icubahiro umukuru wâ€™igihugu câ€™Uburundi nâ€™abamufasha, birirwa barasemerera yuko abantu bohindura ingendo, indongozi zitegeka nabi zikikubita agashi, abanyonora itunga ryâ€™igihugu bakabiheba, abacamanza bakihanura, kuko ivyo bibi nivyo bitera ubukene inzara mu gihugu.Uretse yuko ako kamo karaba cane indongozi zâ€™igihugu, abubaha Imana bategerezwa gufata iyambere kugira ngo impundu nâ€™amerembe bisamirane igihugu no mu mahanga. Ariko siko biri kuko abarongoye amadini nâ€™amashengero benshi aho guhimiriza abantu ngo bahinduke bihane bezwe, basha coba, bagatinya ukuri, indimi zabo zikagoba. Hari nâ€™abinyegeza mu migambge bagafadikanya nâ€™abanyakibi, nâ€™abatware barya ibinure vyâ€™intama mu gushigikira ibiturire, abahohotera abandi nâ€™ayandi mabi. [2Petero 2:17-22]Twebge nkâ€™abubaha Uhoraho, abizera Umwami nâ€™umukiza wacu Yesu Kristo, dutegerezwa kwerekana ubushobozi bgâ€™amasengesho. Dutegerezwa kuba imboneza zitwara urumuri rwâ€™ukuri, amahoro nâ€™iterambere mu gihugu. Umwami Yesu yadutumye kuba umunyu wâ€™isi nâ€™urumuri rwâ€™abantu. [Matayo 5:13-16]Iyo Ihanga Ryera rihamagariye abantu bose gusengera igihugu twicishije bugufi mu kwiyeza nâ€™ukwisonzesha, amasinzi yâ€™Abarundi bari mu gihugu nâ€™abari mu mahanga barayitabira, harimwo abaganza igihugu nâ€™abajejwe umutekano kandi abantu benshi barahabohokera bagatabarwa. Hari abakira ivyaha, abakira ngwara zâ€™umubiri nâ€™abo Uhoraho akiza ivyago bitandukanye.Ariko rero bigatangaza kubona imparurwa zifise imigenzo yâ€™amadini ziterekwa ayo amasengesho ategurwa nâ€™Abera. Abarongoye utwo tugwi bohejwe na Satani, bagerageza gutesha abizera kuja murâ€™ayo masengesho. Babesha ngo (1) Ntituzi icicaro câ€™abateguye ayo masengesho, (2) Abo bayateguye nta kintu baduha, (3) Abo basenga batyoza leta, (4) Nâ€™ukugwanya Leta (5) Mube musengana ubgenge, (6) nâ€™utundi tujambo twâ€™urucantege twotirimutsa abatazi ibanga ryo gusengera igihugu nâ€™amasezerano yaco. [Abigalatiya 4:16]Mu gihugu cacu hari amadini nâ€™amashengero ashika 850 ariko uko agwira niko nâ€™ivyaha bigwira bikazana umuvumo ku gihugu. Ni murengere ayo mabohero yo mu mpwemu, mube abidegemvya muri Kristo Yesu kugira ngo muhagararire ukuri mubone gusengera igihugu nâ€™ico Uhoraho Imana yakivuzeko. [Abaroma 8:7-21]

title: Nti murwe mu mosha yâ€™abatinya amasengesho bagasengaÂ uruheyiheyi.
content: URAHAMAGARIRWA GUSENGA AYA MASENGESHO NTURWE MU MOSHAâ€œGusenga ngo ntimurwe mu moshaâ€ ni ijambo Umwami nâ€™Umukiza wacu Yesu Kristo yabariye abigishwa biwe igihe yariko arasengana umubabaro kuko igihe ciwe co kubabazwa cari cimirije [MATAYO 26:41-42]Nkâ€™uko mwabibonye, Ijuru ryatumiriye Abarundi bose guca bugufi bakihana kugira ngo basengere igihugu nâ€™ishengero ryâ€™Imana kugira ngo Uhoraho atabare nkâ€™uko yabisezeranye. Hatanzwe urufatiro mu [2 INGOMA 7 :14] na [LUKA 10 :19].Hariho imirwi yâ€™abanyamadini nâ€™abanyamigenzo batazi yuko Abera bâ€™Imana bama kira mwaka bafata indwi yo kwisonzesha basengera igihugu câ€™Uburundi nâ€™amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yakivuzeko. Uyu mwaka amasengesho azomara iminsi itanu, kuva kwigenekerezo rya 25 gushika kwâ€™igenekerezo rya 29 uku kwezi. Ntimwoshwe nâ€™abatabitahura kandi bibaza yuko boyatesha abandi. Ntihagire uwugutesha kwifatanya nâ€™Ihanga ryose ryâ€™Uburundi gusengera igihugu cawe.Muvyo abo bahagarara ku tuntu twabo aho kwifatanya nâ€™Abera bose bitwaza bavuga ngo:Kwisonzesha iminsi itanu yose ni myinshi. Yesu yisonzesheje iminsi 40 nâ€™amajoro 40 atarya atanywa. [Matayo 4 :1-11] Ugusenga wisonzesheje bibohora benshi kuko vyirukana abadayimoni [Matayo 17 :21] Eka noneho kubera intege nke hariho abasabga kwiyiriza gusa nâ€™abandi bashobora kugira ico barya canke banywa kubera amagara yabo.Gusengera igihugu ngo ni ivya politike. Abo bari mu migwi yitirirwa izina ryâ€™Imana, bakama bakoresha Bibiliya Yera mugabo ntibazi isezerano riri muri [2 INGOMA 7 :14] Guca bugufi no gusengera igihugu Imana igatabara. Abantu bâ€™Imana nibo bategerezwa guhagarara mu gihengeri câ€™igihugu.Kuvuga ukuri ngo ni ukurwanya Reta. Satani yarateye mu mashengero abanyaga ukuri, abasukamwo icoba no kwiyorobeka ngo nikwo gutungana. Abana bâ€™Imana bategerezwa kwemanga yuko icera cera nâ€™icirabura cirabura kuko niho bazokiza ishamvu Imana yabahaye. Ukuri kutavuzwe nâ€™abubaha Imana ntikuzovugwa nâ€™abapagani. Bibiliya iratubgira yuko kumenya ukuri biduha ukwidegemvya [YOHANA 8:32] kandi yuko kubgenge Imana yaduhaye twongerako ukuri. [2PETERO1 :5-8].Abana nâ€™abadakijijwe ngo ntiboja mu masengesho yo kwitanga. Mu gihe nkâ€™iki ni abo munzu bose mbere nâ€™ibitungano birubahiriza icagezwe câ€™Uhoraho nkâ€™uko vyagenze i NINIWE [YONA 3:5-9]. Abubaha Imana nâ€™abo mu nzu zabo bategerezwakwubaha Uhoraho [YOSHUWA 24 :15].Ufise ikibazo twandikire maze twamamaze Umwami Yesu Kristo twese!

content:
GÃ©nÃ©ral-Major Sibomana Ignace niwe ahagarariye umurwi wâ€™abasirikare ukora isuzuma yâ€™ivyakozwe nâ€™inteko za EAC

Kuri uyu wa kabiri, igenekerezo rya 4 Mukakaro 2023 niho umurwi wâ€™intwazangabo urongowe na General-Major Ignace Sibomana watangura igikorwa co gusuzuma ko inteko za EAC zaranguye ubutumwa bwo kugarukana umutekano mu buseruko bwa Congo nkâ€™uko bwari bwazihawe nâ€™inama yâ€™abakuru bâ€™ibihugu vya EAC.

Iyo ntwazangabo isanzwe kandi ari icegera câ€™umukuru wâ€™ingabo zirwanira ku butaka mu Burundi amenyesha ko ico gikorwa kizorangira ku wa 08 Mukakaro. Avuga kandi ko bazogendera uduce twose turimwo abasirikare ba EAC hamwe nâ€™uduce tukiri mu minwe ya M23.

Ingingo yo gusuzuma ivyakozwe nâ€™igisirikare ca EAC ikaba yafatiwe mu nama igira iya 21 yâ€™abakuru bâ€™ibihugu yabaye ku wa 31 Rusama 2023 yabereye i Bujumbura.

Ni inyuma yâ€™aho umukuru wâ€™igihugu ca Congo arahiye ko ico gisirikare ca EAC kitigeze kirwanya aba M23, ko ariyo mpamvu gitegerezwa kuva ku butaka bwa Congo muri uku kwa gatandatu guheze.

Prezida Tshisekedi akaba yavuga ko nâ€™imiburiburi abasirikare bakwiye gusigara ari abavuye i Burundi gusa. Akaba mbere yaciye asaba inteko zivuye mu muryango SADC ko ari zo zoca ziza gusubirira iza EAC.

Bikaba bitegekanijwe abo basirikare bazova ku butaka bwa Congo mu kwezi kwa Nyakanga 2023 inyuma yâ€™iryo suzuma.Twobibutsa ko kuva mu kwezi kwa Rusama 2023, abategetsi batandukanye bagumye bavuga ko igisirikare ca EAC ataco kiriko kirafasha, ko kitarwanya abarwanyi ba M23 ko kandi gifitaniye imigenderanire idasanzwe na M23.

Ku wa 13 Rusama 2023, icegera câ€™umushikiranganji wa mbere ajejwe imigenderanire nâ€™ayandi makungu akaba yavugiye ku mugaragaro ko izo nteko zananiwe.
